# ::save-date Wed May 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_1.txt
(d / date-entity
  :year 2002
  :month 1
  :day 5)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.2 ::date 2013-05-08T11:14:35 ::snt-type country ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed May 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_2.txt
(c / country
  :name (n / name
          :op1 "Saudi"
          :op2 "Arabia"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.3 ::date 2013-05-02T11:31:34 ::snt-type topic ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred
# ::snt International; military; terrorism
# ::save-date Thu May 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_3.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (i / international)
  :op2 (m / military)
  :op2 (t / terrorism))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.4 ::date 2013-05-02T11:36:07 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred
# ::snt The Riyadh-based Naif Arab Academy for Security Sciences said in a statement that it was running a two-week workshop for 50 anti-terrorism experts.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_4.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (u / university
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Naif"
                  :op2 "Arab"
                  :op3 "Academy"
                  :op4 "for"
                  :op5 "Security"
                  :op6 "Sciences")
          :ARG1-of (b / base-01
                     :location (c / city
                                 :name (n2 / name
                                         :op1 "Riyadh"))))
  :ARG1 (r / run-01
          :ARG0 u
          :ARG1 (w / workshop
                  :beneficiary (p / person
                                 :quant 50
                                 :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                                            :ARG2 (c2 / counter-01
                                                    :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism)))))
          :duration (t / temporal-quantity
                      :quant 2
                      :unit (w2 / week)))
  :medium (s2 / statement))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.5 ::date 2013-05-08T11:25:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt On 5 January 2002 pan-Arab anti-terror academy Naif Arab Academy for Security Sciences reopened for the first time since the September 2001 terror attacks on the US.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_5.txt
(r / reopen-01
      :ARG1 (a / academy :name (n / name :op1 "Naif" :op2 "Arab" :op3 "Academy" :op4 "for" :op5 "Security" :op6 "Sciences")
            :purpose (o / oppose-01
                  :ARG1 (t / terror))
            :mod (e / ethnic-group :name (n3 / name :op1 "Arab")
                  :mod (p / pan)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 1 :day 5)
      :frequency (f / first
            :time (s / since
                  :op1 (a3 / attack-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "the" :op2 "US"))
                        :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2001 :month 9)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.6 ::date 2013-05-08T11:36:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Naif Arab Academy for Security Sciences is based in Riyadh.
# ::save-date Wed May 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_6.txt
(b / base-01
  :ARG1 (u / university
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Naif"
                  :op2 "Arab"
                  :op3 "Academy"
                  :op4 "for"
                  :op5 "Security"
                  :op6 "Sciences"))
  :location (c / city
              :name (n2 / name
                      :op1 "Riyadh")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.7 ::date 2013-05-08T11:38:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Naif Arab Academy for Security Sciences is run by an Arab Interior Ministers' Council.
# ::save-date Wed May 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_7.txt
(r / run-01
  :ARG0 (o / organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Arab"
                  :op2 "Interior"
                  :op3 "Ministers'"
                  :op4 "Council"))
  :ARG1 (u / university
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Naif"
                  :op2 "Arab"
                  :op3 "Academy"
                  :op4 "for"
                  :op5 "Security"
                  :op6 "Sciences")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.8 ::date 2013-05-08T11:45:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt In a statement Naif Arab Academy for Security Sciences announced --
# ::save-date Wed May 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_8.txt
(a / announce-01
  :ARG0 (u / university
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Naif"
                  :op2 "Arab"
                  :op3 "Academy"
                  :op4 "for"
                  :op5 "Security"
                  :op6 "Sciences"))
  :manner (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (s / state-01
                       :ARG0 u)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.9 ::date 2013-05-08T11:46:22 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt It will sponsor a 2-week workshop for 50 anti-terrorism experts.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_9.txt
(s / sponsor-01
      :ARG0 (i / it)
      :ARG1 (w / workshop
            :beneficiary (p / person :quant 50
                  :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                        :ARG2 (o / oppose-01
                              :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism))))
            :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 2
                  :unit (w2 / week))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.10 ::date 2013-05-08T11:52:54 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The workshop's anti-terrorism experts are from 11 Arab countries including Algeria, Bahrain, Egypt, Jordan, Lebanon, Mauritania, Morocco, Saudi Arabia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_10.txt
(i / include-91
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Algeria"))
            :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Bahrain"))
            :op3 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Egypt"))
            :op4 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Jordan"))
            :op5 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Lebanon"))
            :op6 (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Mauritania"))
            :op7 (c7 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Morocco"))
            :op8 (c8 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia"))
            :op9 (c9 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "Sudan"))
            :op10 (c10 / country :name (n10 / name :op1 "Syria"))
            :op11 (c11 / country :name (n11 / name :op1 "Yemen")))
      :ARG2 (c12 / country :quant 11
            :source-of (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                        :ARG2 (o / oppose-01
                              :ARG1 (t / terrorism)))
                  :poss (w / workshop))
            :mod (e2 / ethnic-group :name (n12 / name :op1 "Arab"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.11 ::date 2013-05-28T19:27:07 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred
# ::snt The workshop's anti-terrorism experts belong to anti-terror squads in Arab security agencies and Anti-Organized Crime Units.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_11.txt
(b / belong-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                  :ARG2 (c4 / counter-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism)))
            :poss (w / workshop))
      :ARG1 (s / squad
            :part-of (a3 / and
                  :op1 (a4 / agency
                        :purpose (s2 / security)
                        :mod (e2 / ethnic-group :name (n / name :op1 "Arab")))
                  :op2 (u / unit
                        :purpose (c2 / counter-01
                              :ARG1 (c / crime
                                    :ARG1-of (o / organize-01)))))
            :purpose (c3 / counter-01
                  :ARG1 (t / terrorism))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.12 ::date 2013-05-08T13:10:08 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Some specialize in dealing with kidnapping and hostage-taking scenarios.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_12.txt
(s / specialize-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :quant (s2 / some))
      :ARG1 (d / deal-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (s3 / scenario
                  :mod (a / and
                        :op1 (k / kidnap-01)
                        :op2 (t / take-01
                              :ARG1 (h / hostage))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.13 ::date 2013-05-08T13:14:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The workshop will address several terrorism-related issues including political factors leading to terror, the role of religion in fighting terrorists and economic factors that support crime and terrorism.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_13.txt
(a / address-02
      :ARG0 (w / workshop)
      :ARG1 (i / include-91
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (l / lead-03
                        :ARG0 (p / political)
                        :ARG2 (t2 / terror))
                  :op2 (r2 / role
                        :poss-of (r3 / religion)
                        :purpose (f / fight-01
                              :ARG1 (t5 / terrorist)))
                  :op3 (s2 / support-01
                        :ARG0 (f2 / factor
                              :mod (e / economic))
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (c / crime)
                              :op2 (t4 / terrorism))))
            :ARG2 (i2 / issue
                  :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                        :ARG2 (t / terrorism))
                  :quant (s / several))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.14 ::date 2013-05-08T13:29:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The workshop will study the use of the Internet to promote terrorism and the Internet's role in facilitating money transactions and funding terrorist groups.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_14.txt
(s / study-01
      :ARG0 (w / workshop)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (i / internet)
                  :ARG2 (p / promote-02
                        :ARG1 (t / terrorism)))
            :op2 (r / role
                  :poss-of (i2 / internet)
                  :purpose (f / facilitate-01
                        :ARG0 i2
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (t2 / transact-01
                                    :mod (m / money))
                              :op2 (f2 / fund-01
                                    :ARG1 (g / group
                                          :consist-of (t4 / terrorist))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162.15 ::date 2013-05-08T13:37:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt In April 1998 Arab countries signed an anti-terrorism agreement that binds the signatories to coordinate to fight terrorism.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020105_0162_15.txt
(s / sign-02
      :ARG0 (c / country
            :mod (e / ethnic-group :name (n / name :op1 "Arab")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / agree-01
            :topic (a / anti-terrorism
                  :ARG0-of (b / bind-01
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG2 (c2 / coordinate-01
                              :ARG1 c
                              :purpose (f / fight-01
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :ARG1 (t / terrorism))))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1998 :month 4))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.4 ::date 2013-05-02T13:44:27 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt A United Nation nuclear team will make a week-long visit to North Korea this weekend to inspect the Stalinist state's controversial nuclear site.
# ::save-date Thu May 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_4.txt
(v / visit-01
  :ARG0 (t / team
          :mod (n / nucleus)
          :employed-by (o / organization
                         :name (n2 / name
                                 :op1 "United"
                                 :op2 "Nations")))
  :ARG1 (c / country
          :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "North"
                  :op2 "Korea"))
  :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity
              :unit (w / week)
              :quant 1)
  :time (w2 / weekend
          :mod (t3 / this))
  :purpose (i / inspect-01
             :ARG0 t
             :ARG1 (s / site
                     :mod n
                     :poss (s2 / state
                             :manner (p / person
                                       :name (n4 / name
                                               :op1 "Stalin")))
                     :mod (c2 / controversy))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.5 ::date 2013-05-02T14:04:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Government sources said on January 7, 2002 that a united nation nuclear team will make a week-long visit to North Korea this weekend to inspect the Stalinist state's controversial nuclear site.
# ::save-date Thu May 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_5.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (s2 / source
          :mod (g / government-organization
                 :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))
  :ARG1 (v / visit-01
          :ARG0 (t / team
                  :mod (n / nucleus)
                  :employed-by (o / organization
                                 :name (n2 / name
                                         :op1 "United"
                                         :op2 "Nations")))
          :ARG1 (c / country
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "North"
                          :op2 "Korea"))
          :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity
                      :unit (w / week)
                      :quant 1)
          :time (w2 / weekend
                  :mod (t3 / this))
          :purpose (i / inspect-01
                     :ARG0 t
                     :ARG1 (s3 / site
                             :mod n
                             :mod (c2 / controversy)
                             :poss (s4 / state
                                     :manner (p / person
                                               :name (n4 / name
                                                       :op1 "Stalin"))))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2002
          :month 1
          :day 7))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.6 ::date 2013-05-28T22:19:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred
# ::snt The upcoming visit is viewed as part of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) drive to clarify North Korea's nuclear ambitions.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_6.txt
(v / view-02
  :ARG1 (v2 / visit-01
          :ARG1-of (c / come-01))
  :ARG2 (p / part
          :part-of (d / drive-02
                     :ARG0 (o / organization
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "International"
                                     :op2 "Atomic"
                                     :op3 "Energy"
                                     :op4 "Agency"))
                     :ARG2 (c2 / clarify-01
                             :ARG0 o
                             :ARG1 (a / ambition
                                     :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                                     :poss (c3 / country
                                             :name (n3 / name
                                                     :op1 "North"
                                                     :op2 "Korea")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.7 ::date 2013-05-09T12:30:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt A government source stated the visit by a group of IAEA safety experts is scheduled to last for a week beginning January 12, 2002.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_7.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / source
            :mod (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))
      :ARG1 (s3 / schedule-01
            :ARG1 (v / visit-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                              :ARG2 (s4 / safe-41))
                        :employed-by (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "IAEA"))))
            :ARG2 (l / last-01
                  :ARG1 v
                  :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (w / week)
                        :ARG1-of (b / begin-01
                              :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 1 :day 12))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.8 ::date 2013-05-09T12:42:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The source stated that the inspection would focus on an isotope production laboratory in the Yongbyon nuclear complex which is north of North Korea's capital Pyongyang.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_8.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (s2 / source)
  :ARG1 (f / focus-01
          :ARG0 (i / inspect-01)
          :ARG2 (l / laboratory
                  :ARG0-of (p / produce-01
                             :ARG1 (i2 / isotope))
                  :location (c / complex
                              :mod (n / nucleus)
                              :mod (c2 / county
                                     :name (n2 / name
                                             :op1 "Yongbyon"))
                              :location (r / relative-position
                                          :op1 (c3 / capital
                                                 :name (n3 / name
                                                         :op1 "Pyongyang")
                                                 :poss (c4 / country
                                                         :name (n5 / name
                                                                 :op1 "North"
                                                                 :op2 "Korea")))
                                          :direction (n4 / north))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.9 ::date 2013-05-09T13:07:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The IAEA tour of the isotope production laboratory will unlikely give a full picture of North Korea's suspected nuclear weapons ambitions.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_9.txt
(l / likely
  :polarity -
  :domain (g / give-01
            :ARG0 (t / tour-01
                    :ARG0 (o / organization
                            :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "IAEA"))
                    :ARG1 (l2 / laboratory
                            :ARG0-of (p / produce-01
                                       :ARG1 (i / isotope))))
            :ARG1 (p2 / picture
                    :mod (f / full)
                    :consist-of (a / ambition
                                  :mod (w / weapon
                                         :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                  :ARG1-of (s / suspect-01)
                                  :poss (c / country
                                          :name (n3 / name
                                                  :op1 "North"
                                                  :op2 "Korea"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.10 ::date 2013-05-28T22:41:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred
# ::snt The tour was a surprise offer made by North Korea in November 2001.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_10.txt
(t / thing
  :ARG1-of (o / offer-01
             :ARG0 (c / country
                     :name (n / name
                             :op1 "North"
                             :op2 "Korea"))
             :time (d / date-entity
                     :year 2001
                     :month 11))
  :ARG0-of (s / surprise-01)
  :domain (t2 / tour-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.11 ::date 2013-05-09T13:56:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt IAEA accepted North Korea's proposal last month but cautioned that the proposal is not a breakthrough.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_11.txt
(c / contrast-01
  :ARG1 (a / accept-01
          :ARG0 (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "IAEA"))
          :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p / propose-01
                             :ARG0 (c2 / country
                                     :name (n2 / name
                                             :op1 "North"
                                             :op2 "Korea"))))
          :time (m / month
                  :mod (l / last)))
  :ARG2 (c3 / caution-01
          :ARG0 o
          :ARG1 (b / breakthrough-01
                  :domain t
                  :polarity -)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.12 ::date 2013-05-09T14:39:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt IAEA also stated the lab is not one of the frozen facilities it wants to look into.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "IAEA"))
      :ARG1 (i / include-91 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (l / lab)
            :ARG2 (f / facility
                  :ARG1-of (f2 / freeze-01)
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / look-01
                        :ARG0 o
                        :ARG1-of (w / want-01
                              :ARG0 o)))
            :ARG3 (o2 / one))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.13 ::date 2013-05-02T14:49:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt IAEA is based in Vienna and is the UN's nuclear supervisor.
# ::save-date Thu May 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_13.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (b / base-01
         :ARG1 (o / organization
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "IAEA"))
         :location (c / city
                     :name (n2 / name
                             :op1 "Vienna")))
  :op2 (s / supervise-01
         :ARG0 o
         :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "UN"))
         :topic (n4 / nucleus)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.14 ::date 2013-05-02T14:57:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt North Korea has denied the IAEA full access to its facilities.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_14.txt
(d / deny-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "North"
                  :op2 "Korea"))
  :ARG1 (a / access-01
          :ARG0 o
          :ARG1 (f / facility
                  :poss c)
          :mod (f2 / full))
  :ARG2 (o / organization
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "IAEA")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520.15 ::date 2013-05-09T15:02:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt North Korea froze its suspected nuclear weapons program at Yongbyon in exchange for receiving two nuclear reactors producing less weapons-grade plutonium under a 1994 accord with the United States.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020106_0520_15.txt
(e / exchange-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "North"
                  :op2 "Korea"))
  :ARG1 (f / freeze-01
          :ARG0 c
          :ARG1 (p / program
                  :mod (w / weapons
                         :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                  :location (c2 / county
                              :name (n3 / name
                                      :op1 "Yongbyon"))
                  :ARG1-of (s / suspect-01)))
  :ARG3 (r / receive-01
          :ARG0 c
          :ARG1 (r2 / reactor
                  :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                  :quant 2
                  :ARG0-of (p2 / produce-01
                             :ARG1 (p3 / plutonium
                                     :mod (w2 / weapons-grade)
                                     :degree (l / less))))
          :prep-under (a / accord
                        :time (d / date-entity
                                :year 1994)
                        :prep-with (c3 / country
                                     :name (n5 / name
                                             :op1 "United"
                                             :op2 "States")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020111_0093.29 ::date 2013-05-09T07:12:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020111_0093_29.txt

  :ARG0 (g / group
          :mod (a / another))
  :ARG1 (a2 / and
          :op1 (l / launch-01
                 :ARG0 g
                 :ARG1 (a3 / association
                         :consist-of (p / person
                                       :quant (a4 / around
                                                :op1 100)
                                       :ARG0-of (o / own-01
                                                  :ARG1 (r / restaurant
                                                          :mod (m / meat
                                                                 :consist-of (d2 / dog))))
                                       :location (r2 / region
                                                   :name (n2 / name
                                                           :op1 "Seoul"))))
                 :time (d / date-entity
                         :weekday (m2 / monday)
                         :mod (n / next)))
          :op2 (h / hold-04
                 :ARG0 g
                 :ARG1 (s2 / seminar
                         :ARG0-of (p2 / promote-02

                  :manner (a2 / any
                        :op1 (w / way)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020115_0320.16 ::date 2013-05-29T00:18:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020115_0320_16.txt

          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Tariq"
                  :op2 "Jamil"))

          :ARG0 p
          :ARG1 (a / available
                  :domain (l / literature
                            :ARG1-of (b / ban-01))
                  :mod (s2 / still)
                  :location (m / market)
                  :mode interrogative
                  :concession b)))

  :consist-of (m / militant
                :mod (h / hardline))

             :ARG1 (r / rule-03

          :op1 (n2 / newspaper)

                                                               :name (n4 / name
                                                                       :op1 "Islam")))))))
  :mod (a / also))

            :mod (a3 / anti-drug)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.6 ::date 2013-05-09T10:17:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt On January 17, 2002 a state radio reported that thirteen drug traffickers were killed and 10 arrested in Iran anti-drug sweeps.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_6.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (r2 / radio
            :mod (s / state))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person :quant 13
                        :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG1 (d / drug))))
            :op2 (a2 / arrest-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 10
                        :ARG0-of t))
            :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :instrument (s2 / sweep
                  :mod (a3 / anti-drug)))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 1 :day 17))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.7 ::date 2013-05-29T01:15:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred
# ::snt The Iranian army launched a huge sweep against traffickers along the borders with Afghanistan and Pakistan.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_7.txt
(l / launch-01
      :ARG0 (a / army
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :ARG1 (s / sweep-01
            :ARG0 a
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00))
            :mod (h / huge)
            :location (a3 / along
                  :op1 (l2 / location
                        :ARG2-of (b2 / border-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                                    :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.8 ::date 2013-05-09T10:22:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The radio said the first day of Val Fajr accumulated more than four tons of drugs and 50 guns in southeast Iran on January 16, 2002.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_8.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (r / radio)
      :ARG1 (a / accumulate-01
            :ARG0 (d / day
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                  :part-of (e / event :name (n / name :op1 "Val" :op2 "Fajr")))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / drug
                        :quant (m / more-than
                              :op1 (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 4
                                    :unit (t / ton))))
                  :op2 (g / gun :quant 50))
            :location (s2 / southeast
                  :part-of (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))
            :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 1 :day 16)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.9 ::date 2013-05-09T10:32:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Val Fajr means swear to victory in Arabic and is a phrase from the Koran.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_9.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (m / mean-01
         :ARG0 (n / name
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Val"
                         :op2 "Fajr"))
         :ARG1 (s / swear-01
                 :ARG1 (v / victory)
                 :prep-in (l / language
                            :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Arabic"))))
  :op2 (p / phrase
         :domain n
         :source (b / book
                   :name (n4 / name
                           :op1 "The"
                           :op2 "Koran"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.10 ::date 2013-05-09T10:41:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt In December 2002 police announced than an armed corps with Afghanistan, Pakistan and Turkmenistan was being assembled specifically to combat drug trafficking along Iran's borders.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_10.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (p / police)
      :ARG1 (a2 / assemble-02
            :ARG1 (c / corps
                  :ARG1-of (a3 / arm-01)
                  :accompanier (a4 / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
                        :op3 (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Turkmenistan"))))
            :purpose (c5 / combat-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d2 / drug)
                        :location (a5 / along
                              :op1 (b / border
                                    :poss (c6 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran")))))
                  :mod (s / specific)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 12))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.11 ::date 2013-05-09T10:46:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran is a major transit point between drug producers in Afghanistan and Pakistan and the markets of Europe and the Gulf.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_11.txt
(p / point
  :mod (t / transit
         :mod (m / major))
  :domain (c / country
            :name (n / name
                    :op1 "Iran"))
  :location (b / between
              :op1 (a / and
                     :op1 (p2 / person
                            :ARG0-of (p3 / produce-01
                                       :ARG1 (d / drug))
                            :location (a2 / and
                                        :op1 (c2 / country
                                               :name (n2 / name
                                                       :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                                        :op2 (c3 / country
                                               :name (n3 / name
                                                       :op1 "Pakistan")))))
              :op2 (m2 / market
                     :location (a3 / and
                                 :op1 (c4 / continent
                                        :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Europe"))
                                 :op2 (r / region
                                        :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "the"
                                                :op2 "Gulf"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.12 ::date 2013-05-09T10:51:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Parliament approved plans in May 2001 to build an anti-drugs wall along the 925-kilometre (560-mile) border with Afghanistan.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_12.txt
(a / approve-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Parliament"))
      :ARG1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG1 (b / build-01
                  :ARG1 (w / wall
                        :purpose (o / oppose-01
                              :ARG1 (d4 / drug))
                        :location (a3 / along
                              :op1 (b2 / border
                                    :op1 (d / distance-quantity :quant 925
                                          :unit (k / kilometer))
                                    :op2 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 560
                                          :unit (m / mile))
                                    :prep-with (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))))))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :month 05 :year 2001))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.13 ::date 2013-05-09T10:56:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt A budget was allocated for the barrier to be equipped with electronic detention equipment.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_13.txt
(a / allocate-01
  :ARG1 (b / budget)
  :ARG2 (e / equip-01
          :ARG1 (b2 / barrier)
          :ARG2 (e2 / equipment
                  :purpose (d / detain-01)
                  :mod (e3 / electronic))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.14 ::date 2013-05-09T10:58:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_14.txt

      :ARG0 (t / television
            :source (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
      :ARG1 (b / ban-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :mod (i / interim)
                  :ARG0-of (a / administrate-01
                        :ARG1 c))
            :ARG1 (c3 / cultivate-01
                  :ARG1 (p / poppy
                        :mod (o / opium)))
            :purpose (e / end-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d2 / drug))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 1 :day 16))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.15 ::date 2013-05-09T11:08:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt In July 2000 the Taliban militia also banned production of opium.
# ::save-date Mon May 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_15.txt
(b / ban-01
  :ARG0 (m / military
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Taliban"
                  :op2 "militia"))
  :ARG1 (p / produce-01
          :ARG1 (o / opium))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2000
          :month 7)
  :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.16 ::date 2013-05-09T11:09:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Opium is the raw ingredient for heroin.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_16.txt
(i / ingredient
  :purpose (h / heroin)
  :domain (o / opium)
  :mod (r / raw))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.17 ::date 2013-05-09T11:11:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The ban was strictly enforced with opium production decreasing from 3,200 tons to 185 tons.
# ::save-date Thu May 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_17.txt
(e / enforce-01
  :ARG1 (b / ban-01)
  :manner (s / strict)
  :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
             :ARG1 (d / decrease-01
                     :ARG1 (p / produce-01
                             :ARG1 (o / opium))
                     :ARG3 (m / mass-quantity
                             :unit (t / ton)
                             :quant 3200)
                     :ARG4 (w2 / weight-quantuty
                             :unit (t2 / ton)
                             :quant 185))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.18 ::date 2013-05-09T11:18:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghan farmers resumed growing opium poppies after the militia was overthrown in December 2001.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270_18.txt
(r / resume-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (f / farm-01)
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
      :ARG1 (g / grow-03
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (p2 / poppy
                  :mod (o / opium)))
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (o2 / overthrow-01
                  :ARG1 (m / militia)
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2001 :month 12))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020117_0270.19 ::date 2013-05-09T11:22:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (l / law
          :source (c / country
                    :name (n / name
                            :op1 "Iran")))
  :ARG1 (p / penalize-01
          :ARG0 l
          :ARG2 (t / trafficking
                  :mod (d / drug))
          :manner (d2 / die-01)))

  :ARG1 (p / policeman
          :quant (m / more-than
                   :op1 3000))
  :cause (r / raid-01
           :purpose (a / anti-drug))
  :time (p2 / past
          :op1 (y / year
                 :quant 20)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.2 ::date 2013-05-18T13:46:53 ::snt-type country ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

      :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))

# ::save-date Sat May 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_3.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (n / narcotic)
  :op2 (m / military))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.4 ::date 2013-05-18T13:47:43 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Iranian army arrests 1600 drug traffickers, kills 21, and seizes 6 tons of drugs and weapons in large-scale operation along its borders with Afghanistan and Pakistan.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_4.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (a2 / arrest-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / army
                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran")))
            :ARG1 (p / person :quant 1600
                  :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d / drug))))
      :op2 (k / kill-01
            :ARG0 a3
            :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 21))
      :op3 (s / seize-01
            :ARG0 a3
            :ARG1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 6
                  :unit (t2 / ton)
                  :domain (a4 / and
                        :op1 (d2 / drug)
                        :op2 (w / weapon))))
      :time (o / operation
            :mod (l / large-scale)
            :location (a6 / along
                  :op1 (b / border-01
                        :ARG1 (a5 / and
                              :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                              :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
                        :ARG2 c))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.5 ::date 2013-05-18T13:59:10 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The Government has banned cultivation of opium poppies and plans to build a wall along its border in an attempt to end drug trafficking.
# ::save-date Sat May 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_5.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (b / ban-01
         :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                 :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
         :ARG1 (c / cultivate-01
                 :ARG1 (p / poppy
                         :mod (o / opium))))
  :op2 (p2 / plan-01
         :ARG0 g
         :ARG1 (b2 / build-01
                 :ARG0 g
                 :ARG1 (w / wall
                         :location (a2 / along
                                     :op1 (b3 / border
                                            :part-of g)))
                 :purpose (a3 / attempt-01
                            :ARG0 g
                            :ARG1 (e / end-01
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
                                            :ARG1 (d / drug)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.6 ::date 2013-05-18T14:05:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran's state news agency IRNA reported 23 January 2002 that Iranian security forces killed 21 drug traffickers and arrested more than 1600 in operations in the east and south of Iran in recent days.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_6.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (a / agency :name (n / name :op1 "IRNA")
            :mod (n2 / news)
            :poss (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran")))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG0 (f / force
                        :mod (s / security)
                        :employed-by c)
                  :ARG1 (p / person :quant 21
                        :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG1 (d / drug))))
            :op2 (a3 / arrest-01
                  :ARG0 f
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :quant (m / more-than :op1 1600)))
            :instrument (o / operation
                  :location (a4 / and
                        :op1 (e / east
                              :part-of c)
                        :op2 (s2 / south
                              :part-of c))
                  :time (r2 / recent
                        :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                              :unit (d3 / day)))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 1 :day 23))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.7 ::date 2013-05-18T14:13:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt IRNA stated that in the large-scale army operation along the eastern borders with Afghanistan and Pakistan 21 drug traffickers were killed, 1500 arrested and approximately 5 tons of drugs seized.
# ::save-date Sat May 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_7.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (c / company
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "IRNA"))
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (k / kill-01
                 :ARG1 (p / person
                         :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                                    :ARG1 (d / drug))
                         :quant 21))
          :op2 (a2 / arrest-01
                 :ARG1 (p2 / person
                         :quant 1500))
          :op3 (s2 / seize-01
                 :ARG1 (m / mass-quantity
                         :unit (t2 / ton)
                         :quant (a3 / approximate
                                  :op1 5)
                         :consist-of (d2 / drug)))
          :instrument (o / operation
                        :mod (a4 / army)
                        :mod (l / large-scale)
                        :location (a5 / along
                                    :op1 (b / border
                                           :location (a6 / and
                                                       :op1 (c2 / country
                                                              :name (n2 / name
                                                                      :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                                                       :op2 (c3 / country
                                                              :name (n3 / name
                                                                      :op1 "Pakistan")))
                                           :direction (e / east))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.8 ::date 2013-05-29T01:20:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-13 ::preferred
# ::snt IRNA stated that the 10-day-old operation would continue until all the traffickers were killed or arrested.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_8.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "IRNA"))
      :ARG1 (c / continue-01
            :ARG1 (o2 / operation
                  :age (t / temporal-quantity :quant 10
                        :unit (d / day)))
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 (o3 / or
                        :op1 (k / kill-01
                              :ARG1 (p / person
                                    :quant (a / all)
                                    :ARG0-of (t2 / traffic-00)))
                        :op2 (a2 / arrest-01
                              :ARG1 p)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.9 ::date 2013-05-18T14:30:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt In a separate dispatch IRNA stated that during the past 20 days in southern Iran's Fars Province police had arrested 107 drug traffickers including 11 foreign nationals.
# ::save-date Sat May 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_9.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (c / company
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "IRNA"))
  :ARG1 (a / arrest-01
          :ARG0 (p / police)
          :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                             :ARG1 (d2 / drug))
                  :quant 107
                  :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                             :ARG1 (n2 / national
                                     :mod (f / foreign)
                                     :quant 11)))
          :time (p3 / past
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                         :unit (d3 / day)
                         :quant 20))
          :location (p4 / province
                      :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Fars"
                              :op2 "Province")
                      :part-of (c2 / country
                                 :name (n4 / name
                                         :op1 "Iran")
                                 :mod (s3 / south))))
  :medium (d / dispatch
            :mod (s2 / separate)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.10 ::date 2013-05-18T14:38:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The nationalities of the foreigners were not mentioned.
# ::save-date Sat May 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_10.txt
(m / mention-01
  :ARG1 (n / nationality
          :poss (f / foreigner))
  :polarity -)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.11 ::date 2013-05-18T14:39:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt IRNA stated that approximately 1 ton of various drugs including hashish as well as fire arms were seized.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_11.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "IRNA"))
      :ARG1 (s2 / seize-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (m / mass-quantity
                        :unit (t / ton)
                        :consist-of (d / drug
                              :mod (v / various)
                              :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                                    :ARG1 (h / hashish)))
                        :quant (a2 / approximate :op1 1))
                  :op2 (f / fire-arm
                        :mod (a3 / as-well-as)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.12 ::date 2013-05-18T15:02:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran is a major transit point between drug producers in Afghanistan and Pakistan and the markets of Europe and the Gulf.
# ::save-date Sat May 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_12.txt
(p / point
  :location-of (t / transit-01
                 :mod (m / major))
  :location (b / between
              :op1 (p2 / person
                     :ARG0-of (p3 / produce-01
                                :ARG1 (d / drug))
                     :location (a / and
                                 :op1 (c / country
                                        :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                                 :op2 (c2 / country
                                        :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Pakistan"))))
              :op2 (m2 / market
                     :location (a2 / and
                                 :op1 (c3 / continent
                                        :name (n3 / name
                                                :op1 "Europe"))
                                 :op2 (w / world-region
                                        :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Gulf")))))
  :domain (c4 / country
            :name (n5 / name
                    :op1 "Iran")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.13 ::date 2013-05-18T15:10:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt In May 2001 the Iranian parliament approved plans to build a wall equipped with electronic detection devices along the 560-mile border with Afghanistan to deter drug trafficking.
# ::save-date Sat May 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334_13.txt
(a / approve-01
  :ARG0 (p / parliament
          :ARG0-of (g / govern-01
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "Iran"))))
  :ARG1 (p2 / plan-01
          :ARG1 (b / build-01
                  :ARG1 (w / wall
                          :ARG1-of (e / equip-01
                                     :ARG2 (d2 / device
                                             :ARG0-of (d3 / detect-01
                                                        :ARG1 (e2 / electronics))))
                          :location (a2 / along
                                      :op1 (b2 / border
                                             :location (c2 / country
                                                         :name (n2 / name
                                                                 :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                                             :extent (d4 / distance-quantity
                                                       :unit (m / mile)
                                                       :quant 560)))
                          :purpose (d5 / deter-01
                                     :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
                                             :ARG1 (d6 / drug))))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2001
          :month 5))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0334.14 ::date 2013-05-18T15:23:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

                  :mod (i / interim)

                        :mod (o / opium)))

                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (e / end-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG1 (d / drug)))))

            :mod (l / last)))

                         :quant 3200)
                 :ARG4 (m2 / mass-quantity
                         :unit (t2 / ton)
                         :quant 185))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0346.5 ::date 2013-05-13T14:54:21 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

          :ARG0 c3

                  :op1 (r / remain-01
                         :ARG1 c3
                         :ARG3 (r2 / realize-01
                                 :ARG0 c3

                  :op2 (u / update-01
                         :ARG0 c3

          :ARG3 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
          :manner (c4 / close)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0346.6 ::date 2013-05-13T15:25:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

          :op1 (d / date-entity
                 :year 2000)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0346.20 ::date 2013-05-14T15:13:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt A separate report issued recently by the U.S. government-funded research group computer science and telecommunications Board stated that cyber security needs considerable improvement.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0346_20.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (r / report
            :ARG1-of (i / issue-01
                  :ARG0 (r2 / research-group :name (n / name :op1 "computer" :op2 "science" :op3 "and" :op4 "telecommunications" :op5 "Board")
                        :ARG1-of (f / fund-01
                              :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "U.S."))))))
                  :time (r3 / recent))
            :mod (s2 / separate))
      :ARG1 (n3 / need-01
            :ARG0 (s3 / security
                  :mod (c2 / cyber))
            :ARG1 (i2 / improve-01
                  :ARG1 s3
                  :degree (c3 / considerable))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0346.21 ::date 2013-05-14T15:20:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt For example, according to a Canadian government estimate the love bug launched in May 2000 caused 6.7 billion U.S. dollars in damage and disrupted Canadian government systems.
# ::save-date Tue May 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020123_0346_21.txt
(s / say-01

          :source (g / government-organization
                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                               :ARG1 (c / country
                                       :name (n / name
                                               :op1 "Canada")))))
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (c2 / cause-01
                 :ARG0 (b / bug
                         :mod (l / love)
                         :ARG1-of (l2 / launch-01
                                    :time (d / date-entity
                                            :year 2000
                                            :month 5)))
                 :ARG1 (d2 / damage
                         :quant (m / monetary-quantity
                                  :unit (d3 / dollar
                                          :mod (c3 / country
                                                 :name (n2 / name
                                                         :op1 "U.S.")))
                                  :quant 6700000000)))
          :op2 (d4 / disrupt-01
                 :ARG0 b
                 :ARG1 (s2 / system
                         :poss (g3 / government-organization
                                 :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                                            :ARG1 (c4 / country
                                                    :name (n3 / name
                                                            :op1 "Canada")))))))
  :prep-for (e / example))

                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (f / further)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020128_0449.4 ::date 2013-05-15T07:23:19 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Russian space officials warn that power cuts against the military for non-payment of bills, like the one at a command center in the Far East Kamchatka Peninsula of the Russian Space Forces, could have catastrophic consequences.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020128_0449_4.txt
(w / warn-01
      :ARG0 (o / official
            :mod (s / space)
            :employed-by (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia")))
      :ARG1 (p / possible
            :domain (c2 / consequence
                  :mod (c3 / catastrophic)
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (c5 / cut-02
                              :ARG1 (p2 / power)
                              :ARG1-of (c6 / cause-01
                                    :ARG0 (p3 / pay-01 :polarity -
                                          :ARG0 (m / military)
                                          :ARG3 (b / bill-01
                                                :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                                                      :ARG2 (b2 / bill-01 :quant 1
                                                            :location (c7 / center
                                                                  :purpose (c8 / command-02
                                                                        :ARG1 (m2 / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russian" :op2 "Space" :op3 "Forces")))
                                                                  :location (p4 / peninsula :name (n3 / name :op1 "Far" :op2 "East" :op3 "Kamchatka" :op4 "Peninsula"))))))))
                              :prep-against m)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020128_0449.5 ::date 2013-05-15T07:35:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt 28 January 2002 -- Russian space officials warned that power cuts against the military for non-payment of bills could have catastrophic consequences.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020128_0449_5.txt
(w / warn-01
      :ARG0 (o / official
            :mod (s / space)
            :employed-by (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia")))
      :ARG1 (p / possible
            :domain (c2 / consequence
                  :mod (c3 / catastrophic)
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (c5 / cut-02
                              :ARG1 (p2 / power-01)
                              :ARG1-of (c6 / cause-01
                                    :ARG0 (p3 / pay-01 :polarity -
                                          :ARG0 (m / military)
                                          :ARG3 (b / bill-01)))
                              :prep-against m))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 28 :month 01 :year 2002))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.4 ::date 2013-07-11T08:14:54 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt An Australian jury found that an Uzbekistan Olympic boxing official was defamed in a book about alleged Olympic corruption in which he was depicted as a major international heroin dealer and racketeer.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053_4.txt
(f / find-02
      :ARG0 (j / jury
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Australia")))
      :ARG1 (d / defame-01
            :ARG0 (b / book
                  :ARG0-of (d2 / depict-01
                        :ARG1 o
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (p / person
                                    :ARG0-of (d3 / deal-01
                                          :ARG1 (h / heroin)))
                              :op2 (r / racketeer)
                              :mod (m / major)
                              :mod (i / international)))
                  :topic (c4 / corrupt-01
                        :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "Olympic"))
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / allege-01)))
            :ARG1 (o / official
                  :mod (b2 / boxing
                        :mod (e3 / event :name (n5 / name :op1 "Olymipic")))
                  :mod (c3 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Uzbekistan")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.5 ::date 2013-06-05T11:13:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt A New South Wales Supreme Court jury took just over 2 hours on 020201 to find Gafur Rakhimov had been libelled in a book the Great Olympic swindle which alleges Olympic corruption.
# ::save-date Wed Jun 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053_5.txt
(t2 / take-01
  :ARG0 (j / jury
          :location (s / state
                      :name (n / name
                              :op1 "New"
                              :op2 "South"
                              :op3 "Wales"))
          :mod (g / government-organization
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Supreme"
                         :op2 "Court")))
  :ARG1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
          :unit (h2 / hour)
          :quant (o2 / over
                   :op1 2
                   :mod (j2 / just)))
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :year 2002
          :month 2
          :day 1)
  :purpose (f / find-02
             :ARG0 j
             :ARG1 (l / libel-01
                     :ARG0 (b / book
                             :name (n3 / name
                                     :op1 "The"
                                     :op2 "Great"
                                     :op3 "Olympic"
                                     :op4 "Swindle")
                             :ARG0-of (a / allege-01
                                        :ARG1 (c / corrupt-01
                                                :ARG1 (o3 / olympics))))
                     :ARG1 (p / person
                             :name (n4 / name
                                     :op1 "Gafur"
                                     :op2 "Rakhimov")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.6 ::date 2013-06-05T11:13:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Jun 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053_6.txt

  :op1 (o / official
         :mod (b / boxing
                :mod (o2 / olympic))
         :mod (c / country
                :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Uzbekistan"))
         :domain (p / person
                   :name (n2 / name
                           :op1 "Gafur"
                           :op2 "Rakhimov")))
  :op2 (d / depict-01
         :ARG0 (b2 / book)
         :ARG1 p
         :ARG2 (a2 / and
                 :op1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (d2 / deal-01
                                   :ARG1 (h / heroin)))
                 :op2 (r / racketeer)
                 :mod (m / major)
                 :mod (i / international))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.7 ::date 2013-06-05T11:42:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The Great Olympic swindle was written by British journalist Andrew Jennings and published by Simon and Schuster.
# ::save-date Wed Jun 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053_7.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (w / write-01
         :ARG0 (j / journalist
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Andrew"
                         :op2 "Jennings")
                 :mod (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                                :op1 "Britain")))
         :ARG1 (b / book
                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "The"
                         :op2 "Great"
                         :op3 "Olympic"
                         :op4 "Swindle")))
  :op2 (p / publish-01
         :ARG0 (c2 / company
                 :name (n4 / name
                         :op1 "Simon"
                         :op2 "and"
                         :op3 "Schuster"))
         :ARG1 b))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.8 ::date 2013-06-05T12:00:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The Rakhimov case will now go to a single judge to hear defences and decide any damages to be awarded to Rakhimov.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053_8.txt
(g / go-01
      :ARG1 (c / case
            :mod (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Rakhimov")))
      :ARG4 (p2 / person
            :quant (s / single)
            :ARG0-of (h / hear-01
                  :ARG1 (d / defense))
            :ARG0-of (d2 / decide-01
                  :ARG1 (d3 / damage
                        :mod (a / any)
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / award-01
                              :ARG2 p)))
            :ARG0-of (j / judge-01))
      :time (n2 / now))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.9 ::date 2013-06-05T12:07:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The Great Olympic swindle implied that Gafur Rakhimov had been engaged in fraud, prostitution, assassination, gun running and plutonium smuggling.
# ::save-date Wed Jun 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053_9.txt
(i / imply-01
  :ARG0 (b / book
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "Great"
                  :op3 "Olympic"
                  :op4 "Swindle"))
  :ARG1 (e / engage-01
          :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Gafur"
                          :op2 "Rakhimov"))
          :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (d / defraud-01)
                  :op2 (p2 / prostitute-01)
                  :op3 (a2 / assassinate-01)
                  :op4 (r / run-08
                         :ARG1 (g / gun))
                  :op5 (s / smuggle-01
                         :ARG1 (p3 / plutonium)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.10 ::date 2013-06-05T12:16:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The book also implied that the businessman was a gangster in the Soviet black economy and had traded sporting medals for bribes.
# ::save-date Wed Jun 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053_10.txt
(i / imply-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.14 ::date 2013-06-05T13:01:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

                  :day 1))

                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "Rakhimov"))

                             :mod (l / last))

                                                    :op2 "Broadcasting"
                                                    :op3 "Corporation"))

                                                    :op1 "Sydney"
                                                    :op2 "Morning"

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020201_0053.15 ::date 2013-06-05T13:25:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (i / imply-01
            :ARG0 (p / program :name (n2 / name :op1 "Four" :op2 "Corners")
                  :topic (a / affair
                        :mod (c3 / current))
                  :mod (f2 / flagship)
                  :poss c2)
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (k / know-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Rakhimov"))
                        :ARG1 (c4 / criminal
                              :mod (d / dangerous
                                    :degree (m / most))
                              :location (w / world)
                              :quant (s / some)))
                  :op2 (s2 / suspect-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "FBI"))
                        :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 (d2 / drug))
                        :ARG2 p2)))
      :topic (c / case
            :ARG2-of (i2 / involve-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / company :name (n / name :op1 "ABC")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020210_0074.18 ::date 2013-05-20T15:11:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (t / traffic-00

            :degree (s2 / so

                        :ARG1 (p / possible :polarity -
                              :domain (u / uncover-01
                                    :ARG1 t))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020210_0074.19 ::date 2013-05-20T15:16:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Drug trafficking from Afghanistan resumed during a brief hiatus in the anti-terrorist operation.
# ::save-date Mon May 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020210_0074_19.txt
(r / resume-01
      :ARG1 (t / trafficking
            :mod (d / drug)
            :source (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
      :time (d2 / during
            :op1 (h / hiatus
                  :mod (b / brief)
                  :part-of (o / operation
                        :mod (a / anti-terrorist)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020210_0074.20 ::date 2013-05-20T15:21:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon May 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020210_0074_20.txt

      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / agency
                  :ARG0-of (e / enforce-01
                        :ARG1 (l / law))
                  :source (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Tajikistan")))
            :op2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (g / guard-01
                        :ARG1 (b / border))
                  :source (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))))
      :ARG1 (i / include-91
            :ARG1 (h / heroin
                  :quant (m / mass-quantity
                        :unit (t / ton :quant 4.2)))
            :ARG2 (d2 / drug
                  :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 8.8
                        :unit (t2 / ton))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2001))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020210_0074.21 ::date 2013-05-20T15:44:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon May 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020210_0074_21.txt
(r / represent-01
      :ARG0 (t / this)
      :ARG1 (i / increase-01
            :ARG2 (p / percentage-entity :value 26)
            :ARG4 (a / amount
                  :consist-of (h / heroin)
                  :mod (t2 / times :quant 3))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2001)
            :mod (o / overall)))

  :op2 (f / false)

                    :op1 (l / lord

                  :degree (v / very))

                        :ARG1 (p2 / poppy))

            :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                  :ARG1 (d / drug)))
      :degree (s2 / strong))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020301_0316.22 ::date 2013-06-09T13:08:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (r / responsible-41
            :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (o / opium
                        :quant (p3 / percentage-entity :value 75)
                        :poss (w / world))
                  :op2 (h / heroin
                        :quant (p4 / percentage-entity :value 80)
                        :ARG1-of (t2 / trade-01
                              :manner (l / legal :polarity -)
                              :location (c3 / continent :name (n2 / name :op1 "Europe")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020301_0316.23 ::date 2013-06-09T13:14:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Approximately 11000 Russian guards patrol the 1200-kilometre (750-mile) border between Russia and Afghanistan under a 1992 agreement signed by Moscow and Dushanbe.
# ::save-date Sun Jun 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020301_0316_23.txt
(p / patrol-01
  :ARG0 (g / guard
          :mod (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Russia"))
          :quant (a2 / approximately
                   :op1 11000))
  :ARG1 (b / border
          :quant (d4 / distance-quantity
                   :quant 1200
                   :unit (k2 / kilometer))
          :quant (d / distance-quantity
                   :quant 750
                   :unit (m2 / mile))
          :location (b2 / between
                      :op1 c
                      :op2 (c2 / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Afghanistan"))))
  :prep-under (a / agreement
                :time (d2 / date-entity
                        :year 1992)
                :ARG1-of (s / sign-02
                           :ARG0 (a3 / and
                                   :op1 (c3 / city
                                          :name (n3 / name
                                                  :op1 "Moscow"))
                                   :op2 (c4 / city
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                  :op1 "Dushanbe"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.4 ::date 2013-05-21T09:12:03 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt South Korea's defense ministry under attack in parliament over allegations it is favoring U.S. company Boeing for multi-billion-dollar fighter project.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028_4.txt
(a / attack-01
      :ARG1 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Defense" :op2 "Ministry")
            :poss (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
      :location (g2 / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Parliament"))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / allege-01
                  :ARG1 (f / favor-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (c2 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Boeing")
                              :source (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "U.S.")))
                        :purpose (p / project
                              :mod (a3 / aircraft
                                    :ARG0-of (f2 / fight-01))
                              :mod (m / monetary-quantity
                                    :unit (d / dollar)
                                    :quant (m2 / multi-billion)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.5 ::date 2013-05-21T09:16:55 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Newspaper reports reveal that French-made plane was rated higher in air force evaluations and that the Government is instead responding to political pressure from the U.S. and Boeing.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028_5.txt
(r / reveal-01
      :ARG0 (r2 / report-01
            :ARG0 (n / newspaper))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (r3 / rate-01
                  :ARG0 (e / evaluate-01
                        :ARG1 (m / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "air" :op2 "force")))
                  :ARG1 (p / plane
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / make-01
                              :ARG0 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France"))))
                  :ARG2 (h / high
                        :degree (m3 / more)))
            :op2 (r4 / respond-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / pressure-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "U.S."))
                              :op2 (c3 / company :name (n5 / name :op1 "Boeing")))
                        :ARG1 g
                        :mod (p3 / political))
                  :mod (i / instead))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.8 ::date 2013-05-21T09:45:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

                              :ARG0-of (f / fight-01)))

                        :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 3200000000

                                    :mod (c3 / country :name (n / name :op1 "U.S."))))))
            :ARG2 (a2 / award-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / contract-02
                        :ARG1 (m2 / military)
                        :location (i2 / international)
                        :mod (i3 / important
                              :degree (m3 / most)))
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (t / this)))
            :ARG3 (o2 / one))
      :ARG2 (e / encounter-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (o / obstacle
                  :quant (m4 / multiple))))

                              :ARG0 (p2 / person :quant 4
                                    :ARG0-of (b / bid-01))))
                  :ARG2 (h / high
                        :degree (t2 / too)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.11 ::date 2013-05-21T18:41:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :degree (m / much)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.16 ::date 2013-05-21T19:14:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

                  :ARG0 (c / chief
                        :mod (d / defense))

                        :ARG0 g

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.20 ::date 2013-05-21T19:24:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (r / report-01

                  :ARG1 (e2 / excellent
                        :domain (a / aircraft-type :name (n4 / name :op1 "Rafale"))
                        :manner (c / category
                              :quant (a2 / all))))
            :quant (n2 / numerous))
      :ARG1 (g / government-organization :name (n5 / name :op1 "Defense" :op2 "Ministry"))
      :degree (f / further))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.21 ::date 2013-05-21T19:29:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Newspapers stated that the F-15 k was rated excellent in reliability and support combat capability but met only 30 percent of core technology requirements.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028_21.txt

      :ARG0 (n / newspaper)
      :ARG1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (r / rate-01
                  :ARG1 (a / aircraft-type :name (n2 / name :op1 "F-15" :op2 "k"))
                  :ARG2 (e / excellent)
                  :topic (a2 / and
                        :op1 (r2 / reliable)
                        :op2 (c2 / capable-41
                              :ARG1 a
                              :ARG2 (s2 / support-01
                                    :ARG0 a
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / combat-01)))))
            :ARG2 (m / meet-01
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (i / include-91
                        :ARG2 (r3 / require-01
                              :ARG1 (t / technology
                                    :mod (c4 / core)))
                        :ARG3 (p / percentage-entity :value 30
                              :mod (o / only))))))

                        :op2 (r2 / reliable)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.23 ::date 2013-05-22T08:47:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

                  :degree (m / more))

                  :op1 (t2 / transfer-01
                        :ARG1 (t3 / technology))
                  :op2 (s / subcontract-01)))
      :ARG1-of (r / report-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.25 ::date 2013-05-22T08:59:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
