                  :mod (j / just))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.26 ::date 2013-05-22T09:01:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Some analysts have stated that the study method is biased toward Boeing noting that the evaluation was revised in February 2002 to ensure that all 4 bidders would receive an automatic 60 points for technology transfer.
# ::save-date Wed May 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028_26.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (a / analyst
            :quant (s2 / some)
            :ARG0-of (n2 / note-01
                  :ARG1 (r / revise-01
                        :ARG1 (e / evaluate-01)
                        :ARG2 (e2 / ensure-01
                              :ARG1 (r2 / receive-01
                                    :ARG0 (c2 / company :quant 4
                                          :mod (a2 / all)
                                          :ARG0-of (b2 / bid-01))
                                    :ARG1 (p / point :quant 60
                                          :mod (a3 / automatic))
                                    :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                                          :ARG0 (t / transfer-01
                                                :ARG0 c2
                                                :ARG1 (t2 / technology)))))
                        :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 2))))
      :ARG1 (b / bias-01
            :ARG1 (m / method
                  :part-of (s3 / study-01))
            :beneficiary (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Boeing"))))

            :mod (l / language :name (n4 / name :op1 "English")))
      :ARG1 (g / give-01
            :ARG0 (r / revise-01
                  :mod (t3 / this))
            :ARG1 (a / advantage)
            :ARG2 (c / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Boeing")
                  :mod (r2 / reluctant
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (t / transfer-01
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                                          :mod (c3 / core))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.28 ::date 2013-05-22T09:15:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The Korea Herald stated that when evaluators were conducting their first-stage reports the ministry ordered them to give each bidder grades within a range of 60 to 100 points instead of 0 to 100 points.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028_28.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (n / newspaper :name (n2 / name :op1 "Korea" :op2 "Herald"))
      :ARG1 (o / order-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "ministry"))
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (e / evaluate-01))
            :ARG2 (g2 / give-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (g3 / grade-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG2 (r / range-01
                              :ARG3 (p2 / point :quant 60)
                              :ARG4 (p3 / point :quant 100)
                              :prep-instead-of (r2 / range-01
                                    :ARG3 (p4 / point :quant 0)
                                    :ARG4 p3)))
                  :ARG2 (c / company
                        :quant (e2 / each)
                        :ARG0-of (b / bid-01)))
            :time (c2 / conduct-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :mod (f / first-stage)
                        :poss p
                        :ARG1-of (r3 / report-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020304_0028.29 ::date 2013-05-22T09:25:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (n / newspaper :name (n2 / name :op1 "Korea" :op2 "Herald"))

            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (c / criticize-01))
            :ARG1 (b / benefit-01
                  :ARG0 (m2 / minimum
                        :consist-of (p2 / point))
                  :ARG1 (c2 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Boeing"))
                  :degree (m / most)
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (g / gain-02
                              :ARG0 c2
                              :ARG1 (p3 / point
                                    :degree (l / less
                                          :compared-to (c4 / company :name (n4 / name :op1 "Dassault"))))
                              :mod (t / term
                                    :mod (a / and
                                          :op1 (t2 / transfer-01
                                                :ARG1 (t3 / technology))
                                          :op2 (s3 / subcontract-01))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020329_0022.4 ::date 2013-06-09T13:37:32 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020329_0022_4.txt

      :ARG0 (m / minister
            :mod (s / senior)
            :employed-by (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
      :ARG1 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (i / inspect-01
                  :ARG1 (p / program
                        :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                        :poss (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")
                              :mod (r / rival))))
            :ARG1 (c4 / crisis
                  :mod (n4 / new)
                  :domain (p2 / possible))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :time (d2 / date-entity
            :weekday (f2 / friday)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020329_0022.18 ::date 2013-06-09T15:01:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Jun 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020329_0022_18.txt

  :op1 (b / build-01
         :ARG0 (c / consortium)
         :ARG1 (r / reactor
                 :mod (n / nucleus)
                 :part (w / water
                         :mod (l / light))
                 :quant 2
                 :ARG0-of (p / produce-01
                            :ARG1 (f / fuel
                                    :mod (g / grade
                                           :mod (w2 / weapons))
                                    :degree (l2 / less)
                                    :compared-to (r2 / reactor
                                                   :mod (o / old)
                                                   :part (g2 / graphite)
                                                   :poss (c2 / country
                                                           :name (n2 / name
                                                                   :op1 "North"
                                                                   :op2 "Korea")))))))
  :op2 (p2 / provide-01
         :ARG0 c
         :ARG1 (f2 / fuel
                 :ARG1-of (s / substitute-01))
         :duration (u / until
                     :op1 b)))

                  :op2 (c2 / construct-01))
            :mod (m / major))
      :ARG1 (p2 / put-06
            :ARG1 (d3 / date
                  :ARG1-of (t2 / target-01)
                  :mod (o / original)
                  :time (d4 / date-entity :year 2003)
                  :time-of (c3 / complete-01))
            :ARG2 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                  :quant (a3 / at-least
                        :op1 (t4 / temporal-quantity :quant 5
                              :unit (y2 / year))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020329_0022.20 ::date 2013-06-09T15:13:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

          :time (d2 / date-entity
                  :year 1994))

          :ARG2 (a2 / allow-01
                  :ARG1 (i / inspect-01
                          :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                                  :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "International"
                                          :op2 "Atomic"
                                          :op3 "Energy"
                                          :op4 "Agency"))
                          :ARG1 (f / facility
                                  :mod (o3 / old)
                                  :poss (c / country
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                  :op1 "North"
                                                  :op2 "Korea")))
                          :purpose (s2 / see-01
                                     :ARG0 o2
                                     :ARG1 (p / process-01
                                             :ARG0 f
                                             :ARG1 (p2 / plutonium)
                                             :mode interrogative))
                          :time (b / before
                                  :op1 (i2 / install-01
                                         :ARG1 (f2 / facility
                                                 :mod (c2 / core)
                                                 :poss (r / reactor
                                                         :mod (n3 / new)))))))))

(a / and
      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (m / military)
      :op3 (b / business))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020404_0305.4 ::date 2013-05-28T13:34:10 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt India's Hindustan Aeronautics Limited plans to manufacture and maintain 140 Sukhoi 30 fighter jets for the Indian government.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020404_0305_4.txt
(p / plan-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Hindustan" :op2 "Aeronautics" :op3 "Limited")
            :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India")))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (m / manufacture-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (j / jet :quant 140 :name (n3 / name :op1 "Sukhoi" :op2 "30")
                        :ARG0-of (f / fight-01)))
            :op2 (m2 / maintain-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 j)
            :beneficiary (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 c2))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020404_0305.10 ::date 2013-05-28T14:14:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt N. R. Mohanty stated that this technology transfer is good because when an aircraft is sold at a cheap rate you end up paying more when you start maintaining the aircraft and requesting spare aircraft.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020404_0305_10.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "N.R." :op2 "Mohanty"))
      :ARG1 (g / good
            :domain (t / transfer-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / technology)
                  :mod (t3 / this))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / pay-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (m / more)
                        :condition (s2 / sell-01
                              :ARG1 (a / aircraft)
                              :ARG3 (r / rate
                                    :mod (c2 / cheap)))
                        :time (s3 / start-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (m2 / maintain-01
                                          :ARG0 y
                                          :ARG1 a)
                                    :op2 (r2 / request-01
                                          :ARG0 y
                                          :ARG1 (a3 / aircraft
                                                :ARG1-of (s4 / spare-02)))))))))

                                          :mod (o / other))
                                    :op3 (a3 / assist-01
                                          :mod (t2 / technical)))))
                  :time (n3 / need-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 m))))

                  :degree (m / more))

                        :purpose (u2 / upgrade-02)
                        :time (d4 / date-entity :year 1996)

                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :unit (y / year :quant 2)))))
      :ARG2 (d / deliver-01 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (j / jet :quant 2 :name (n / name :op1 "MiG-21-93")
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1))
            :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India"))
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2000))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020404_0305.25 ::date 2013-05-28T15:51:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

                         :frequency (f2 / first))
                 :time (d2 / date-entity
                         :year 2002))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020404_0305.26 ::date 2013-05-28T15:58:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Hindustan Aeronautics Limited stated on 020404 that Hindustan Aeronautics Limited made a net profit of 62 million United States dollars on a sales turnover of 27.3 billion rupees year-on-year for the fiscal year to 020300.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020404_0305_26.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Hindustan" :op2 "Aeronautics" :op3 "Limited"))
      :ARG1 (p / profit-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (t / turnover
                  :mod (s2 / sell-01)
                  :quant (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 27300000000
                        :unit (r / rupee)))
            :mod (n2 / net)
            :quant (m / monetary-quantity :quant 62000000
                  :unit (d2 / dollar
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
            :mod (y / year-on-year)
            :time (y2 / year
                  :op1 (d3 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 03)
                  :mod (f / fiscal)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 4 :day 4))

  :year 2002
  :month 4
  :day 7)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.3 ::date 2013-06-09T15:27:08 ::snt-type topic ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

(a / and

  :op2 (p / politics)
  :op3 (g / government-organization
         :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.4 ::date 2013-06-09T15:27:40 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Japanese opposition Liberal Party chief Ichiro Ozawa announced that Japan is able to arm itself with nuclear weapons overnight if China proceeds with excessive military build-up.
# ::save-date Sun Jun 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538_4.txt
(a / announce-01
  :ARG0 (c / chief
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Ichiro"
                  :op2 "Ozawa")
          :poss (p / political-party
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Liberal"
                          :op2 "Party")
                  :mod (o / opposition)
                  :mod (c2 / country
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Japan"))))
  :ARG1 (p2 / possible
          :domain (a2 / arm-01
                    :ARG0 c2
                    :ARG1 c2
                    :ARG2 (w / weapon
                            :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                    :time (o2 / overnight))
          :condition (p3 / proceed-01
                       :ARG0 (c3 / country
                               :name (n5 / name
                                       :op1 "China"))
                       :ARG1 (b / build-05
                               :ARG0 c3
                               :ARG1 (m / military)
                               :degree (e / excess)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.5 ::date 2013-06-09T15:32:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt 7 April 2002 -- Japanese opposition Liberal Party chief Ichiro Ozawa has announced that Japan is able to arm itself with nuclear weapons overnight.
# ::save-date Sun Jun 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538_5.txt
(a / announce-01
  :ARG0 (c / chief
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Ichiro"
                  :op2 "Ozawa")
          :poss (p / political-party
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Liberal"
                          :op2 "Party")
                  :mod (o / opposition)
                  :mod (c2 / country
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Japan"))))
  :ARG1 (p2 / possible
          :domain (a2 / arm-01
                    :ARG0 c2
                    :ARG1 c2
                    :ARG2 (w / weapon
                            :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                    :time (o2 / overnight)))
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :year 2002
          :month 4
          :day 7))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.6 ::date 2013-07-11T09:10:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Japan will arm itself with nuclear weapons if China proceeds with excessive military expansion.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538_6.txt
(a / arm-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
      :ARG1 c
      :ARG2 (w / weapon
            :mod (n3 / nucleus))
      :condition (p / proceed-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
            :ARG1 (e / expand-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (m / military)
                  :degree (e2 / excess))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.7 ::date 2013-06-09T15:36:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Ozawa discussed Japan's nuclear weapons during a meeting with a Chinese community party intelligence division official.
# ::save-date Sun Jun 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538_7.txt
(d / discuss-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Ozawa"))
  :ARG1 (w / weapon
          :mod (n2 / nucleus)
          :poss (c / country
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Japan")))
  :time (m / meet-03
          :ARG0 p
          :ARG1 (o / official
                  :employed-by (d2 / division
                                 :mod (i / intelligence)
                                 :part-of (p2 / party
                                            :mod (c2 / community)
                                            :mod (c3 / country
                                                   :name (n4 / name
                                                           :op1 "China")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.8 ::date 2013-06-09T15:38:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

                                   :name (n3 / name
                                           :op1 "Asia")))
                    :manner (s / strong))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.12 ::date 2013-06-09T15:49:25 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

            :ARG1 c

                  :mod (m / military)
                  :example (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "US")))))

  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Ozawa"))
  :ARG1 (g / get-03
          :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :mod (c2 / country
                         :name (n4 / name

          :condition (e / expand-01
                       :ARG0 c
                       :ARG1 (p4 / power
                               :mod (m / military)

  :ARG2 (p2 / person
          :ARG0-of (v / visit-01)
          :ARG1-of (n2 / name-01
                     :polarity -)
          :mod (c / country
                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "China"))))

                                             :name (n3 / name

          :ARG1 n))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020406_0538.23 ::date 2013-06-10T08:53:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

          :name (n3 / name

                  :op2 "Shimbun")

                       :unit (d / day)

  :ARG1 (p2 / possible
          :domain (a / arm-01
                    :ARG0 (c / country
                            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Japan"))
                    :ARG1 c
                    :ARG2 (w / weapon
                            :mod (n / nucleus))
                    :time (o / overnight)))
  :time (b / before
          :op1 (t / this)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020408_0348.8 ::date 2013-05-29T13:49:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Interfax" :op2 "new" :op3 "agency"))

            :employed-by (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Rosoboronexport")))

            :ARG0 s

                  :ARG0 (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Quintao"))

                        :ARG0 p

                                    :ARG2 (a2 / area
                                          :quant (v / various)))
                              :op2 (p3 / prepare-01
                                    :ARG1 (c4 / contract-02
                                          :ARG1 (s4 / sell-01

                                                :ARG1 (a3 / arms)
                                                :ARG2 (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Brazil")))
                                          :mod (s3 / specific))))
                        :ARG2 p2))))

                              :ARG0-of (f2 / fight-01))

                              :ARG0-of (c3 / counter-01
                                    :ARG1 (m / missile))))))
      :time (v / visit-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p / president :name (n2 / name :op1 "Fernando" :op2 "Henrique" :op3 "Cardoso")
                        :employed-by (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Brazil")))

                        :consist-of (p2 / person :quant 70)))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 1)))

# ::snt International; Government; weapons; media; technology; terrorism; proliferation
# ::save-date Mon Jun 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542_3.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (i / international)
  :op2 (g / government-organization
         :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
  :op3 (w / weapon)
  :op4 (m / media)
  :op5 (t / technology)
  :op6 (t2 / terrorism)
  :op7 (p / proliferate-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.4 ::date 2013-06-10T09:13:41 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Declassified British Ministry of Defense documents explain how Britain made its first nuclear bomb.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542_4.txt
(e / explain-01
      :ARG0 (d / document
            :source (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Ministry" :op2 "of" :op3 "Defense")
                  :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Britain")))
            :ARG1-of (d2 / declassify-01))
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :manner-of (m / make-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (b / bomb
                        :mod (n3 / nucleus)
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                        :poss c))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.5 ::date 2013-06-10T09:19:06 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Critics state that with access to plutonium available from rogue States terrorists could consult the detailed documents and build an atomic bomb.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542_5.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (c / critic)
  :ARG1 (p / possible
          :domain (a / and
                    :op1 (c2 / consult-01
                           :ARG0 (t / terrorist)
                           :ARG1 (d / document
                                   :ARG0-of (d2 / detail-01)))
                    :op2 (b / build-01
                           :ARG0 t
                           :ARG1 (b2 / bomb
                                   :mod (a2 / atom))))
          :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                     :ARG0 (a3 / access-01
                             :ARG0 t
                             :ARG1 (p2 / plutonium
                                     :mod (a4 / available)
                                     :source (s2 / state
                                               :mod (r / rogue)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.6 ::date 2013-06-10T09:25:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

                              :mod (a / atom)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.7 ::date 2013-06-10T09:27:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

          :name (n2 / name

                  :op2 "Daily"
                  :op3 "Telegraph"))

          :ARG1 (d / document)

                  :mod (p / public))
          :time (p2 / past
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                         :quant 5
                         :unit (y2 / year)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.8 ::date 2013-06-10T09:30:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

                  :ARG1-of (d2 / declassify-01)))

            :ARG0 (a / available
                  :mod (p2 / public)
                  :domain d)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.9 ::date 2013-06-10T09:33:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

                          :name (n3 / name
                                  :op1 "Britain"))
                  :ARG1 (b / bomb
                          :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                          :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1))

                          :op1 (e / end
                                 :op1 (d4 / date-entity
                                        :decade 1940))
                          :op2 (s / start
                                 :op1 (d6 / date-entity
                                        :decade 1950))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.10 ::date 2013-06-10T09:38:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542_10.txt

      :ARG0 (d / document
            :ARG1-of (d2 / declassify-01))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (l / list
                  :consist-of (i / ingredient
                        :purpose (w / weapon
                              :mod (s / such))
                        :ARG2-of (i2 / include-91
                              :ARG1 (a2 / amount
                                    :quant-of (p2 / plutonium)
                                    :ARG1-of (n / need-01)))))
            :op2 (t / thing
                  :manner-of (s2 / spark-01
                        :ARG1 (r / reaction
                              :mod (c2 / chain))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.11 ::date 2013-06-10T09:45:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.12 ::date 2013-06-10T09:48:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jun 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542_12.txt

  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Brian"
                  :op2 "Burnell")

                     :mod (f / former))
          :ARG0-of (w / work-01
                     :ARG1 (p2 / program
                             :mod (m / military)
                             :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                             :poss (c / country
                                     :name (n3 / name
                                             :op1 "Britain")))))
  :ARG1 (p3 / possible
          :domain (e2 / enable-01
                    :ARG0 (i / instruction)
                    :ARG1 (c2 / construct-01
                            :ARG0 t
                            :ARG1 (b / bomb
                                    :mod (a / atom)
                                    :mod (r / rudimentary)))
                    :ARG2 (t / terrorist))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.13 ::date 2013-06-10T09:53:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "Telegraph"))

          :ARG1 (c2 / challenge-01
                  :ARG2 (o / obtain-01
                          :ARG1 (p2 / plutonium
                                  :ARG1-of (n3 / need-01)))
                  :mod (p / principle))
          :ARG2 (p3 / possible
                  :domain (p4 / possess-01
                            :ARG0 (s / state
                                    :mod (o2 / outlaw)
                                    :quant (s2 / several)
                                    :example (c3 / country
                                               :name (n4 / name
                                                       :op1 "Iraq")))
                            :ARG1 (p5 / plutonium)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.14 ::date 2013-06-10T10:10:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred

          :mod (t2 / terrorism)

                             :op1 "al-Qaeda")))
  :ARG1 (o3 / obtain-01
          :ARG0 o
          :ARG1 (p / plutonium)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542.15 ::date 2013-07-11T10:43:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Burnell was quoted as stating that the documents should never have been declassified and after the events of 11 September 2001 there is a case for removing them from public access.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020414_0542_15.txt
(q / quote-01
      :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Burnell"))
      :ARG2 (s / state-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / recommend-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (d2 / declassify-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (d3 / document)
                              :time (e / ever)))
                  :op2 (c / case
                        :purpose (r2 / remove-01
                              :ARG1 d3
                              :ARG2 (a3 / access-01
                                    :ARG0 (p2 / public)))
                        :time (a2 / after
                              :op1 (e2 / event
                                    :time (d4 / date-entity :year 2001 :month 9 :day 11)))))))

                                         :op1 "Conservative"
                                         :op2 "Party")

                  :ARG0-of (c2 / call-01

            :ARG1 (n / number-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (a3 / addict-01
                              :ARG2 (h / heroin))
                        :location (c8 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tajikistan"))))
            :manner (v / vast)
            :duration (o / over
                  :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 5
                        :unit (y / year)
                        :mod (p2 / past)))))

                                    :unit (m / mile)
                                    :quant 800)))

                 :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))

         :ARG1 c

                 :mod (t / transit)

                            :ARG1 (h / heroin)

                                           :op1 (c3 / country
                                                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))

                        :unit (t / ton)
                        :mod (n / near))))
      :op2 (a4 / arrest-01
            :ARG0 a2

                  :quant (m2 / more-than :op1 2000)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2001))

                                                :ARG2 (h / heroin)))
                             :manner (f / frequent))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020416_0331.14 ::date 2013-05-29T13:03:54 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt There are 5000 heroin addicts officially registered in Tajikistan, compared with 57 in 1997.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020416_0331_14.txt
(r / register-02
  :ARG1 (p / person
          :ARG1-of (a / addict-01
                     :ARG2 (h / heroin))
          :quant 5000)
  :manner (o / official)
  :location (c / country
              :name (n / name :op1 "Tajikistan"))
  :compared-to (p2 / person
                 :ARG1-of (a2 / addict-01
                            :ARG2 (h2 / heroin))
                 :quant 57
                 :time (d / date-entity
                         :year 1997)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020416_0331.15 ::date 2013-05-29T13:06:27 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The actual figure is seven times greater than the official number.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020416_0331_15.txt
(e / equal-01
      :ARG1 (f / figure
            :mod (a / actual))
      :ARG2 (p / product-of :op1 7
            :op2 (n2 / number
                  :mod (o / official))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020416_0331.16 ::date 2013-05-29T13:10:35 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The low cost and availability of heroin are among the causes of the addiction problem.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020416_0331_16.txt
(c / cause-01
  :ARG0 (a2 / and
          :op1 (c2 / cost-01
                 :ARG2 (l / low))
          :op2 (a3 / availability
                 :poss (h / heroin)))
  :ARG1 (p / problem
          :topic (a / addict-01)))

                      :op1 "United"

# ::snt The draft will be submitted to ASEAN's respective ministers to discuss and adopt.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020517_0035_18.txt
(s / submit-01
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (d / draft-01))
      :ARG2 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (m / minister-01)
            :poss (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "ASEAN"))
            :mod (r / respective))
      :ARG3 (a / and
            :op1 (d2 / discuss-01
                  :ARG0 m
                  :ARG1 t)
            :op2 (a2 / adopt-01
                  :ARG0 m
                  :ARG1 t)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020517_0035.19 ::date 2013-06-06T12:50:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

(m / meet-03
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (m2 / minister-01
                  :ARG1 (i / interior))
            :employed-by (c / country
                  :part-of (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "ASEAN"))))
      :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 2
            :unit (d3 / day))
      :time (f / from
            :op1 (d4 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 5 :day 19))
      :location (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kuala" :op2 "Lumpur")))

      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (e / exchange-01
                  :ARG1 (i2 / information))
            :op2 (d / develop-02
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / arrange-01)
                        :mod (l / legal)
                        :mod (o / or
                              :op1 (m / multilateral)
                              :op2 (b / bilateral))))
            :purpose (f / facilitate-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / apprehend-01)))
      :ARG2 (p / program
            :mod (w / work)))

                          :op1 "Myanmar"))

                  :mod (l / legal
                         :polarity -))

                 :degree (m / most))
          :location (w / world))
  :ARG2 (h / have-03
          :ARG0 c3
          :ARG1 (r / resource
                  :mod (a / and
                         :op1 (f / finance)
                         :op2 (t / technical))
                  :ARG1-of (l3 / limit-01)
                  :purpose (e / end-01
                             :ARG0 c3
                             :ARG1 (t2 / trade-01
                                     :ARG1 (d / drug))))))

# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_3.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (i / international)
  :op2 (e / economy)
  :op3 (p / politics))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.4 ::date 2013-06-08T16:29:12 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt At a UN-sponsored conference Iran and Pakistan pledged to assist neighboring Afghanistan by increasing private sector activity.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_4.txt
(p / pledge-01
  :ARG0 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n5 / name :op1 "Iran"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n4 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
  :ARG1 (c3 / country
          :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")
          :ARG1-of (n / neighbor-01))
  :ARG2 (a2 / assist-01)
  :manner (i / increase-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / activity
                    :poss (s / sector
                            :mod (p2 / private))))
  :location (c4 / conference
              :ARG1-of (s2 / sponsor-01
                         :ARG0 (o / organization
                                 :name (n2 / name :op1 "UN")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.5 ::date 2013-06-08T16:31:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt On 18 May 2002 at a UN-sponsored conference Iran and Pakistan pledged economic assistance to Afghanistan.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_5.txt
(p / pledge-01
  :ARG0 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
  :ARG1 (c3 / country
          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
  :ARG2 (a2 / assist-01
          :ARG2 (e / economic))
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :year 2002
          :month 5
          :day 18)
  :location (c4 / conference
              :ARG1-of (s / sponsor-01
                         :ARG0 (o / organization
                                 :name (n / name :op1 "UN")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.6 ::date 2013-06-08T16:33:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghanistan neighbors Iran and Pakistan.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_6.txt
(n / neighbor-01
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
          :op3 (c3 / country
                 :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.7 ::date 2013-06-08T16:34:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran and Pakistan plan to increase private sector activity with Afghanistan.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_7.txt
(p / plan-01
  :ARG0 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
  :ARG1 (i / increase-01
          :ARG1 (a2 / activity
                  :poss (s / sector
                          :mod (p2 / private))
                  :accompanier (c3 / country
                                 :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.8 ::date 2013-06-08T16:36:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (m / minister :name (n / name :op1 "Tahmaseb" :op2 "Mazaheri")
            :poss (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :mod (a2 / and
                  :op2 (f / finance)
                  :op2 (e / economy))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.9 ::date 2013-06-08T16:55:45 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Increasing Afghanistan's trade with Iran and Pakistan will reinstate Afghanistan's economy after 23 years of war.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_9.txt
(r / reinstate-01
  :ARG0 (i / increase-01
          :ARG1 (t2 / trade-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                          :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                  :ARG2 (a / and
                          :op1 (c2 / country
                                 :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                          :op2 (c3 / country
                                 :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan")))))
  :ARG1 (e / economy
          :poss c)
  :time (a2 / after
          :op1 (w / war
                 :duration (t3 / temporal-entity
                             :unit (y2 / year)
                             :quant 23))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.10 ::date 2013-06-08T16:58:15 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Key sectors of cooperation between Iran and Afghanistan include Oil and Petro-chemical industries, building and road construction, agricultural machinery and manufacturing.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_10.txt
(i / include-01
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (i2 / industry
                 :mod (a2 / and
                        :op1 (o / oil)
                        :op2 (p / petro-chemical)))
          :op2 (c4 / construct-01
                 :ARG1 (a3 / and
                         :op1 (b / building)
                         :op2 (r / road)))
          :op3 (m / machinery
                 :mod (a4 / agriculture))
          :op4 (m2 / manufacture-01))
  :ARG2 (s / sector
          :ARG2-of (c / cooperate-01
                     :ARG0 (c2 / country
                             :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                     :ARG1 (c3 / country
                             :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
          :mod (k / key)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.11 ::date 2013-06-08T17:01:53 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran, Pakistan and Afghanistan must collaborate to end the illegal opium trade.

  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (c2 / country
                 :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
          :op2 (c3 / country
                 :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
          :op3 (c4 / country
                 :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
  :ARG2 (c / collaborate-01
          :ARG2 (e / end-01
                  :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                          :ARG1 (o2 / opium)
                          :mod (i / illegal)))))

                  :op2 "Aziz")
          :poss (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.14 ::date 2013-06-08T17:12:56 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Pakistan has taken steps to facilitate movement of people and goods between Pakistan and Afghanistan for economic reconstruction.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_14.txt
(t / take-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
      :ARG1 (s / step)
      :purpose (f / facilitate-01
            :ARG1 (m / move-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p / person)
                        :op2 (g / good))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 c
                        :op2 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
                  :purpose (r / reconstruct-01
                        :ARG1 (e / economy)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.15 ::date 2013-06-08T17:16:44 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Key sectors of cooperation between Pakistan and Afghanistan include agriculture, rural development, civil aviation, finance and banking, engineering services, judicial and legal services and the establishment of small and medium-sized firms.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_15.txt
(i / include-01
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (a2 / agriculture)
          :op2 (d / develop-02
                 :ARG1 (r / rural))
          :op3 (a3 / aviation
                 :mod (c4 / civil))
          :op4 (a4 / and
                 :op1 (f / finance)
                 :op2 (b / bank-01))
          :op5 (s2 / service
                 :mod (e / engineer-01))
          :op6 (s3 / service
                 :mod (a5 / and
                        :op1 (j / judicial)
                        :op2 (l / legal)))
          :op7 (e2 / establish-01
                 :ARG1 (f2 / firm
                         :mod (a6 / and
                                :op1 (s4 / small)
                                :op2 (m / medium-sized)))))
  :ARG2 (s / sector
          :ARG2-of (c / cooperate-01
                     :ARG0 (c2 / country
                             :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
                     :ARG1 (c3 / country
                             :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
          :mod (k / key)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.16 ::date 2013-06-08T17:23:26 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

                        :mod (p2 / private))
                  :prep-among (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))
            :ARG1 (p / peace)
            :degree (f / further)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.19 ::date 2013-06-08T17:32:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

                             :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01

                                                :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
                             :mod (i / interim))
                     :mod (d / deputy))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.21 ::date 2013-06-08T17:46:18 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghanistan is preparing liberal economic legislation that will facilitate foreign trade and private sector activity.

(p / prepare-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
  :ARG1 (l / legislate-01
          :ARG1 (e / economy)
          :mod (l2 / liberal)
          :ARG0-of (f / facilitate-01
                     :ARG1 (a / and
                             :op1 (t / trade-01
                                    :mod (f2 / foreign))
                             :op2 (a2 / activity
                                    :poss (s / sector
                                            :mod (p2 / private)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.22 ::date 2013-06-08T17:48:50 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

            :op1 (s2 / stability
                  :mod (p / political))
            :op2 (d / develop-02
                  :ARG1 (e / economy))
            :op3 (b / base
                  :mod (a2 / and
                        :op1 (l / legislate-01)
                        :op2 (i / institutional)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.23 ::date 2013-06-08T17:51:13 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))

                  :ARG1 (b / bridge-01

      :op2 (s / seek-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (h / help-01)
            :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Economic" :op2 "Cooperation" :op3 "Organization"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.24 ::date 2013-06-08T17:57:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / meet-03)
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / reinforce-01
                        :ARG1 (f2 / friendship))
                  :op2 (s2 / speed-02
                        :ARG1 (c2 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))

          :ARG0-of (s / speak-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.26 ::date 2013-06-08T18:15:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

          :ARG0 (p / political-party
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Taliban"))
          :time (l / late
                  :degree (m / more)))
  :ARG1 (c / crop
          :mod (o / opium)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.27 ::date 2013-07-15T08:58:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_27.txt

      :ARG0 (o / opium)
      :time (s / since
            :op1 (t / topple-01
                  :ARG0 (a / alliance
                        :mod (m / military)
                        :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                              :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
                  :ARG1 (c2 / criminal-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taliban"))
                  :time (d / date-entity :month 12 :year 2001))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.28 ::date 2013-06-08T18:19:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (p4 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Hamid" :op2 "Karzai")
                  :ARG0-of (h / head-01
                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
                              :mod (i / interim))))
            :op2 (c3 / community
                  :mod (i2 / international)))
      :ARG1 (p3 / program
            :mod (s / substitute-01
                  :ARG1 (c / crop)))
      :ARG2 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (f / farm-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.29 ::date 2013-06-08T18:22:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

            :ARG0 (p3 / possible
                  :domain (p4 / police-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Hamid" :op2 "Karzai")

          :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.34 ::date 2013-06-08T18:38:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The Taliban ruled Afghanistan from 1996-2001.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_34.txt
(r / rule-03
  :ARG0 (p / political-party
          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taliban"))
  :ARG1 (c / country
          :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
  :time (d3 / date-interval
          :op1 (d4 / date-entity
                 :year 1996)
          :op2 (d5 / date-entity
                 :year 2001)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.35 ::date 2013-06-08T18:41:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Pakistan backed the deposed Taliban.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_35.txt
(b / back-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
  :ARG1 (p / political-party
          :name (n / name :op1 "Taliban")
          :ARG1-of (d / depose-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.36 ::date 2013-06-08T18:42:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran funded Afghanistan's rebel Northern Alliance.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_36.txt
(f / fund-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
  :ARG1 (p / political-party
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Northern"
                  :op2 "Alliance")
          :mod (r / rebel)
          :poss (c2 / country
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.37 ::date 2013-07-15T15:46:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The Northern Alliance played a major roll in unseating the Taliban.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_37.txt
(p / play-02
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Northern" :op2 "Alliance"))
      :ARG1 (u / unseat-01
            :ARG1 (c / criminal-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taliban")))
      :mod (m / major))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.38 ::date 2013-06-08T18:44:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Together Iran and Pakistan have hosted more than 3 million Afghan refugees during years of civil war.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_38.txt
(h / host-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
            :mod (t / together))
      :ARG1 (r / refugee
            :mod (c3 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghan"))
            :quant (m2 / more-than :op1 3000000))
      :time (w / war
            :mod (c4 / civil)
            :duration (y / year)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.39 ::date 2013-06-08T18:48:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghan refugees are now starting to return to Afghanistan after civil war.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_39.txt
(s / start-01
  :ARG0 (r / refugee
          :mod (c / country
                 :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
  :ARG1 (r2 / return-01
          :ARG4 c
          :time (a / after
                  :op1 (w / war
                         :mod (c2 / civil))))
  :time (n / now))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.40 ::date 2013-06-08T18:49:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Deputy head of Afghanistan interim government Hedayat Amin-Arsala visited Tehran for the first time.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107_40.txt
(v / visit-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Hedayat" :op2 "Amin-Arsala")
            :ARG0-of (h / head-01
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                        :mod (i / interim)
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))
                  :mod (d / deputy)))
      :ARG1 (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tehran"))
      :time (f / first))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020518_0107.41 ::date 2013-06-08T18:52:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-01 ::preferred

            :poss (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Economic" :op2 "Cooperation" :op3 "Organization"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.4 ::date 2013-06-06T14:36:17 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Taiwan national executed in Vietnam for drug manufacture and trafficking.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_4.txt
(e / execute-01
      :ARG1 (n / national
            :source (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan")))
      :location (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
      :cause (a / and
            :op1 (m / manufacture-01
                  :ARG1 (d / drug))
            :op2 (t / trafficking)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.5 ::date 2013-06-06T14:40:52 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Police in the strict communist country discovered his methamphetamine manufacturing plant disguised as a soap factory and sentenced him to death in 1997.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_5.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (d2 / discover-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (p2 / police-01)
                  :location (c / country
                        :mod (c2 / communist
                              :mod (s / strict))))
            :ARG1 (p3 / plant
                  :purpose (m / manufacture-01
                        :ARG1 (m2 / methamphetamine))
                  :ARG1-of (d3 / disguise-01
                        :ARG2 (f / factory
                              :mod (s2 / soap)))
                  :poss (h / he)))
      :op2 (s3 / sentence-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 h
            :ARG2 (d4 / die-01
                  :ARG1 h)
            :time (d5 / date-entity :year 1997)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.6 ::date 2013-06-06T14:51:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt On 22 May 2002 officials stated that Taiwan National Chen Chi Tien was executed by firing squad in Vietnam's 8th execution of a foreigner.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (o / official)
      :ARG1 (e / execute-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Vietnam")
                  :ARG0-of (e2 / execute-01
                        :ARG1 (f2 / foreigner :quant 8)))
            :ARG1 (n / national :name (n2 / name :op1 "Chen" :op2 "Chi" :op3 "Tien")
                  :source (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Taiwan")))
            :ARG2 (s2 / squad
                  :ARG0-of (f / fire-01)))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 5 :day 22))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.7 ::date 2013-06-06T15:03:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Chen was sentenced to death in 1997 for the illegal manufacture of methamphetamines disguised as a soap manufacturing plant.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_7.txt
(s / sentence-01
      :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chen"))
      :ARG2 (d2 / die-01
            :ARG1 p)
      :ARG3 (m / manufacture-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / methamphetamine)
            :manner (l / legal :polarity -)
            :ARG1-of (d3 / disguise-01
                  :ARG2 (p2 / plant
                        :purpose (m3 / manufacture-01
                              :ARG1 (s2 / soap)))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1997))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.8 ::date 2013-06-06T15:09:54 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Court officials in the commercial capital stated that Chen was executed in Ho Chi Minh City on 21 May 2002.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_8.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (o / official
            :employed-by (c / court)
            :location (c2 / capital
                  :mod (c3 / commercial)))
      :ARG1 (e / execute-01
            :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chen"))
            :location (c4 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Ho" :op2 "Chi" :op3 "Minh" :op4 "City"))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 5 :day 21)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.9 ::date 2013-06-06T15:27:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The businessman was arrested with several Vietnamese accomplices in 1995 after 170 kilograms (375 pounds) of methamphethamine chlorohydrate were found stored in the downtown soap factory Chen had established in 1994.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_9.txt
(a / arrest-01
      :ARG1 (b / businessman)
      :accompanier (a2 / accomplice
            :quant (s / several)
            :source (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam")))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :year 1995)
      :time (a3 / after
            :op1 (f / find-01
                  :ARG1 (m / methamphetamine
                        :mod (c2 / chlorohydrate)
                        :quant (m3 / mass-quantity :quant 170
                              :unit (k2 / kilogram))
                        :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 375
                              :unit (p2 / pound))
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / store-01
                              :location (f2 / factory
                                    :mod (s3 / soap)
                                    :ARG1-of (e / establish-01
                                          :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Chen"))
                                          :time (d4 / date-entity :year 1994))
                                    :location (d / downtown)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.10 ::date 2013-06-06T15:40:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Police established that Chen had already exported at least 4 shipments of the drug before his illegal manufacturing operation was discovered.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_10.txt
(e / establish-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (p / police-01))
      :ARG1 (e2 / export-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chen"))
            :ARG1 (d / drug
                  :ARG1-of (s / ship-01
                        :quant (a2 / at-least :op1 4)))
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (d2 / discover-01
                        :ARG1 (o / operation
                              :purpose (m / manufacture-01)
                              :mod (l / legal :polarity -)
                              :poss p2)))
            :mod (a / already)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.11 ::date 2013-06-06T16:00:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Chen traveled to Vietnam regularly since 1992.

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chen"))
      :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
      :frequency (r / regular)
      :time (s / since
            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 1992)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.12 ::date 2013-06-06T16:07:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_12.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (p / possible
            :domain (s / smoke-02
                  :ARG1 (a2 / amphetamine
                        :mod (c / crystalline)
                        :ARG2-of (d / derive-01))))
      :op2 (m / market-01
            :ARG1 a2
            :mod (l / large
                  :degree (v / very))
            :location (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "East" :op2 "Asia"))
            :mod (l2 / legal :polarity -)))

      :ARG2 (o / or

      :ARG1 (w / woman
            :source (a / and

            :domain (n3 / national
                  :source (w2 / world-region :name (n4 / name :op1 "West"))))
      :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG1 (c4 / controversy
                  :mod (d2 / diplomatic)
                  :accompanier c2))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2000))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.20 ::date 2013-06-06T16:50:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt More foreign nationals receive the death penalty from the courts but most have their sentences commuted on appeal.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_20.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (r / receive-01
            :ARG0 (n / national
                  :mod (f / foreign)
                  :quant (m / more))
            :ARG1 (p / penalize-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / court)
                  :ARG1 n
                  :mod (d / die-01
                        :ARG1 n)))
      :ARG2 (h / have-06
            :ARG0 (n2 / national
                  :mod (f2 / foreign)
                  :quant (m2 / most))
            :ARG1 (c3 / commute-02
                  :ARG1 (s / sentence-01
                        :ARG1 n2
                        :ARG1-of (a / appeal-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.21 ::date 2013-06-06T16:54:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt 3 Australian nationals of Vietnamese origin are currently awaiting trial on drug charges which carry the death penalty.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_21.txt
(a / await-01
      :ARG1 (n / national :quant 3
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Australia"))
            :source (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Vietnam")))
      :ARG2 (t / try-02
            :ARG1 (c4 / charge-06
                  :ARG1 (d / drug)
                  :ARG0-of (c5 / carry-01
                        :ARG1 (p / penalize-01
                              :instrument (d2 / die-01)))))
      :time (c3 / current))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.22 ::date 2013-06-06T17:10:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Vietnam's communist authorities impose the death penalty for a total of 29 different offenses including murder, treason, sexual offenses against children, serious cases of armed robbery, various economic crimes and drug trafficking.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_22.txt
(i / impose-01
      :ARG0 (a / authority
            :mod (c / communist)
            :poss (c5 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam")))
      :ARG1 (p / penalize-01
            :ARG2 (t3 / total
                  :quant-of (o / offense :quant 29
                        :ARG1-of (d2 / differ-02)
                        :ARG1-of (i2 / include-01
                              :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (m / murder-01)
                                    :op2 (t / treason)
                                    :op3 (o2 / offense
                                          :mod (s / sexual)
                                          :prep-against (c2 / child))
                                    :op4 (c3 / case
                                          :mod (s2 / serious-41
                                                :ARG2 (r / rob-01
                                                      :mod (a3 / arm-01))))
                                    :op5 (c4 / crime
                                          :mod (e / economic)
                                          :quant (v / various))
                                    :op2 (t2 / traffic-00
                                          :ARG1 (d3 / drug))))))
            :instrument (d / die-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.23 ::date 2013-06-06T17:18:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Drug trafficking resulted in 55 death sentences in 2001, 85 in 2000 and 76 in 1999.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_23.txt
(r / result-01
      :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
            :ARG1 (d4 / drug))
      :ARG2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / sentence-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person :quant 55)
                  :ARG2 (d5 / die-01
                        :ARG1 p)
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2001))
            :op2 (s2 / sentence-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 85)
                  :ARG2 (d6 / die-01
                        :ARG1 p2)
                  :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2000))
            :op3 (s3 / sentence-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person :quant 76)
                  :ARG2 (d7 / die-01
                        :ARG1 p3)
                  :time (d3 / date-entity :year 1999))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013.24 ::date 2013-06-06T17:25:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator LDC-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Under Vietnam's strict drug laws anyone found in possession of 300 grams (10 ounces) or more of heroin or 10 kilograms (22 pounds) or more of opium is considered guilty of trafficking.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020522_0013_24.txt
(c / consider-01
      :ARG1 (g2 / guilty-41
            :ARG1 (a / anyone
                  :ARG0-of (f / find-02
                        :ARG1 (p2 / possess-01
                              :ARG0 a
                              :ARG1 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (h / heroin
                                          :quant (o4 / or
                                                :op1 (m6 / mass-quantity :quant 300
                                                      :unit (g / gram))
                                                :op2 (m / more)
                                                :op1 (m5 / mass-quantity :quant 10
                                                      :unit (o / ounce))))
                                    :op2 (o3 / opium
                                          :quant (o5 / or
                                                :op1 (m4 / mass-quantity :quant 10
                                                      :unit (k / kilogram))
                                                :op2 (m2 / more)
                                                :op1 (m3 / mass-quantity :quant 22
                                                      :unit (p / pound))))))))
            :ARG2 (t / traffic-00
                  :ARG1 (d / drug)))
      :prep-under (l / law
            :mod (s / strict)
            :poss (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020610_0336.4 ::date 2013-06-20T16:34:01 ::snt-type summary ::annotator LDC-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt AFP, members of international and local press, and United Nations representatives and diplomats witnessed Myanmar destroy illicit drugs the authorities captured.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020610_0336_4.txt
(w / witness-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (p4 / publication :name (n3 / name :op1 "AFP"))
            :op2 (m / member
                  :poss (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p / press
                              :mod (l / local))
                        :op2 (p2 / press
                              :mod (i / international))))
            :op3 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (r / represent-01
                        :ARG1 (o3 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))))
            :op4 (d / diplomat
                  :mod o3))
      :ARG1 (d2 / destroy-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
            :ARG1 (d3 / drug
                  :mod (i2 / illicit)
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / capture-01
                        :ARG0 (a3 / authority)))))

      :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Phone" :op2 "Kyar" :op3 "Shin"))

            :time (f / future)

                  :time (t / today))

                  :ARG0 (g / grow-03 :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (p4 / poppy
                              :quant (m / more))))))

         :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020621_0524.4 ::date 2013-05-23T13:10:17 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Ecological organization Greenpeace stated on June 21, 2002 that Russia helped Iran to develop nuclear weapons by building Iran's Bushehr atomic power station.
# ::save-date Thu May 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020621_0524_4.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (o / organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Greenpeace")
          :mod (e / ecology))
  :ARG1 (h / help-01
          :ARG0 (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Russia"))
          :ARG1 (d2 / develop-02
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (w / weapon
                          :mod (n4 / nucleus)))
          :ARG2 (c2 / country
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Iran"))
          :manner (b / build-01
                    :ARG0 c
                    :ARG1 (s2 / station
                            :poss c2
                            :ARG0-of (p / power-01
                                       :mod (a / atom))
                            :location (c3 / city
                                        :name (n6 / name
                                                :op1 "Bushehr")))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2002
          :month 6
          :day 21))

                  :ARG1 (m / ministry

                        :poss c))))

  :op1 (s / say-01
         :ARG0 (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Iran"))

                 :ARG1 (p / plant
                         :location (c3 / city
                                     :name (n3 / name
                                             :op1 "Bushehr")))
                 :purpose (e / energy
                            :beneficiary (c2 / civilian)
                            :mod (o / only))))
  :op2 (a2 / allow-01
         :ARG0 c
         :ARG1 (i / inspect-01
                 :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                         :name (n2 / name
                                 :op1 "International"
                                 :op2 "Atomic"
                                 :op3 "Energy"
                                 :op4 "Agency"))
                 :ARG1 p
                 :frequency (r / regular))))

                         :op1 "Germany")))

                     :duration (l / long)))

             :ARG0 (r / request-01

                             :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01

                     :ARG1 p))

          :op1 (r2 / revolution
                 :mod (r3 / religious-group
                        :name (n3 / name
                                :op1 "Islam"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020621_0524.24 ::date 2013-05-24T19:12:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

            :ARG0 c

                  :ARG0 (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :ARG2 (n5 / nucleus)))
      :location (s / summit
            :location (c6 / city :name (n6 / name :op1 "Moscow"))

                  :mod (l / last))
            :prep-between (a / and
                  :op1 p
                  :op2 (c7 / counterpart :name (n7 / name :op1 "Vladimir" :op2 "Putin")
                        :poss p
                        :mod c4))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.4 ::date 2013-05-24T19:24:40 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Asian countries participated in United Nations International Day against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking on 26 June 2002 by executing drug traffickers and burning narcotics worth 1 billion U.S. dollars.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144_4.txt
(p / participate-01
      :ARG0 (c / country
            :mod (c4 / continent :name (n / name :op1 "Asia")))
      :ARG1 (f / festival :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "International" :op4 "Day" :op5 "against" :op6 "Drug" :op7 "Abuse" :op8 "and" :op9 "Illicit" :op10 "Trafficking")
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 6 :day 26))
      :manner (a / and
            :op1 (e / execute-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG1 (d3 / drug))))
            :op2 (b / burn-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (n3 / narcotic
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / cost-01
                              :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 1000000000
                                    :unit (d2 / dollar
                                          :mod (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "U.S.")))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.5 ::date 2013-05-24T19:30:41 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri May 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144_5.txt

          :ARG0-of (p / participate-01))

          :mod (t / tough))

             :ARG0 c
             :ARG1 (c2 / commit-01
                     :ARG0 c
                     :ARG1 (e / eradicate-01
                             :ARG0 c
                             :ARG1 (p3 / problem)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.7 ::date 2013-05-24T19:34:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The China News Service reported that on 25 June 2002 14 people were sentenced to death in Chengdu, China and that 9 of those sentenced were immediately taken to the execution grounds and shot.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144_7.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "China" :op2 "News" :op3 "Service"))
      :ARG1 (s / sentence-01
            :ARG1 (p / person :quant 14
                  :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 9
                              :ARG1-of (t / take-01
                                    :destination (g2 / grounds
                                          :location-of (e / execute-01))
                                    :time (i2 / immediate))
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / shoot-02))))
            :ARG2 (d / die-01)
            :location (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Chengdu")
                  :part-of (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 6 :day 25)))

                              :op1 "Chengdu"))

                        :ARG0 (c3 / criminal
                              :mod (d2 / drug))

          :mod (t / that)
          :ARG0-of (d / distribute-01
                     :ARG1 (d2 / drug)))
  :polarity -)

                  :mod (o / other))
          :polarity -)
  :ARG2 (s / suffice-01
          :ARG0 (s2 / sentence-01
                  :ARG2 (d / die-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.17 ::date 2013-05-24T20:32:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The military junta of Myanmar burned narcotics it said were worth more than 1 billion U.S. dollars in its latest attempt to convince critics it is committed to eradicating their drug problem.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144_17.txt
(b / burn-01
      :ARG0 (j / junta
            :mod (m / military)
            :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Myanmar")))
      :ARG1 (n2 / narcotic
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cost-01
                  :ARG2 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant (m3 / more-than :op1 1000000000)
                        :unit (d / dollar
                              :mod (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.S."))))
                  :ARG1-of (s / say-01
                        :ARG0 j)))
      :time (a / attempt-01
            :ARG0 j
            :ARG1 (c4 / convince-01
                  :ARG0 j
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (c6 / criticize-01))
                  :ARG2 (c5 / commit-01
                        :ARG1 j
                        :ARG2 (e / eradicate-01
                              :ARG0 j
                              :ARG1 (p / problem
                                    :mod (d2 / drug)
                                    :poss j))))
            :mod (l / late
                  :degree (m4 / most))))

                  :mod (i / international)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.20 ::date 2013-05-24T20:53:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt 3027 kilograms (6650 pounds) of opium, 240 kilograms of heroin, 434 kilograms of marijuana, 34.9 million amphetamine tablets, 4 million ephedrine tablets and 2865 kilograms of powdered ephedrine were burned.
# ::save-date Fri May 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144_20.txt
(b / burn-01
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (o / opium
                 :quant (m / mass-quantity
                          :unit (k / kilogram)
                          :quant 3027))
          :op2 (h / heroin
                 :quant (m2 / mass-quantity
                          :unit (k2 / kilogram)
                          :quant 240))
          :op3 (m3 / marijuana
                 :quant (m4 / mass-quantity
                          :unit (k3 / kilogram)
                          :quant 434))
          :op4 (t / tablet
                 :consist-of (a2 / amphetamine)
                 :quant 34900000)
          :op5 (t2 / tablet
                 :consist-of (e / ephedrine)
                 :quant 4000000)
          :op6 (e2 / ephedrine
                 :ARG1-of (p / powder-01)
                 :quant (m5 / mass-quantity
                          :unit (k4 / kilogram)
                          :quant 2865))))

                  :ARG1 c)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.23 ::date 2013-05-24T21:13:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                  :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                        :ARG1 (n3 / narcotic)))
            :mod (l2 / late
                  :degree (m2 / most)))

            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Myanmar")
                  :poss (w / world))
            :ARG1 (o / opium
                  :mod (i / illicit))
            :degree (l / large
                  :degree (m / most))
            :compared-to (w2 / world)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.24 ::date 2013-05-24T21:18:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

      :mod (a3 / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020626_0144.25 ::date 2013-05-24T21:23:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

                                     :mod (m / military)))))
  :ARG2 (s / state-01

                                                :op1 "France"))
