                                        :name (n3 / name
                                                :op1 "Italy"))))))

                        :frequency (r / rate-entity-91

                                    :degree (m2 / most))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020629_0321.21 ::date 2013-05-25T16:16:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Israel"))))
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (o / or
                              :op1 (b / buy-01

                                          :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01

                                    :ARG1 (s / satellite :name (n7 / name :op1 "Ofek-5")
                                          :ARG0-of (s2 / spy-01)
                                          :mod (n6 / new)
                                          :poss g))
                              :op2 (b2 / borrow-01
                                    :ARG0 g3
                                    :ARG1 s))
                        :op2 (a3 / acquire-01
                              :ARG0 g3
                              :ARG1 (s3 / system :name (n8 / name :op1 "Arrow")
                                    :poss c2
                                    :ARG0-of (c4 / counter-01
                                          :ARG1 (m / missile))))))))

                        :mod (b / both)))

                        :op2 (d / develop-02

                              :mod (s3 / still))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020723_0353.11 ::date 2013-05-27T15:59:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020723_0353_11.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (b / benefit-01
            :ARG0 (p / pact
                  :mod (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "ASEAN")))
            :time (t / term
                  :duration (l / long)))
      :ARG2 (d / difficult
            :domain (i / implement-01
                  :ARG1 p)
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / possible
                        :domain (m / make-02
                              :ARG0 (a / and
                                    :op1 (i2 / issue
                                          :mod (s / security
                                                :mod (n2 / national)))
                                    :op2 (r / rivalry
                                          :mod (i3 / interstate)))
                              :ARG1 (w / wary
                                    :topic (d2 / divulge-01
                                          :ARG0 c2
                                          :ARG1 (i4 / information))
                                    :domain (c2 / country
                                          :ARG1-of (i5 / include-91
                                                :ARG2 (c4 / country :quant 10
                                                      :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                                            :ARG1 o
                                                            :ARG2 (m2 / member))))
                                          :quant (s2 / some))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020723_0353.12 ::date 2013-05-27T16:22:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt ASEAN must agree on a definition of terrorism to identify the common enemy.
# ::save-date Mon May 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20020723_0353_12.txt
(o / obligate-01
  :ARG2 (a / agree-01
          :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "ASEAN"))
          :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG2-of (d / define-01

                     :ARG0 o2

                             :ARG1-of (s / share-01
                                        :ARG0 o2)))))

                        :op3 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Philippines"))))

                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "ASEAN"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021015_0171.8 ::date 2013-07-12T14:47:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Do Quy Doan stated that the Vietnamese Ministry of Culture and Information will take 30 days to license eligible websites that do not include pornographic material, information that harms the national security or encourages violence and anti-government activities.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021015_0171_8.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Do" :op2 "Quy" :op3 "Doan"))
      :ARG1 (t2 / take-10
            :ARG0 (l / license-01
                  :ARG1 (w / website
                        :mod (e / eligible)
                        :ARG2-of (i / include-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (m / material
                                          :mod (p2 / pornography))
                                    :op2 (i2 / information
                                          :ARG0-of (h / harm-01
                                                :ARG1 (s2 / security
                                                      :mod (n4 / nation))))
                                    :op3 (i3 / information
                                          :ARG0-of (e2 / encourage-02
                                                :ARG1 (a / and
                                                      :op1 (v / violence)
                                                      :op2 (a2 / activity
                                                            :ARG0-of (o3 / oppose-01
                                                                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                                                                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))))))))))
            :ARG1 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 30
                  :unit (d2 / day))
            :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Ministry" :op2 "of" :op3 "Culture" :op4 "and" :op5 "Information")
                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021015_0171.9 ::date 2013-07-12T15:04:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Diplomatic, foreign and press institutions must obtain permission from the Vietnamese Foreign Affairs Ministry before applying for licenses permitting them to distribute content online in Vietnam.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021015_0171_9.txt
(o / obligate-01
      :ARG2 (o2 / obtain-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (i / institution
                        :mod (d / diplomacy))
                  :op2 (i2 / institution
                        :mod (f / foreign))
                  :op3 (i3 / institution
                        :mod (p / press)))
            :ARG1 (p2 / permit-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnamese" :op2 "Foreign" :op3 "Affairs" :op4 "Ministry"))
                  :ARG1 (a2 / apply-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 (l / license
                              :ARG0-of (p3 / permit-01
                                    :ARG1 (d2 / distribute-01
                                          :ARG0 a
                                          :ARG1 (c2 / content)
                                          :medium (o3 / online)
                                          :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))))))
                  :ARG2 a)))

      :ARG1-of (i2 / increase-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021015_0171.12 ::date 2013-07-12T15:36:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

      :op1 (i / increase-01
            :ARG1 (n2 / number
                  :quant-of (p2 / person

            :manner (r2 / rapid))
      :op2 (r / reach-01
            :ARG0 n2

                  :ARG3-of (i3 / include-91
                        :ARG1 p2
                        :ARG2 (p4 / person :quant 79000000
                              :ARG0-of (r3 / reside-01
                                    :ARG1 c))))
            :mod (p5 / possible)
            :time (b / by
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2005))))

      :ARG0 (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Atomic" :op2 "Energy" :op3 "Agency"))
                  :ARG2 (d / director)))

            :domain (c2 / conceal-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                  :ARG1 (p / program
                        :mod (w / weapon
                              :mod (n3 / nucleus))))
            :condition (a / allow-01
                  :ARG1 (r / return-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (i / inspect-01)
                              :mod (i2 / international))))))

            :op1 (t / test-01

            :op3 (i / interview-01

            :mod (v2 / various))
      :op2 (d / deter-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / present
                  :domain p
                  :location (c / country)
                  :mod (a3 / alone))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021018_0360.6 ::date 2013-07-19T12:53:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (u / unlikely
            :domain (p2 / possible
                  :domain (c2 / conceal-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                        :ARG1 (p3 / program
                              :mod (w / weapon
                                    :mod (n6 / nucleus)))))

                  :ARG0 c

                              :mod (i2 / international)))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 18 :month 10 :year 2002))

                              :extent (h / high)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021018_0360.11 ::date 2013-07-19T13:06:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt ElBaradei stated that inspectors would perform environmental sampling, gamma radiation surveys from helicopters, internal periodic visits to all capable sites and interviews with all former nuclear scientists to confirm that they are not working in the nuclear program.

(s / state-01

                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (i2 / inspect-01))
                  :ARG1 (e / environment))
            :op2 (s3 / survey-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG2 (r / radiation
                        :consist-of (g / gamma))
                  :location (h / helicopter))
            :op3 (v / visit-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (s4 / site
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / capable-41)
                        :quant (a2 / all))
                  :frequency (p3 / periodic)
                  :mod (i3 / internal))
            :op4 (i / interview-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (s5 / scientist
                        :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                        :quant (a3 / all)
                        :mod (f / former))
                  :purpose (c / confirm-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (w / work-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG0 s5
                              :ARG1 (p4 / program
                                    :mod (n3 / nucleus)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021018_0360.18 ::date 2013-07-19T15:28:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

                              :ARG2-of (h / have-condition-91
                                    :ARG1 (r / return-01

                                                            :ARG0 (c3 / country)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021018_0360.19 ::date 2013-07-19T15:39:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021018_0360_19.txt
(d2 / depart-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (i / inspect-01
                  :ARG1 (w / weapon))
            :poss (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "UN")))
      :ARG1 (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Baghdad"))

                        :mod (p2 / politics))))

                  :op1 (s / street))

                  :op1 (n / now)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021110_0396.8 ::date 2013-05-25T12:04:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The Itar-Tass news agency stated that the Russian ministers also plan to discuss nuclear non-proliferation issues and will confirm that the Russian government has not breached any international agreements in Russia's cooperation with Iran and North Korea in the areas of nuclear technology and the sale of weapons.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021110_0396_8.txt

            :mod (n2 / news))

            :op1 (p / plan-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                              :ARG2 (m / minister)))
                  :ARG1 (d / discuss-01
                        :ARG1 (i / issue
                              :domain (p2 / proliferate-01 :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 (n4 / nucleus))))
                  :mod (a2 / also))
            :op2 (c2 / confirm-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 (b / breach-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 c))
                        :ARG1 (a3 / agree-01
                              :mod (i2 / international))
                        :manner (c3 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                                    :op2 (c6 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
                              :ARG2 (a6 / and
                                    :op1 (t / technology
                                          :mod (n8 / nucleus))
                                    :op2 (s2 / sell-01
                                          :ARG1 (w / weapon))))))))

                  :ARG1 (m2 / militarize
                        :domain (s / space)
                        :time (f / follow

                                                :purpose (r2 / research-01
                                                      :ARG1 (h / health

            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Global" :op2 "Forum" :op3 "for" :op4 "Health" :op5 "Research"))
            :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))))

                  :ARG3-of (i2 / include-91
                        :ARG1 d2
                        :ARG2 (d / disease
                              :mod (g / globe))))))

                  :op2 (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Latin" :op2 "American" :op3 "Health" :op4 "Research" :op5 "Forum")))
            :mod (s2 / step-01
                  :direction (r / right))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021112_0467.13 ::date 2013-05-25T13:04:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Global Forum for Health Research Chairman Richard Feachem said it was unfair for poor countries to be allocated meager sums of research funding.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021112_0467_13.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Richard" :op2 "Feachem")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Global" :op2 "Forum" :op3 "for" :op4 "Health" :op5 "Research"))
                  :ARG2 (c / chairman)))
      :ARG1 (u2 / unfair
            :domain (a / allocate-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / sum
                        :mod (m / meager)
                        :ARG2-of (f2 / fund-01
                              :ARG1 (r / research-01)))
                  :ARG2 (c2 / country
                        :mod (p / poor)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021112_0467.14 ::date 2013-05-25T13:11:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Feachem said the majority of the poor are getting little health research funding compared to the wealthy few.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021112_0467_14.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Feachem"))
      :ARG1 (g / get-01
            :ARG0 (m / majority
                  :ARG3-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG2 (p2 / person
                              :mod (p3 / poor))))
            :ARG1 (f / fund-01
                  :ARG1 (r / research-01
                        :ARG1 (h / health))
                  :ARG2 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant (l / little
                              :ARG1-of (c / compare-01
                                    :ARG2 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                                          :ARG2-of (f3 / fund-01
                                                :ARG1 r
                                                :beneficiary (p4 / person
                                                      :mod (w / wealth)
                                                      :quant (f2 / few))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021112_0467.15 ::date 2013-05-25T13:16:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The Global Forum for Health Research is an independent, international foundation funded by the Rockefeller Foundation, the World Health Organization, the World Bank and the Governments of Canada, Denmark, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden and Switzerland.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021112_0467_15.txt
(f3 / foundation
      :domain (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Global" :op2 "Forum" :op3 "for" :op4 "Health" :op5 "Research"))
      :mod (i2 / international)
      :ARG1-of (f2 / fund-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Rockefeller" :op2 "Foundation"))
                  :op2 (o3 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "World" :op2 "Health" :op3 "Organization"))
                  :op3 (o4 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "World" :op2 "Bank"))
                  :op4 (g / government-organzation
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Canada"))))
                  :op5 (g3 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Denmark"))))
                  :op6 (g5 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g6 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Netherlands"))))
                  :op7 (g7 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g8 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c4 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Norway"))))
                  :op8 (g9 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g10 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "Sweden"))))
                  :op9 (g11 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g12 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c6 / country :name (n10 / name :op1 "Switzerland"))))))
      :ARG0-of (d / depend-01 :polarity -))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.1 ::date 2013-05-25T13:22:58 ::snt-type date ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt 2002-12-03

(d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 12 :day 03)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.2 ::date 2013-05-25T13:23:30 ::snt-type country ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt China (CN); United States (US)

(a / and
      :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
      :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.3 ::date 2013-05-25T13:23:58 ::snt-type topic ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Telecom; international
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (t / telecom)
      :op2 (i / international))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.4 ::date 2013-05-25T13:24:24 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt New U.S. study claims that one-tenth of Internet's sites are blocked by the Chinese Government authorities using updated Filtering technology.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_4.txt
(c / claim-01
      :ARG0 (s / study
            :mod (n / new)
            :source (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "U.S.")))
      :ARG1 (b / block-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))))
                        :ARG2 (a / authority)))
            :ARG1 (s2 / site
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                        :ARG2 (s3 / site
                              :poss (i / internet))
                        :ARG3 (p / percentage-entity :value 10)))
            :manner (u2 / use-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (t / technology
                        :ARG0-of (f / filter-02)
                        :ARG1-of (u / update-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.5 ::date 2013-05-25T13:28:26 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt A wide range of sites including a very high percentage of news sites and keywords were found to be blocked.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_5.txt
(f / find-02
      :ARG1 (r2 / range
            :consist-of (s3 / site
                  :ARG2-of (i2 / include-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (s / site
                                    :mod (n / news)
                                    :quant (p2 / percentage
                                          :mod (h2 / high
                                                :degree (v2 / very))))
                              :op2 (k / keyword
                                    :quant (p / percentage
                                          :mod (h / high
                                                :degree (v / very))))
                              :ARG1-of (b2 / block-01))))
            :mod (w2 / wide)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.6 ::date 2013-05-25T13:33:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt A U.S. study released on 03 December 2002 states that one-tenth of the Internet's sites may be blocked by Chinese authorities as part of efforts to prevent access to information on dissidents, Taiwan, Tibet and other subjects.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / study
            :source (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "U.S."))
            :ARG1-of (r / release-01
                  :time (d / date-entity :day 03 :month 12 :year 2002)))
      :ARG1 (p / possible
            :domain (b / block-01
                  :ARG0 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :ARG2 (a / authority)))
                  :ARG1 (s3 / site
                        :quant (p3 / percentage-entity :value 10
                              :ARG3-of (i4 / include-91
                                    :ARG1 s3
                                    :ARG2 (s5 / site
                                          :poss (i / internet)))))
                  :purpose (p2 / prevent-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / access-01
                              :ARG1 (i3 / information
                                    :topic (a3 / and
                                          :op1 (d2 / dissident)
                                          :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                                          :op3 (p4 / province :name (n4 / name :op1 "Tibet"))
                                          :op4 (s4 / subject
                                                :mod (o / other)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.7 ::date 2013-05-25T13:38:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The study was conducted by Harvard University's berkman Center for Internet and society.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_7.txt
(c / conduct-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Berkman" :op2 "Center" :op3 "for" :op4 "Internet" :op5 "and" :op6 "Society")
            :poss (u / university :name (n2 / name :op1 "Harvard")))
      :ARG1 (s / study))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.8 ::date 2013-05-25T13:40:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The study found that more than 50000 of the approximately 200000 websites tested were inaccessible from at least 1 point in China on at least 1 occasion.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_8.txt
(f / find-02
      :ARG0 (s / study)
      :ARG1 (p2 / possible :polarity -
            :domain (a / access-01
                  :ARG1 (w4 / website
                        :quant (m2 / more-than :op1 50000)
                        :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                              :ARG2 (w2 / website
                                    :quant (a2 / approximate :op1 200000)
                                    :ARG1-of (t / test-01))))
                  :source (p / point
                        :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
                        :quant (a4 / at-least :op1 1))
                  :frequency (o / occasion
                        :quant (a3 / at-least :op1 1)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.9 ::date 2013-05-25T13:45:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Using a more narrow definition of blocked site the study concluded that 18931 websites were being blocked to Chinese web users.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_9.txt
(c / conclude-01
      :ARG0 (s / study)
      :ARG1 (b / block-01
            :ARG1 (w / website :quant 18931)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 (w2 / web))
                  :poss (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
      :manner (d / definition
            :mod (n2 / narrow
                  :degree (m / more))
            :domain (s2 / site
                  :ARG1-of (b2 / block-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.10 ::date 2013-05-25T13:50:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Harvard researcher and co-author of the report Ben Edelman stated that it is likely that similar percentages apply to the Internet as a whole.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_10.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Ben" :op2 "Edelman")
            :ARG0-of (r / research-01)
            :ARG0-of (c2 / coauthor-01
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / report-01)))
            :poss (u / university :name (n2 / name :op1 "Harvard")))
      :ARG1 (l / likely
            :domain (a2 / apply-02
                  :ARG1 (p2 / percentage
                        :ARG1-of (r3 / resemble-01))
                  :ARG2 (i / internet
                        :domain (w / whole)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.11 ::date 2013-05-25T13:56:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Edelman told AFP that it is highly likely that approximately one-tenth of the Internet is filtered by or recently has been filtered by China.
# ::save-date Wed Jun 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_11.txt
(t / tell-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Edelman"))
      :ARG1 (l / likely
            :degree (h / high)
            :domain (o2 / or
                  :op1 (f / filter-02
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))
                        :ARG1 (i / internet
                              :quant (a / approximately
                                    :op1 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 10
                                          :ARG3-of (i2 / include-91
                                                :ARG1 i
                                                :ARG2 (i3 / internet))))))
                  :op2 (f2 / filter-02
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 i
                        :time (r / recent))))
      :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "AFP")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.12 ::date 2013-05-25T14:00:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Edelman stated that there are many different ways to measure this effect and therefore hesitated to specify any single proportion.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Edelman"))
      :ARG1 (h2 / have-manner-91
            :ARG1 (m / measure-01
                  :ARG1 (e / effect-01
                        :mod (t / this))
                  :quant (m2 / many))
            :ARG2 (d / differ-02))
      :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG1 (h / hesitate-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (s2 / specify-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (p2 / proportion
                              :mod (a / any)
                              :quant (s4 / single))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.13 ::date 2013-05-25T14:05:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The latest study was broader than prior surveys and gives perspective to disparate reports about websites that are filtered or blocked by China.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_13.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (b / broad
            :degree (m / more)
            :domain (s / study
                  :time (l / late
                        :degree (m2 / most))
                  :compared-to (s2 / survey
                        :time (p / prior))))
      :op2 (g / give-01
            :ARG0 s
            :ARG1 (p2 / perspective)
            :ARG2 (r / report
                  :mod (d / disparate)
                  :topic (o / or
                        :op1 (f / filter-02
                              :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
                              :ARG1 (w / website))
                        :op2 (b2 / block-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 w)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.14 ::date 2013-05-25T14:08:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt In the report it is concluded that --
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_14.txt
(c / conclude-01
      :location (r / report))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.15 ::date 2013-05-25T14:09:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt China blocks a range of web content beyond that which is sexually explicit.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_15.txt
(b / block-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
      :ARG1 (c2 / content
            :mod (w / web)
            :quant (r / range)
            :quant (b2 / beyond
                  :op1 (e / explicit
                        :mod (s / sexual)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.16 ::date 2013-05-25T14:11:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt 1000s of sites providing information about news, health, education, and entertainment were blocked.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_16.txt
(b / block-01
      :ARG1 (s / site
            :ARG0-of (p / provide-01
                  :ARG1 (i / information
                        :topic (a / and
                              :op1 (n / news)
                              :op2 (h / health)
                              :op3 (e / educate-01)
                              :op4 (e2 / entertain-01))))
            :quant (m / multiple :op1 1000)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.17 ::date 2013-05-25T14:13:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Approximately 3284 sites from Taiwan were blocked.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_17.txt
(b / block-01
      :ARG1 (s / site
            :source (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
            :quant (a / approximate :op1 3284)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.18 ::date 2013-05-25T14:15:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The blocked sites also included those of U.S. news organizations including ABC News and CBS News, the Alta Vista search engine, and a number of U.S. universities.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_18.txt
(i / include-91
      :ARG1 s
      :ARG2 (s / site
            :ARG1-of (b / block-01)
            :poss (o / organization
                  :mod (n / news)
                  :poss (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "U.S."))
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91)
                  :example (a2 / and
                        :op1 (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "ABC" :op2 "News"))
                        :op2 (o3 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "CBS" :op2 "News"))
                        :op3 (e / engine :name (n5 / name :op1 "Alta" :op2 "Vista")
                              :mod (s2 / search))
                        :op4 (u / university
                              :quant (n7 / number)
                              :poss c))))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.19 ::date 2013-05-25T14:26:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The researchers found that 100 percent of the top 10 sites with keywords Tibet, Taiwan China, or equality were blocked.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_19.txt
(f / find-02
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (r / research-01))
      :ARG1 (b / block-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / site
                  :quant (p3 / percentage-entity :value 100
                        :ARG3-of (i / include-91
                              :ARG1 s2
                              :ARG2 (s / site :quant 10
                                    :mod (t / top)
                                    :accompanier (k / keyword
                                          :mod (o / or
                                                :op1 (p2 / province :name (n / name :op1 "Tibet"))
                                                :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                                                :op3 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                                                :op4 (e / equality)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.20 ::date 2013-05-25T14:28:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt A large number of other sites with keywords such as freedom, democracy and HIV were also blocked.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_20.txt
(b / block-01
      :ARG1 (s / site
            :mod (o / other)
            :quant (n / number
                  :mod (l / large))
            :accompanier (k / keyword
                  :example (a2 / and
                        :op1 (f / free-41)
                        :op2 (d / democracy)
                        :op3 (h / HIV))))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.21 ::date 2013-05-25T14:30:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The BBC news site was consistently unavailable.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_21.txt
(a / available :polarity -
      :domain (s / site
            :mod (n / news)
            :poss (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "BBC")))
      :manner (c / consistent))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.22 ::date 2013-05-25T14:37:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Sites for CNN, Time magazine, U.S.-based public broadcasting system, the Miami Herald, and the Philadelphia Inquirer were also often blocked.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_22.txt
(b / block-01
      :ARG1 (s / site
            :poss (a / and
                  :op1 (c2 / company :name (n / name :op1 "CNN"))
                  :op2 (m / magazine :name (n2 / name :op1 "Time"))
                  :op3 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Public" :op2 "Broadcasting" :op3 "System")
                        :ARG1-of (b3 / base-01
                              :location (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "U.S."))))
                  :op4 (n7 / newspaper :name (n8 / name :op1 "Miami" :op2 "Herald"))
                  :op5 (n5 / newspaper :name (n6 / name :op1 "Philadelphia" :op2 "Inquirer")))
            :mod (a2 / also))
      :frequency (o2 / often))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.23 ::date 2013-05-25T14:41:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The report found that 42 of google's top 100 results for news were blocked.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_23.txt
(f / find-02
      :ARG0 (t2 / thing
            :ARG1-of (r4 / report-01))
      :ARG1 (b / block-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / result :quant 42
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                        :ARG2 (r3 / result :quant 100
                              :mod (t / top)
                              :topic (n / news)
                              :poss (c / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Google")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.24 ::date 2013-05-25T14:41:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Religious sites blocked in China included the Asian American Baptist Church, The atheist network, the Catholic Civil Rights League, Feng Shui, the Jewish Federation of Winnipeg, and the Denver Zen center.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_24.txt
(b / block-01
      :ARG1 (s / site
            :mod (r / religious)
            :ARG2-of (i / include-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Asian" :op2 "American" :op3 "Baptist" :op4 "Church"))
                        :op2 (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "atheist" :op2 "network"))
                        :op3 (o6 / organization :name (n10 / name :op1 "Catholic" :op2 "Civil" :op3 "Rights" :op4 "League"))
                        :op4 (o4 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Feng" :op2 "Shui"))
                        :op5 (o5 / organization :name (n5 / name :op1 "Jewish" :op2 "Federation")
                              :location (c4 / city :name (n8 / name :op1 "Winnipeg")))
                        :op6 (o7 / organization :name (n9 / name :op1 "Zen" :op2 "Center")
                              :location (c2 / city :name (n7 / name :op1 "Denver"))))))
      :location (c / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "China")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751.25 ::date 2013-05-25T14:42:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt China has an estimated 45 million Internet users.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021203_0751_25.txt
(h / have-03
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
      :ARG1 (p / person :quant 45000000
            :ARG0-of (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (i / internet))
            :ARG1-of (e / estimate-01)))

                              :mod (a5 / any))))))

                        :unit (y / year)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.5 ::date 2013-05-28T09:51:38 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Existing rods could produce 3-6 atomic bombs in 6-8 months.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_5.txt
(p / possible
      :domain (p2 / produce-01
            :ARG0 (r / rod
                  :ARG1-of (e / exist-01))
            :ARG1 (b / bomb
                  :mod (a / atom)
                  :quant (b2 / between :op1 3 :op2 6))
            :duration (t / temporal-quantity
                  :quant (b3 / between :op1 6 :op2 8)
                  :unit (m2 / month))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.6 ::date 2013-05-28T09:54:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Experts stated that 8000 spent fuel rods reportedly stockpiled by North Korea at a nuclear reactor the country is threatening to re-start could be used to produce plutonium for nuclear weapons.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p4 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p5 / person
                        :ARG1-of (e / expert-41))))
      :ARG1 (p / possible
            :domain (u2 / use-01
                  :ARG1 (r / rod :quant 8000
                        :consist-of (f / fuel)
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / spend-00)
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / stockpile-01
                              :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                              :ARG1-of (r2 / report-01))
                        :location (r3 / reactor
                              :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                              :ARG1-of (r4 / restart-01
                                    :ARG1-of (t / threaten-01
                                          :ARG0 c))))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / produce-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / plutonium
                              :purpose (w / weapon
                                    :mod (n3 / nucleus)))))))

                  :mod (n3 / nucleus))
            :mod (a / additional)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.9 ::date 2013-05-28T10:03:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The reactor could produce enough spent rods to construct 1 atomic bomb per year if reactivated.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_9.txt
(p / possible
      :domain (p2 / produce-01
            :ARG0 (r / reactor)
            :ARG1 (r2 / rod
                  :quant (e / enough)
                  :purpose (c / construct-01
                        :ARG1 (r4 / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG1 (b / bomb :quant 1
                                    :mod (a / atom))
                              :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                    :unit (y2 / year))))
                  :ARG1-of (s / spend-00))
            :condition (r3 / reactivate-01
                  :ARG1 r)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.10 ::date 2013-05-28T10:05:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The experimental nuclear plant in Yongbyon is a miniature of electricity-producing nuclear plants in Western countries but operates on the same principles.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_10.txt
(p / plant
      :mod (n / nucleus)
      :mod (e / experiment)
      :domain (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (m / miniature
                  :domain (p2 / plant
                        :ARG0-of (p3 / produce-01
                              :ARG1 (e2 / electricity))
                        :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                        :location (c2 / country
                              :location (w / world-region :name (n3 / name :op1 "West")))))
            :ARG2 (o / operate-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG4 (p4 / principle
                        :mod (s / same))))
      :location (c3 / county :name (n4 / name :op1 "Yongbyon")))

                  :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))

            :direction (n3 / north)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.14 ::date 2013-05-28T10:14:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Nuclear reactor process --
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_14.txt
(p / process
      :domain (r / reactor
            :mod (n / nucleus)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.15 ::date 2013-05-28T10:14:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt 4 meter fuel rods containing uranium oxide are burned to initiate fission -- the nucleus of the uranium atom is split, releasing neutrons that collide with other atoms, creating more neutrons in a chain reaction.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_15.txt
(b / burn-01
      :ARG1 (r / rod
            :ARG0-of (c / contain-01
                  :ARG1 (o / oxide
                        :mod (u / uranium)))
            :consist-of (f / fuel)
            :mod (d / distance-quantity :quant 4
                  :unit (m2 / meter)))
      :purpose (i / initiate-01
            :ARG1 (f2 / fission
                  :domain (s / split-01
                        :ARG1 (n / nucleus
                              :poss (a / atom
                                    :consist-of (u2 / uranium)))
                        :ARG0-of (r2 / release-01
                              :ARG1 (n2 / neutron
                                    :ARG0-of (c2 / collide-01
                                          :ARG1 (a2 / atom
                                                :mod (o2 / other))
                                          :ARG0-of (c3 / create-01
                                                :ARG1 (n3 / neutron
                                                      :quant (m / more))
                                                :manner (r3 / reaction
                                                      :mod (c4 / chain))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.16 ::date 2013-05-28T10:19:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Fission produces immense heat which is applied to water to create steam which drives turbines to generate electricity.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_16.txt
(p / produce-01
      :ARG0 (f / fission)
      :ARG1 (h / heat
            :mod (i / immense)
            :ARG1-of (a / apply-01
                  :ARG2 (w / water)
                  :purpose (c / create-01
                        :ARG1 (s / steam
                              :ARG0-of (d / drive-02
                                    :ARG1 (t / turbine)
                                    :purpose (g / generate-01
                                          :ARG1 (e / electricity))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.17 ::date 2013-05-28T10:21:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Plutonium and other radioactive byproducts of the process accumulate and decrease the effectiveness of the rods until they are spent after 3-4 years.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_17.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (a2 / accumulate-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p / plutonium)
                  :op2 (b / byproduct
                        :poss (p2 / process)
                        :mod (r / radioactive)
                        :mod (o / other))))
      :op2 (d / decrease-01
            :ARG1 (e / effectiveness
                  :domain (r2 / rod))
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 (s / spend-00
                        :ARG1 r
                        :time (a4 / after
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :unit (y / year)
                                    :quant (b2 / between :op1 3 :op2 4)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.18 ::date 2013-05-28T11:09:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Spent rods consisting of highly radioactive plutonium and residual uranium are cooled in pools of water for several years to diminish radioactivity and then the plutonium is then recovered in nitrate form and converted into oxide.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_18.txt
(c / cool-01
      :ARG1 (r / rod
            :ARG1-of (s2 / spend-00)
            :consist-of (a / and
                  :op1 (p / plutonium
                        :mod (r2 / radioactive
                              :degree (h / high)))
                  :op2 (u2 / uranium
                        :mod (r3 / residual))))
      :location (p2 / pool
            :consist-of (w / water))
      :duration (y / year
            :quant (s / several))
      :purpose (d / diminish-01
            :ARG1 (r4 / radioactivity))
      :time (t / then
            :op1 (r5 / recover-02
                  :ARG1 (p3 / plutonium
                        :mod (f / form
                              :domain (n / nitrate)))
                  :time (t2 / then
                        :op1 (c2 / convert-01
                              :ARG1 p3
                              :ARG2 (o / oxide))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.19 ::date 2013-05-28T11:18:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The recovered plutonium can be mixed with uranium for reuse in the reactor or used in making nuclear weapons.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_19.txt
(p / possible
      :domain (m / mix-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / plutonium
                  :ARG1-of (r / recover-02))
            :ARG2 (u / uranium)
            :purpose (o / or
                  :op1 (r2 / reuse-01
                        :location (r3 / reactor))
                  :op2 (m2 / make-01
                        :ARG1 (w / weapon
                              :mod (n / nucleus))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152.20 ::date 2013-05-28T11:22:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Nuclear experts stated that to make weapons, a high proportion of plutonium 239 (military grade plutonium, as opposed to the commercial plutonium used in power plants) must be extracted.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0152_20.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p7 / person
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p8 / person
                        :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                              :ARG2 (n / nucleus)))))
      :ARG1 (m / make-01
            :ARG1 (w / weapon)
            :condition (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG2 (e2 / extract-01
                        :ARG1 (p / plutonium :mod 239
                              :quant (p2 / proportion
                                    :mod (h / high))
                              :mod (p3 / plutonium
                                    :mod (g / grade
                                          :mod (m2 / military))
                                    :ARG1-of (c2 / contrast-01
                                          :ARG2 (p4 / plutonium
                                                :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                                                      :location (p5 / plant
                                                            :mod (p6 / power)))
                                                :mod (c / commerce)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183.4 ::date 2013-05-28T11:52:56 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (w / warn-01
            :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency"))
            :ARG1 (o3 / open-01
                  :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))

                        :op1 (f / facility :name (n4 / name :op1 "Yongbyon"))
                        :op2 (i / intend-01
                              :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                              :mod (p / possible)))))
      :ARG1 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Britain"))
                  :ARG2 (o / official)))
      :extent (d / deep))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183.5 ::date 2013-05-28T11:54:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                  :location (w / warn-01
                        :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency"))
                        :ARG1 (i / intend-01
                              :ARG0 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))

                        :degree (m / most)))

                  :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 c))
            :extent (d2 / deep))
      :time (d / date-entity
            :weekday (t / thursday)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183.6 ::date 2013-05-28T11:59:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt The comments came after the IAEA accused the North Korean government of nuclear brinkmanship and said the North Korean government had begun work to reactivate the Yongbyon reactor in breach of a 940000 agreement with the United States Government.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183_6.txt

      :ARG1 (c2 / comment)
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (a2 / accuse-01
                        :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "IAEA"))
                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization

                                    :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
                        :ARG2 (b / brinkmanship
                              :mod (n3 / nucleus)))
                  :op2 (s / say-01
                        :ARG0 o
                        :ARG1 (b2 / begin-01
                              :ARG0 g
                              :ARG1 (w / work-01
                                    :ARG1 (r / reactivate-01
                                          :ARG1 (r2 / reactor :name (n5 / name :op1 "Yongbyon")))

                                          :ARG1 (a4 / agree-01
                                                :ARG2 (g3 / government-organization
                                                      :poss (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                                                :time (d / date-entity :year 1994)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183.11 ::date 2013-05-28T12:17:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

                                          :poss (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "IAEA"))

                                    :location (s2 / site))))

      :quant (m / more))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183.12 ::date 2013-05-28T12:20:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Experts say the spent rods could be used to build 3-6 atomic bombs within 6-8 months.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183_12.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p3 / person
                        :ARG1-of (e / expert-41))))
      :ARG1 (p / possible
            :domain (s2 / spend-00
                  :ARG1 (r / rod
                        :ARG1-of (u2 / use-01))
                  :ARG2 (b / build-01
                        :ARG1 (b2 / bomb
                              :mod (a / atom)
                              :quant (b3 / between :op1 3 :op2 6))
                        :time (w / within
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :unit (m / month)
                                    :quant (b4 / between :op1 6 :op2 8)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183.13 ::date 2013-05-28T12:22:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0183_13.txt

                        :mod (n2 / new)
                        :mod (l / light-water)))

                  :ARG3 (a2 / agree-01
                        :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                              :poss (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))

                                    :mod (n4 / nucleus))

                                          :ARG1-of (a3 / agree-01

                                                :ARG1 (f4 / facility :name (n5 / name :op1 "Yongbyon"))))))))))

                  :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Roh"))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / aide)))
      :ARG1 (s / state-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Lugar"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0325.25 ::date 2013-06-02T18:51:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Jun 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20021226_0325_25.txt

      :ARG0 (f / foreign-minister :name (n / name :op1 "Alexander" :op2 "Downer")
            :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Australia")))
      :ARG1 (s2 / suspend-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p / plan-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (o / open-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (e / embassy
                              :location (c2 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pyongyang")))))
            :purpose (a / avoid-01
                  :ARG0 c

                        :ARG1 (c3 / condone-01
                              :ARG0 c

                                    :mod (n4 / nucleus)

                              :mod (c2 / civilian)
                              :poss c)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.4 ::date 2013-06-06T18:34:43 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt European Space Agency is finalizing deal with Russian government to allow for Soyuz rockets to be launched from Europe's space command at Kourou, in French Guiana replacing phased-out Ariane-4 launchers.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628_4.txt
(f / finalize-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Space" :op3 "Agency"))
      :ARG1 (d / deal-01
            :accompanier (g2 / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))))
            :ARG0-of (a / allow-01
                  :ARG1 (l / launch-01
                        :ARG1 (r / rocket :name (n3 / name :op1 "Soyuz")
                              :ARG2-of (r2 / replace-01
                                    :ARG1 (r3 / rocket :name (n6 / name :op1 "Ariane-4")
                                          :ARG0-of (l2 / launch-01)
                                          :ARG1-of (p / phase-01))))
                        :location (f2 / facility
                              :location-of (c4 / command-02
                                    :mod (s / space))
                              :location (c2 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Kourou")
                                    :location (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "French" :op2 "Guiana")))
                              :poss (w / world-region :name (n7 / name :op1 "Europe")))))))

                        :mod (c2 / costly)
                        :purpose (a / accommodate-01

                                    :poss (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.6 ::date 2013-06-06T18:55:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Space" :op3 "Agency"))

            :ARG1 (d2 / deal-01
                  :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))))

                        :ARG1 (l / launch-01
                              :ARG1 (r / rocket :name (n5 / name :op1 "Soyuz"))

                                    :location-of (c2 / command-02
                                          :mod (s2 / space))

                        :mod (p / possible))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 10 :month 1 :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.7 ::date 2013-06-06T19:41:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The deal between the ESA and the Russian Government could be written as early as March 2003 and signed by the Russian government in April 2003.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628_7.txt
(p / possible
      :domain (a / and
            :op1 (w / write-01
                  :ARG1 (d3 / deal-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "ESA"))
                              :op2 (g2 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))))))
                  :time (a3 / as-early-as
                        :op1 (d / date-entity :month 3 :year 2003)))
            :op2 (s / sign-01
                  :ARG0 g2
                  :ARG1 d3
                  :time (d2 / date-entity :month 4 :year 2003))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.8 ::date 2013-06-07T08:44:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (m2 / missile :name (n2 / name :op1 "Ariane-4")
                        :ARG0-of (l / launch-01)
                        :ARG1-of (p / phase-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.9 ::date 2013-06-07T08:49:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (r / rocket :name (n / name :op1 "Ariane-4")

      :ARG1 (p / payload
            :quant (u / up-to
                  :op1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 2.8
                        :unit (t / ton))))
      :ARG4 (o / orbit-01
            :mod (g / geostationary)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.10 ::date 2013-06-07T08:58:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Spacecraft launched from Kourou benefit from the Earth's full rotational speed on the equator to aid their trajectory into space.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628_10.txt
(b / benefit-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / speed
            :mod (r / rotational)
            :mod (f / full)
            :poss (p / planet :name (n2 / name :op1 "Earth"))
            :prep-on (e / equator)
            :ARG0-of (a / aid-01
                  :ARG1 (t / trajectory
                        :destination (s3 / space)
                        :poss s)))
      :ARG1 (s / spacecraft
            :ARG1-of (l / launch-01
                  :location (c / city :name (n / name :op1 "Kourou")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.11 ::date 2013-06-07T18:08:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (s / spacecraft)
      :ARG1 (f / fuel
            :quant (l / less))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (m / momentum
                  :mod (e / extra)
                  :mod (t / this))))

                                    :unit (e / euro))

                                    :unit (e2 / euro)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.13 ::date 2013-06-07T18:40:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628_13.txt

      :op1 (e / experience-01
            :ARG0 (p / program
                  :mod (s / space)

                  :mod (f / funding)))

            :domain p
            :prep-to (c2 / contribute-01
                  :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant "1/3"
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / bill-01))
                  :ARG1-of (r / request-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "ESA"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.14 ::date 2013-06-07T19:19:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

                  :ARG3-of (p2 / pay-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / profit-01
                              :ARG1 (l2 / launch-01)))))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 11 :year 2002))

      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))

      :prep-in (c3 / create-01
            :ARG1 (c4 / company :name (n7 / name :op1 "Starsem")

                  :op1 (c5 / commercialize-01
                        :ARG1 (l / launch-01
                              :ARG1 (r / rocket :name (n3 / name :op1 "Soyuz"))
                              :location (f / facility :name (n4 / name :op1 "Baikonur" :op2 "Space" :op3 "Center")

                                    :poss c2)))
                  :op2 (m / market-01
                        :ARG1 l)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1996))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.17 ::date 2013-06-11T19:11:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030110_0628.18 ::date 2013-06-11T19:31:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (m / missile :name (n / name :op1 "Soyuz"))
      :ARG1 (l / launch-01
            :quant (o / over :op1 1700))
      :time (s / since
            :op1 (l2 / launch-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / satellite :name (n2 / name :op1 "Sputnik"))
                  :ord (o3 / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                  :prep-into (o2 / orbit-01)
                  :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1957))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.2 ::date 2013-06-11T19:43:35 ::snt-type country ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.3 ::date 2013-06-11T19:44:29 ::snt-type topic ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

(a / and
      :op1 (p / proliferate-01)
      :op2 (i / international)
      :op3 (p2 / politics))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.4 ::date 2013-06-11T19:45:59 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Prime Minister Koizumi meets with President Putin to demand that North Korea reverse NPT withdrawal.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_4.txt
(m / meet-03
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Koizumi")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                        :mod (p / prime))))
      :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Putin")
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p4 / president)))
      :purpose (d / demand-01
            :ARG1 (r / reverse-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                  :ARG1 (w / withdraw-01
                        :ARG2 (l / law :name (n5 / name :op1 "NPT"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.5 ::date 2013-06-11T20:01:11 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Koizumi pledges continued support for Russian disarmament.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_5.txt
(p / pledge-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Koizumi"))
      :ARG2 (c2 / continue-01
            :ARG1 (s / support-01
                  :ARG1 (d / disarm-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.6 ::date 2013-06-11T20:04:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt 20030111 Japanese Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi stated to a gathering of scientists at Kurchatov Research Institute in Moscow --
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Junichiro" :op2 "Koizumi")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :mod (p / prime))))
      :ARG2 (s2 / scientist
            :ARG1-of (g / gather-01
                  :location (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Kurchatov" :op2 "Research" :op3 "Institute")
                        :location (c2 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Moscow")))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 11 :month 1 :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.7 ::date 2013-06-11T20:31:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Japan demands that North Korea annul the 20030110 decision to withdraw from the nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT).
# ::save-date Wed Jun 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_7.txt
(d2 / demand-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
      :ARG1 (a / annul-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
            :ARG1 (d3 / decide-01
                  :ARG1 (w / withdraw-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG2 (l / law :name (n3 / name :op1 "Non-Proliferation" :op2 "Treaty")
                              :mod (n4 / nucleus)))
                  :time (d / date-entity :day 10 :month 1 :year 2003))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.8 ::date 2013-06-11T20:42:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Japan will collaborate with the International Atomic Energy Agency and countries including Russia to ensure North Korea's reversal.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_8.txt
(c4 / collaborate-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (g / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency"))
            :op2 (c5 / country
                  :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia")))))
      :ARG2 (e / ensure-01
            :ARG1 (r / reverse-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.9 ::date 2013-06-11T20:55:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

      :op1 (c2 / condemn-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Koizumi"))
            :ARG1 (d / decide-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
      :op2 (c3 / concern-01
            :ARG0 d
            :ARG1 p))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.10 ::date 2013-06-11T21:05:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt 20030110 Koizumi held a day-long summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_10.txt
(h / hold-04
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Koizumi"))
      :ARG1 (s / summit
            :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                  :unit (d2 / day)))
      :ARG2 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vladimir" :op2 "Putin")
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 10 :month 1 :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.11 ::date 2013-06-11T21:15:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Koizumi stated that Koizumi and Putin held identical views on the North Korean crisis.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_11.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Koizumi"))
      :ARG1 (h / hold-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 p3
                  :op2 (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Putin")))
            :ARG1 (v / view-02
                  :ARG1 (c2 / crisis
                        :mod (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
                  :mod (i / identical))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.12 ::date 2013-06-11T21:24:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Late 20030110 a Japanese spokesman stated to Interfax news that Koizumi encouraged Putin to employ the Russian government's influence on North Korean leadership in pursuing a reversal.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / spokesman)))
      :ARG1 (e / encourage-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Koizumi"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "Putin"))
            :ARG2 (e2 / employ-02
                  :ARG1 (i / influence-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Russia"))))
                        :ARG1 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))))
                  :ARG2 (p6 / pursue-01
                        :ARG1 (r / reverse-01))))
      :ARG2 (p4 / publication :name (n2 / name :op1 "Interfax"))
      :time (l2 / late
            :op1 (d / date-entity :day 10 :month 1 :year 2003)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.13 ::date 2013-06-12T15:15:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Putin consented to Koizumi's request and stated that dialogue with North Korean leader Kim Jong-Il was possible.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_13.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c2 / consent-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Putin"))
            :ARG1 (r / request-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Koizumi"))))
      :op2 (s / state-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (p5 / possible
                  :domain (d / dialogue
                        :prep-with (p3 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Kim" :op2 "Jong-Il")
                              :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                                    :ARG1 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.14 ::date 2013-06-13T17:20:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Koizumi stated that Russia, Japan, and the international community would benefit from improved bilateral relations if Russia and Japan could overcome previous disputes.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_14.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Koizumi"))
      :ARG1 (b / benefit-01
            :ARG0 (r / relate-01
                  :mod (b2 / bilateral)
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / improve-01))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :op2 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Japan"))
                  :op3 (c3 / community
                        :mod (i / international)))
            :condition (o / overcome-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 c
                        :op2 c2)
                  :ARG1 (d / dispute-01
                        :mod (p2 / previous))
                  :mod (p3 / possible))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.15 ::date 2013-06-13T17:34:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt In 1945 the Soviet Union seized 4 Southern Kuril Islands still claimed by Japan.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_15.txt
(s / seize-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))
      :ARG1 (i / island :quant 4
            :location (t / territory :name (n2 / name :op1 "Southern" :op2 "Kuril" :op3 "Islands"))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / claim-02
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Japan"))
                  :mod (s2 / still)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1945))
