# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.17 ::date 2013-06-13T17:39:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Japan will continue to assist Russia in dismantling weapons of mass destruction including decommissioned nuclear submarines for which Japan will allocate over 200 million dollars.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_17.txt
(c4 / continue-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
      :ARG1 (a / assist-01
            :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG2 (d2 / dismantle-01
                  :ARG1 (w / weapon
                        :ARG2-of (d3 / destroy-01
                              :degree (m2 / mass))
                        :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                              :ARG1 (s / submarines
                                    :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                                    :ARG1-of (d4 / decommission-01
                                          :purpose-of (a2 / allocate-01
                                                :ARG0 c
                                                :ARG1 (o / over
                                                      :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 200000000
                                                            :unit (d / dollar)))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.18 ::date 2013-06-13T18:10:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt The weapons should be neutralized immediately in the interest of global security.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_18.txt
(r / recommend-01
      :ARG1 (n / neutralize-01
            :ARG1 (w / weapon)
            :time (i / immediate)
            :prep-in (i2 / interest
                  :poss (s / secure-02
                        :ARG1 (g / globe)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.19 ::date 2013-06-13T18:46:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Japan will contribute 100 million dollars to the processing of weapons-grade plutonium to prevent appropriation by terrorists.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_19.txt
(c2 / contribute-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
      :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 100000000
            :unit (d / dollar))
      :ARG2 (p / process-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / plutonium
                  :mod (w / weapons-grade))
            :ARG0-of (p3 / prevent-01
                  :ARG1 (a / appropriate-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / terrorist)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.20 ::date 2013-06-13T18:54:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Japan has contributed 56 million dollars to scientific projects and will continue to cooperate with Russia.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_20.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c3 / contribute-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
            :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 56000000
                  :unit (d / dollar))
            :ARG2 (p / project
                  :mod (s / science)))
      :op2 (c4 / continue-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (c5 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.21 ::date 2013-06-13T18:59:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Russia has previously refused to pressure North Korea over defense policy.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_21.txt
(r / refuse-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
      :ARG1 (p / pressure-01
            :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
            :ARG2 (p2 / policy
                  :mod (d / defense)))
      :mod (p3 / previous))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.22 ::date 2013-06-13T19:21:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Analysts believe that Russia has limited authority to do so.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_22.txt
(b / believe-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (a / analyze-01))
      :ARG1 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / authority
                  :prep-to (d / do-02
                        :ARG1 (s / so))
                  :ARG1-of (l / limit-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136.23 ::date 2013-06-13T19:27:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Koizumi visited the grave of Japanese World War II prisoners in a cemetery at the donskoi monastery in Moscow.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030111_0136_23.txt
(v / visit-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Koizumi"))
      :ARG1 (g / grave
            :poss (p2 / person
                  :ARG1-of (i / imprison-01
                        :time (w / war :name (n3 / name :op1 "World" :op2 "War" :op3 "II")))
                  :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Japan")))
            :location (c3 / cemetery
                  :location (m / monastery :name (n5 / name :op1 "Donskoi")
                        :location (c2 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Moscow"))))))

      :op2 (r / return-01
            :ARG1 p
            :ARG4 (c2 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Tokyo"))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :day 12 :month 1 :year 2003)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196.4 ::date 2013-06-15T18:28:15 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196_4.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (d / disprove-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "India"))
                        :ARG2 (p3 / person
                              :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                                    :ARG2 (t / technology
                                          :mod (i / information))))))
            :ARG1 (p / phobia
                  :mod (a2 / attack-01
                        :mod (c2 / cyber))))
      :op2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 p2
            :ARG1 (o / overstate-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / threaten-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196.5 ::date 2013-06-15T18:39:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196.6 ::date 2013-06-15T18:57:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Director of the Indian Institute of Information Technology S. Sadagopan said the cyber attack is similar to the Y2K myth; although these things could happen, they will not happen.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196_6.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "S." :op2 "Sadagopan")
            :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Indian" :op2 "Institute" :op3 "of" :op4 "Information" :op5 "Technology"))
                  :ARG2 (d / director)))
      :ARG1 (r / resemble-01
            :ARG1 (a / attack-01
                  :mod (c / cyber))
            :ARG2 (m / myth :name (n3 / name :op1 "Y2K"))
            :concession (p / possible
                  :domain (h / happen-01
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :mod (t2 / this))
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / contrast-01
                              :ARG2 (h2 / happen-01 :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 t))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196.7 ::date 2013-06-15T19:39:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Y2K was a computer malfunction expected to occur when 1999 changed to 2000 but it did not inflict widespread damage.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196_7.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (e / expect-01
            :ARG1 (o / occur-01
                  :ARG1 (m / malfunction :name (n / name :op1 "Y2K")
                        :mod (c2 / computer))
                  :time (c3 / change-01
                        :ARG1 (y / year)
                        :ARG2 (d2 / date-entity :year 2000)
                        :ARG3 (d / date-entity :year 1999))))
      :ARG2 (i / inflict-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 m
            :ARG1 (d3 / damage-01
                  :mod (w / widespread))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196.8 ::date 2013-06-15T19:45:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sat Jun 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196_8.txt
(a / address-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Sadagopan"))
      :ARG2 (d / delegate)
      :location (c / conference
            :prep-on (s / security
                  :mod (i / information))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196.9 ::date 2013-06-15T20:08:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Sadagopan stated that these things happen with all technology if history is reviewed and that imaginative people can cause extraordinary problems even with primitive technology.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030120_0196_9.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Sadagopan"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / happen-01
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :mod (t2 / this))

                        :mod (a2 / all))

            :op2 (p5 / possible
                  :domain (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :mod (i / imaginative))
                        :ARG1 (p3 / problem
                              :mod (e / extraordinary)
                              :prep-with (t4 / technology
                                    :mod (p4 / primitive
                                          :mod (e2 / even))))))))

                                          :mod (n7 / nucleus)
                                          :poss c)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.10 ::date 2013-06-22T18:02:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt An official military statement said the physical protection and custodial controls at Pakistan's nuclear sites and facilities has been recently upgraded.
# ::save-date Sat Jun 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522_10.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (m / military)
      :ARG1 (u / upgrade-02
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / protect-01
                        :mod (p2 / physical))
                  :op2 (c2 / control-01
                        :mod (c3 / custodial))
                  :location (a2 / and
                        :op1 (s2 / site
                              :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                              :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
                        :op2 (f / facility
                              :mod n2
                              :poss c)))
            :mod (r / recent))
      :mod (o / official))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.11 ::date 2013-06-22T18:12:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522_11.txt

            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "NCA"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (t / tighten-01
                        :ARG1 (l / layer
                              :ARG1-of (d / differ-02)
                              :ARG0-of (d2 / defend-01))
                        :degree (f / further))
                  :op2 (e / enhance-01
                        :ARG1 (s2 / secure-02
                              :mod (p / physical)))
                  :op3 (e2 / ensure-01
                        :ARG1 (e3 / effective
                              :domain (s3 / safe-41

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.13 ::date 2013-06-22T20:12:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Scientists, engineers and military officers working in nuclear programs are routinely screened every 2 years according to a survey of Pakistan's nuclear security by Italy's arms control institution the Landau network.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522_13.txt
(s / screen-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s2 / scientist)
            :op2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (e / engineer-01))
            :op3 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (m / military)
                        :ARG2 (o / officer)))
            :ARG0-of (w / work-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / program
                        :mod (n5 / nucleus))))
      :manner (r / routine)
      :ARG1-of (s3 / say-01
            :ARG0 (s4 / survey-01
                  :ARG0 (i / institution :name (n4 / name :op1 "Landau" :op2 "Network")
                        :ARG0-of (c3 / control-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / arms))
                        :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Italy")))
                  :ARG1 (s5 / security
                        :mod (n3 / nucleus)
                        :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan")))))
      :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
            :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 2
                  :unit (y2 / year))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.14 ::date 2013-06-22T20:17:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522_14.txt

      :ARG1 (s / scientist :quant 2
            :mod (n4 / nucleus)

                              :ARG2 (a3 / agent)))
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (s2 / suspect-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / possible

                                          :ARG0 s
                                          :ARG1 (c2 / criminal-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Taliban"))))))))
      :time (b / before
            :op1 (n5 / now)
            :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 12
                  :unit (m / month))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.15 ::date 2013-06-22T20:22:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

(u / underline-01
      :ARG0 (a / arrest-01
            :mod (t / that)
            :mod (t3 / this))
      :ARG1 (f / fear-01
            :ARG1 (p / possible
                  :domain (f2 / fall-07
                        :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                              :mod (n / nucleus))

                              :part-of (e / extremist
                                    :poss (r / religious-group :name (n2 / name :op1 "Islam"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.16 ::date 2013-06-22T20:28:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Pakistan's government has been developing a nuclear program to match arch-rival India's since the 1970s and only went public with the program in 980500 when testing 5 nuclear devices.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522_16.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (d3 / develop-02
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))
            :ARG1 (p / program
                  :mod (n3 / nucleus))
            :purpose (m / match-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / program
                        :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                        :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India")
                              :mod (a2 / arch-rival))))
            :time (s / since
                  :op1 (d / date-entity :decade 1970)))
      :op2 (g3 / go-08
            :ARG1 g
            :ARG2 (p3 / public)
            :ARG3 p
            :time (d2 / date-entity :month 5 :year 1998
                  :time-of (t / test-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (d4 / device
                              :mod (n5 / nucleus))))
            :mod (o / only)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.17 ::date 2013-06-23T15:43:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Jane's Defence Weekly estimates that Pakistan's government possesses 25-50 nuclear warheads and has a uranium enrichment plant and plutonium reprocessing plant close to the capital Islamabad and at least 4 nuclear reactors across the country.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522_17.txt
(e / estimate-01
      :ARG0 (m / magazine :name (n / name :op1 "Jane's" :op2 "Defence" :op3 "Weekly"))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p / possess-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))
                  :ARG1 (w / warhead
                        :mod (n4 / nucleus
                              :quant (b / between :op1 25 :op2 50))))
            :op1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (p2 / plant
                              :location-of (e2 / enrich-01
                                    :ARG1 (u / uranium))
                              :location (c3 / close
                                    :op1 (c2 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Islamabad")
                                          :mod (c4 / capital))))
                        :op2 (p3 / plant
                              :location-of (r / reprocess-01
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / plutonium))
                              :location c3)
                        :op3 (r2 / reactor
                              :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                              :quant (a / at-least :op1 4)
                              :location (a4 / across
                                    :op1 c))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030122_0522.18 ::date 2013-06-23T16:26:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                              :ARG1 c))

                        :ARG1 (t3 / tension
                              :location (r2 / region))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030125_0226.20 ::date 2013-06-26T11:29:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :ARG2 (w3 / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "Kashmir"))

            :ARG1 (w / war-01 :quant 2
                  :subset-of (w2 / war-01 :quant 3
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India"))
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
                        :time (s2 / since
                              :op1 (d3 / depend-01 :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 (a / and
                                          :op1 c
                                          :op2 c2)
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Britain"))
                                    :time (d / date-entity :year 1947)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030125_0226.21 ::date 2013-06-26T11:36:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt An Indian insurgency has resulted in the deaths of more than 37500 people in 13 years.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030125_0226_21.txt
(r / result-01
      :ARG1 (i2 / insurgency
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "India")))
      :ARG2 (d / die-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :quant (m / more-than :op1 37500))
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (n2 / now)
                  :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 13
                        :unit (y / year)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030126_0212.9 ::date 2013-06-26T19:40:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred
# ::snt Traffic control sites worldwide registered decelerated email and other transmissions at at 0530 GMT on 20030125 but the private Internet-monitoring and network protection advising group cert and the national infrastructure Protection Center stated that activity normalized by 1500 GMT.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030126_0212_9.txt

                              :ARG1 (i / internet))
                        :ARG0-of (a3 / advise-01
                              :ARG2 (p2 / protect-01
                                    :ARG1 (n3 / network))))
                  :op2 (g2 / government-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Infrastructure" :op3 "Protection" :op4 "Center")))

                  :ARG1 (a4 / activity)
                  :time (b / by
                        :op1 (d2 / date-entity :time "15:00" :timezone "GMT")))))

# ::save-date Sat Jun 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030126_0212_32.txt
(r / require-01 :polarity -
      :ARG0 (w / worm)
      :ARG1 (i / initiate-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (u / use-01))
            :ARG1 (c / command
                  :example (o / open-01
                        :ARG1 (a / attachment
                              :mod (e / email)))))
      :purpose (i2 / infect-01
            :ARG1 (c2 / computer))
      :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01 :polarity -
            :ARG2 (v / virus)))

      :ARG0 (w / worm)
      :ARG1 (m / mechanism

                  :ARG1 w)

                  :ARG1 (f / flow-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / transmission
                              :mod (c3 / copious))

                              :mod (c2 / computer))))))

                  :ARG1 w

                        :ARG1 8000
                        :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (h / hour))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030128_0700.12 ::date 2013-07-09T13:21:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt A computer worm is unlike a computer virus and does not require a user to open an e-mail attachment or initiate any other type of command to infect the computer.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030128_0700_12.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (r / resemble-01 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (w / worm
                  :mod (c / computer))
            :ARG2 (v / virus
                  :mod (c2 / computer)))
      :op2 (r2 / require-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 w
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (o2 / open-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / attachment
                              :mod (e / e-mail)))
                  :op2 (i / initiate-01
                        :ARG1 (c4 / command
                              :poss (t / type
                                    :mod (o3 / other
                                          :mod (a3 / any)))))
                  :purpose (i2 / infect-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / computer)))
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (u / use-01))))

(f / find-01

            :ARG0-of (c / contain-01
                  :ARG1 (m / material
                        :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                              :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))))
            :accompanier (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Maung" :op2 "Maung" :op3 "Myint")
                  :mod (a / another)
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "National" :op2 "League" :op3 "for" :op4 "Democracy"))
                        :ARG2 (m2 / member)))))

                                                      :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                                            :ARG1 c))
                                                :ARG2 (o2 / official)))
                                    :op2 (s3 / scientist)
                                    :op3 (p3 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (e2 / engineer-01)))
                              :ARG2 (p2 / program
                                    :poss (c3 / country)
                                    :instrument-of (d2 / disarm-01)))))
            :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa")))
      :location (a5 / address-01 :name (n5 / name :op1 "State" :op2 "of" :op3 "the" :op4 "Nation" :op5 "Address")
            :ARG0 p)
      :time (d / date-entity :day 14 :month 2 :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.11 ::date 2013-07-11T11:16:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt South Africa dismantled a number of nuclear weapons 10 years ago and was recently praised for its model cooperation with weapons experts invited to inspect its sites.
# ::save-date Sat Sep 21, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578_11.txt
(a2 / and
      :op1 (d / dismantle-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa"))
            :ARG1 (w / weapon
                  :quant (n2 / number)
                  :mod (n3 / nucleus))
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (n4 / now)
                  :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 10
                        :unit (y / year))))
      :op2 (p / praise-01
            :ARG1 c
            :ARG2 (c2 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG1-of (i / invite-01
                              :ARG2 (i2 / inspect-01
                                    :ARG1 (s / site
                                          :poss c)))
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                                          :ARG2 (w2 / weapon)))))
                  :mod (m / model))
            :time (r / recent)))

                                    :ARG2 (p5 / person
                                          :ARG1-of (e / expert-41)))))

                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq")))

                              :ARG0 g)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.14 ::date 2013-07-11T11:25:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (t / team
            :consist-of (p8 / person :quant 7
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (p9 / person
                              :ARG1-of (e / expert-41)))))
      :ARG2 (a / and
            :op1 (p6 / person :name (n7 / name :op1 "Deon" :op2 "Smit"))
            :op2 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Ben" :op2 "Steyn"))
            :op3 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Phillip" :op2 "Coleman"))
            :op4 (p7 / person :name (n8 / name :op1 "super" :op2 "moloi"))
            :op5 (p3 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Daan" :op2 "van" :op3 "beeck"))
            :op6 (p4 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "Peter" :op2 "Goosen"))
            :op7 (p5 / person :name (n6 / name :op1 "Tom" :op2 "Markram"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.15 ::date 2013-07-11T11:27:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578_15.txt
(v / visit-01
      :ARG0 (t / team)
      :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iraq"))
      :manner (a / and
            :op1 (r / role
                  :mod (c2 / consult-01))
            :op2 (r2 / replace-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 t
                  :ARG2 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "UN"))
                              :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (i / inspect-01
                                          :ARG1 (w / weapon))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.19 ::date 2013-07-11T11:39:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

            :quant (a2 / all)

                  :ARG3 p)

                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (m / murder-01)
                              :op2 (d4 / defraud-01)
                              :op3 (d2 / deal-01
                                    :ARG1 (d3 / drug))))))

            :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa")))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2002))

                  :ARG1 (p2 / program :name (n3 / name :op1 "Project" :op2 "Coast")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.27 ::date 2013-07-11T11:59:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.28 ::date 2013-07-11T12:03:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "UN" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Council"))

            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "U.S."))
            :ARG1 (l / lead-01
                  :ARG1 (w / war-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iraq")))))
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (d3 / deliver-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "Hans" :op2 "Blix")
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n6 / name :op1 "UN"))

                                    :ARG0-of (i / inspect-01
                                          :ARG1 (w2 / weapon)
                                          :mod (c3 / chief)))))
                  :ARG1 (r / report-01
                        :mod (p3 / progress-01))
                  :ARG2 (b / body)
                  :time (d / date-entity :day 14 :month 2 :year 2003)))
      :time (w3 / week
            :mod (t2 / this)))

                  :mod (c3 / close)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.32 ::date 2013-07-11T14:56:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt In February 2003 Nobel Peace Prize laureate and former President Nelson Mandela stated that U.S. President George W. Bush lacked foresight, could not think properly, and would cause a world holocaust if the U.S. continued with plans to wage war against Iraq.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578_32.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Nelson" :op2 "Mandela")

                  :ARG2 (p7 / president)
                  :time (f2 / former))

                  :ARG2 (l2 / laureate
                        :mod (a / award :name (n / name :op1 "Nobel" :op2 "Peace" :op3 "Prize")))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (l / lack-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n7 / name :op1 "George" :op2 "W." :op3 "Bush")
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 c
                              :ARG2 (p5 / president)))
                  :ARG1 (f / foresee-01))
            :op2 (p3 / possible :polarity -
                  :domain (t / think-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :manner (p4 / proper)))
            :op3 (c4 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (h / holocaust
                        :mod (w / world))
                  :condition (c5 / continue-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.S."))
                        :ARG1 (p6 / plan-01
                              :ARG1 (w2 / wage-01
                                    :ARG1 (w3 / war-01)
                                    :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Iraq")))))))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 2 :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.33 ::date 2013-07-11T15:03:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Critics have stated that despite the dire effects an Iraqi conflict would have on the African continent South Africa needed to carefully assess balancing its economic relations with the United States with its serious opposition to a U.S.-led war.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578_33.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (c6 / criticize-01))
      :ARG1 (n6 / need-01
            :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa"))
            :ARG1 (a / assess-01
                  :ARG1 (b / balance-01
                        :ARG1 (r / relation
                              :mod (e / economic)
                              :poss c3
                              :prep-with (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                        :ARG2 (o / oppose-01
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 (w / war-01
                                    :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                                          :ARG0 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "U.S."))))
                              :manner (s2 / serious)))
                  :manner (c7 / careful))
            :concession (e2 / effect-01
                  :ARG0 (c8 / conflict-01
                        :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iraq")))
                  :ARG1 (c2 / continent :name (n2 / name :op1 "Africa"))
                  :mod (d / dire))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.34 ::date 2013-07-11T15:07:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt In his speech before parliament 14 February 2003 Mbeki referred to this criticism as most unfortunate stating --
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578_34.txt
(r / refer-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mbeki"))
      :ARG1 (c / criticize-01
            :mod (t / this)
            :mod (u / unfortunate
                  :degree (m / most)))
      :manner (s / state-01)
      :time (s2 / speak-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG2 (p2 / parliament))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 14 :month 2 :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.35 ::date 2013-07-11T15:09:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Critics suggest that the South African Government's behavior with regard to the United States Government should be governed by economic benefits that derive from AGOA (African Growth and Opportunity Act).
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578_35.txt
(s / suggest-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (c3 / criticize-01))
      :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG0 (b2 / benefit-01
                        :mod (e / economic)
                        :ARG1-of (d / derive-01
                              :ARG2 (o2 / organization :name (n6 / name :op1 "AGOA")
                                    :ARG0-of (m / mean-01
                                          :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "African" :op2 "Growth" :op3 "and" :op4 "Opportunity" :op5 "Act"))))))
                  :ARG1 (b / behave-01
                        :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa"))))
                        :manner (r3 / regard
                              :op1 (g4 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g5 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))))))

            :ARG0-of (g5 / govern-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578.37 ::date 2013-07-11T15:15:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt Differences on any issue have never pressured the South African Government into submitting to the United States' views.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030218_0578_37.txt
(p / pressure-01 :polarity -
      :ARG0 (d / difference
            :topic (i / issue
                  :mod (a / any)))
      :ARG1 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa"))))
      :ARG2 (s / submit-01
            :ARG2 (v / view-02
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
      :time (e / ever))

(a / and
      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
      :op3 (e / energy)
      :op4 (w / weapon)
      :op5 (p / politics))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.4 ::date 2013-07-11T15:20:04 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Iranian opposition group accused Iran of building banned uranium enrichment sites as part of a nuclear weapons program with goal of altering power balance in region.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697_4.txt
(a / accuse-01
      :ARG0 (g / group
            :ARG0-of (o / oppose-01)
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :ARG1 c
      :ARG2 (b / build-01
            :ARG1 (s / site
                  :location-of (e / enrich-01
                        :ARG1 (u / uranium))
                  :ARG1-of (b2 / ban-01))
            :manner (p / part-of
                  :op1 (p2 / program
                        :mod (w / weapon
                              :mod (n3 / nucleus))
                        :purpose (a2 / alter-01
                              :ARG1 (b3 / balance-01
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / power))
                              :location (r / region))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.5 ::date 2013-07-11T15:23:15 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "UN"))

                        :ARG0-of (i / inspect-01
                              :mod (n3 / nucleus)))))
      :ARG2 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :purpose (c2 / conduct-01
            :ARG1 (i2 / inspect-01
                  :ARG1 (s / site :quant 2))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.8 ::date 2013-07-11T15:34:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt U.S. Representative for NCRI soona samsami stated at a press conference in Washington D.C. that Iran's strategy is to build weapons of mass destruction and nuclear weapons in particular in order to alter the balance of power in the region in its favor and to facilitate export of fundamentalism and terrorism.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697_8.txt
(s2 / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n6 / name :op1 "soona" :op2 "samsami")
            :ARG0-of (r / represent-01
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "NCRI")))
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "U.S.")))
      :ARG1 (b / build-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (w / weapon
                        :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                              :degree (m / mass)))
                  :op2 (w2 / weapon
                        :mod (n8 / nucleus)
                        :mod (p3 / particular)))
            :purpose (a3 / and
                  :op1 (a2 / alter-01
                        :ARG1 (b2 / balance-01
                              :ARG1 (p4 / power))
                        :ARG2 (f / favor
                              :poss c2)
                        :location (r2 / region))
                  :op2 (f2 / facilitate-01
                        :ARG1 (e / export-01
                              :ARG1 (a4 / and
                                    :op1 (f3 / fundamentalism)
                                    :op2 (t / terrorism)))))
            :domain (s / strategy
                  :poss (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
      :location (c3 / conference
            :mod (p2 / press))
      :location (c4 / city :name (n7 / name :op1 "Washington" :op2 "D.C.")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.9 ::date 2013-07-11T15:42:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                        :ARG2 (p4 / person
                              :ARG0-of (i2 / inspect-01))))
            :op2 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Mohamed" :op2 "ElBaradei")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 o3
                        :ARG2 (d3 / director))))
      :ARG2 (c6 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :purpose (c2 / conduct-01
            :ARG1 (i / inspect-01

                        :location (c3 / city :name (n7 / name :op1 "Natanz"))
                        :location-of (c4 / conceal-01
                              :ARG0 (r / regime)
                              :ARG1 (c5 / centrifuge
                                    :mod (t / test))

                                    :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (r2 / represent-01
                                                :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n6 / name :op1 "NCRI")))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.10 ::date 2013-07-11T15:47:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (c2 / cluster-01
                        :ARG1 (w / warehouse)
                        :location-of (h / hide-01
                              :ARG0 (r / regime)
                              :ARG1 (c3 / centrifuge
                                    :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                                          :ARG2 (e / enrich-01
                                                :ARG1 (u2 / uranium
                                                      :ARG1-of (u3 / use-01
                                                            :ARG2 (w2 / weapon
                                                                  :mod (n5 / nucleus))
                                                            :mod (p3 / possible))))))
                              :ARG1-of (c4 / claim-01
                                    :ARG0 o2))))))

                        :mod (e2 / extract-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.13 ::date 2013-07-11T16:00:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697_13.txt

      :op1 (s / skeptic
            :domain (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "U.S."))))
            :topic (i / intend-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
      :op2 (s2 / state-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (m / make-06
                  :ARG1 (p / pursue-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (c4 / cycle
                              :mod (f / fuel)
                              :mod (c5 / complete)))
                  :ARG2 (s3 / sense)
                  :condition (p2 / pursue-01
                        :ARG0 (c3 / country)
                        :ARG1 (w / weapon
                              :mod (n4 / nucleus)))
                  :mod (o / only))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.14 ::date 2013-07-11T16:07:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt NCRI stated on 20 February 2003 that Iran's clerical rulers are also building and have tested missiles that would eventually have a range of 4000 to 6000 kilometers (2500 to 3700 miles).
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697_14.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "NCRI"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (b3 / build-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (r / rule-03
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))
                        :mod (c2 / cleric))
                  :ARG1 (m3 / missile
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                              :ARG1 (r2 / range
                                    :consist-of (b / between
                                          :op1 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 4000
                                                :unit (k / kilometer))
                                          :op2 (d3 / distance-quantity :quant 6000
                                                :unit (k2 / kilometer))))
                              :time (e / eventual)))
                  :mod (a2 / also))
            :op2 (t / test-01
                  :ARG1 m3))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 20 :month 2 :year 2003))

                                    :op1 c))))
            :op2 (s3 / supply-01
                  :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Institute" :op2 "for" :op3 "Science" :op4 "and" :op5 "International" :op6 "Security"))

            :ARG0 (a / anticipate-01
                  :ARG1 (i / inspect-01
                        :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "IAEA"))
                        :time (w / weekend
                              :mod (t / this))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.19 ::date 2013-07-11T16:28:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697_19.txt

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / bar-01
                  :ARG1 (e / enter-01
                        :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "IAEA"))
                        :ARG1 (b2 / building :quant 1
                              :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                                    :ARG2 (b3 / building :quant 5
                                          :mod (l2 / large)))
                              :location-of (l / locate-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / centrifuge)))))
            :op2 (c3 / claim-01
                  :ARG1 (r / resemble-01
                        :ARG1 b2
                        :ARG2 b3))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.20 ::date 2013-07-11T17:19:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred

            :poss (f / facility
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / suspect-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.21 ::date 2013-07-11T17:22:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "ElBaradei"))

            :ARG1 (i / inspect-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and

                                    :op1 (c2 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Tehran"))
                                    :direction (s4 / south)))
                        :op2 (s2 / site
                              :location (r2 / relative-position
                                    :op1 c2
                                    :direction (s3 / southwest))
                              :location (c5 / city :name (n8 / name :op1 "Arak")))))
            :time (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / date-entity :day 22 :month 2 :year 2003)
                  :op2 (d2 / date-entity :day 23 :month 2 :year 2003))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.22 ::date 2013-07-11T17:27:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "NCRI"))

                  :mod (h / heavy))
            :ARG3 (p2 / produce-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / plutonium))))

                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (d / disenchant-01

                                    :mod (p5 / precedent :polarity -))
                              :op2 (e / expand-01
                                    :ARG1 (r2 / resist-01

                              :ARG1 (h / hesitate-01 :polarity -

                                                :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01

                                                      :poss r)))))))
            :ARG2 (t / tenuous)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.26 ::date 2013-07-11T17:41:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred
# ::snt The Government of Iran revealed earlier this month that it had discovered uranium deposits near the central city of Yazd and that a uranium oxide plant had been completed in the central city of Isfahan and would be complemented by an enrichment plant now under construction near Kashan to its north.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697_26.txt
(r / reveal-01
      :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / discover-01
                  :ARG0 g2
                  :ARG1 (d2 / deposit-01
                        :ARG1 (u / uranium)
                        :location (n5 / near
                              :op1 (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Yazd")
                                    :mod (c4 / central)))))
            :op2 (c5 / complete-01
                  :ARG1 (p / plant
                        :mod (o / oxide
                              :mod (u2 / uranium))
                        :ARG2-of (c7 / complement-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / plant
                                    :mod (e / enrich-01)
                                    :ARG1-of (c8 / construct-01
                                          :time (n6 / now))
                                    :location (n7 / near
                                          :op1 (c9 / city :name (n8 / name :op1 "Kashan"))
                                          :location (r2 / relative-position
                                                :op1 (n9 / north))))))
                  :location (c3 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Isfahan")
                        :mod (c6 / central))))
      :time (m / month
            :mod (t / this)
            :time (e2 / early
                  :mod (m2 / more))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030220_0697.27 ::date 2013-07-12T10:22:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred

                  :mod (a / another)
                  :location (l / location
                        :ARG1-of (d / disclose-01 :polarity -)))
            :ARG1 (c4 / cycle)

                  :ARG1 (f2 / fuel
                        :mod (f3 / finish)

                              :degree (e / entire)
                              :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))))))

                                    :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                          :unit (y / year))))))
            :manner (d / delay-01 :polarity -))
      :ARG2 (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Indonesia"))
            :op2 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
            :op3 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Philippines"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030225_0785.27 ::date 2013-07-14T12:54:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-04 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030225_0785_27.txt

      :ARG0 (t / this)
      :ARG1 (i / issue
            :ARG1-of (r2 / relate-01
                  :ARG2 (t2 / trade-01
                        :ARG1 (d / drug)
                        :manner (i2 / illicit))
                  :manner (c / close))
            :ARG0-of (c2 / combat-01
                  :ARG1 (p / practice-01
                        :ARG1 t2))
            :ARG0-of (m2 / mean-01
                  :ARG1 (l / launder-00
                        :ARG1 (m3 / money)))))

# ::save-date Sat Sep 21, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030316_0321_4.txt

      :ARG0 (g / group
            :consist-of (p / person
                  :mod (p2 / province :name (n / name :op1 "Kashmir"))
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (m / militant))))
      :ARG1 (r / responsible-41
            :ARG1 g
            :ARG2 (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG1 (p4 / post
                        :mod (p5 / police)
                        :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India")))
                  :location (r2 / region
                        :ARG2-of (d / dispute-01))
                  :ARG0-of (k / kill-01
                        :ARG1 (p6 / person
                              :quant (a / at-least :op1 11))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030316_0321.5 ::date 2013-07-14T13:10:46 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                  :ARG2 (o / official)))

            :ARG0 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (i / infiltrate-01)
                  :mod (f / foreign)
                  :source (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
            :ARG1 (a / attack-01))
      :ARG1-of (c4 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (c5 / call-01
                  :ARG0 (g / group
                        :location (l / local)
                        :mod (p3 / province :name (n3 / name :op1 "Kashmir")))
                  :ARG1 c3
                  :ARG2 (p5 / propaganda
                        :ARG1-of (b / base-02 :polarity -)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030316_0321.6 ::date 2013-07-14T13:21:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt On 16 March 2003 Kashmiri militants claimed responsibility for an attack on a police post in the disputed state of Kashmir in India stating that they attacked to avenge the killing of their commanders by Indian troops.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030316_0321_6.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (m / militant))
            :mod s2)
      :ARG1 (r / responsible-41
            :ARG1 p
            :ARG2 (a / attack-01
                  :ARG1 (p4 / post
                        :mod (p5 / police)
                        :location (s2 / state :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kashmir")
                              :ARG2-of (d2 / dispute-01)
                              :location (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "India"))))))
      :manner (s3 / state-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :purpose (a3 / avenge-01
                        :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                              :ARG0 (t / troop
                                    :poss c)
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (c4 / commander
                                                :poss p)))))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 16 :month 3 :year 2003))

                  :time (r2 / recent)

                  :op1 (m / midnight))

                        :op1 (d2 / date-entity :day 16 :month 3 :year 2003))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030321_0363.4 ::date 2013-07-04T15:26:55 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Kazakhstan increased its air defenses to prevent any missiles fired during the Iraq war from threatening its Caspian coast.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030321_0363_4.txt
(i / increase-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Kazakhstan"))
      :ARG1 (d / defense
            :mod (a / air)
            :poss c)
      :purpose (p / prevent-01
            :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                  :ARG0 (m / missile
                        :mod (a2 / any)
                        :ARG1-of (f / fire-01
                              :time (d2 / during
                                    :op1 (w / war
                                          :location (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iraq"))))))
                  :ARG2 (c3 / coast
                        :part-of (s / sea :name (n5 / name :op1 "Caspian" :op2 "Sea"))
                        :location c))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030321_0363.5 ::date 2013-07-04T15:36:44 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-03 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Jul 4, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030321_0363_5.txt
(c / coast
      :mod (h / home
            :poss (i / installation
                  :poss (i2 / industry
                        :mod (o / oil))
                  :mod (v / vital))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030321_0363.6 ::date 2013-07-04T15:40:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt On March 21, 2003 a spokesman for the Central Asian country's defense ministry said Kazakhstan increased its air defenses to prevent any missiles fired during the Iraq war from threatening its Caspian coast.
# ::save-date Sun Sep 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030321_0363_6.txt

      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (m / ministry
                        :mod (d2 / defense)
                        :poss (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kazakhstan")
                              :mod (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "Central" :op2 "Asia"))))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / spokesman)))
      :ARG1 (i / increase-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (d3 / defense
                  :mod (a / air)
                  :poss c)
            :purpose (p / prevent-01
                  :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                        :ARG0 (m2 / missile
                              :mod (a2 / any)

                              :location c))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 21 :month 3 :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030330_0257.25 ::date 2013-08-13T08:06:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Aug 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030330_0257_25.txt
(p / possible
      :domain (o / or
            :op1 (p2 / pop-00
                  :ARG1 (t2 / they))
            :op2 (d / dissolve-01
                  :ARG1 t2
                  :ARG2 (w / water
                        :quant (g / glass)))
            :op3 (t / take-01
                  :ARG1 t2
                  :manner (i2 / intravenous))
            :op4 (a / and
                  :op1 (p3 / pulverize-01
                        :ARG1 t2)
                  :op2 (i / inhale-01
                        :ARG1 t2))
            :op5 (s / smoke-02
                  :ARG1 t2)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030330_0257.26 ::date 2013-08-13T08:13:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Aug 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030330_0257_26.txt
(p / pill
      :mod (t / type
            :quant (a / at-least :op1 90)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030330_0257.27 ::date 2013-08-13T15:03:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred

(a / and
      :op1 (e / easy

                  :ARG1 (d / drug :name (n2 / name :op1 "Yaa" :op2 "BAA"))))

            :ARG0 m

                  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (c3 / climate)))
            :ARG1-of (c4 / contrast-01
                  :ARG2 (d2 / drug
                        :mod (o / other)
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-03
                              :ARG1 c)))))

                        :mod (r2 / raw)

                        :ARG0 (p2 / plant
                              :mod (c2 / coca))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030403_0463.4 ::date 2013-08-20T15:55:16 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-01 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghanistan's Interior Minister states that Taliban is not capable of destabilizing the Afghan government despite post-winter increase in attacks on government and foreign targets in the country.
# ::save-date Tue Aug 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030403_0463_4.txt

      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :mod (i / interior))))
      :ARG1 (c4 / capable-41 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c2 / criminal-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taliban"))
            :ARG2 (d / destabilize-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c)))
            :concession (i2 / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (a / attack-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (t / target
                                    :mod (g3 / government-organization
                                          :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01)))
                              :op2 (t2 / target
                                    :mod (f / foreign))
                              :location c))
                  :time (p3 / post
                        :op1 (d2 / date-entity
                              :season (w / winter))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030403_0463.5 ::date 2013-08-20T16:24:30 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                  :ARG2 (a2 / attack-01)
                  :ARG3 (m2 / most))))

                              :mod (c6 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Britain")))

                              :mod (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Australia")))
                        :op4 (p9 / person
                              :mod (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Norway")))))
            :op2 (e / eject-01
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 a3
                  :ARG2 (h / homeland
                        :mod r)))
      :ARG2 (p5 / person
            :mod (r / religious-group :name (n5 / name :op1 "Muslim"))))

            :op2 (p3 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Al-Masri"))
            :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                  :ARG2 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Zawahiri"))))
      :ARG2 (p4 / person :quant 12
            :ARG2-of (s / suspect-01)
            :ARG1-of (w / want-01
                  :degree (m / most)))
      :ARG1-of (r / release-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (a4 / administrate-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
            :ARG1-of (f / follow-01
                  :ARG2 (a3 / attack-01
                        :time (d / date-entity :day 11 :month 9 :year 2001)))))

# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449_10.txt
(r / reject-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG3 (j / judge-01)))
      :ARG1 (a / appeal-02
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Rajavi"))
            :ARG2 (f / free-01
                  :ARG1 (p4 / person :quant 11
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (m / member)))
                  :ARG2 (d2 / detain-01
                        :ARG1 p4
                        :ARG3-of (p2 / prevent-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449.11 ::date 2013-05-04T13:22:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 17
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91

                  :ARG2 (m / member)))
      :ARG2 (i / investigate-01
            :ARG1 p2
            :mod (j / justice))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2003 :month 6 :day 22))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449.12 ::date 2013-05-04T13:29:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Rajavi"))

            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (m / member))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449.13 ::date 2013-05-04T13:34:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The investigation is the first step toward formal criminal charges for alleged links between the People's Mujahedeen and a terrorist organization and for funding terrorist activity.
# ::save-date Sun May 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449_13.txt
(s / step-01
  :ARG2 (c / charge-05
          :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (l / link-01
                         :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                 :op1 (c3 / criminal-organization
                                        :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "People's"
                                                :op2 "Mujahedeen"))
                                 :op2 (o2 / organization
                                        :mod (t / terrorism)))
                         :ARG1-of (a2 / allege-01))
                  :op2 (f2 / fund-01
                         :ARG1 (a4 / activity
                                 :mod (t2 / terrorism))))
          :mod (c2 / crime)
          :mod (f3 / formal))
  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)
  :domain (i / investigate-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449.14 ::date 2013-05-04T14:01:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Last week French police raided more than a dozen locations linked to the People's Mujahedeen northwest of Paris.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449_14.txt
(r / raid-01
      :ARG0 (p / police
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France")))
      :ARG1 (l / location
            :quant (m / more-than :op1 12)
            :ARG1-of (l2 / link-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / criminal-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "People's" :op2 "Mujahedeen")))
            :location (r2 / relative-position
                  :op1 (c2 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Paris"))
                  :direction (n4 / northwest)))
      :time (w / week
            :mod (l3 / last)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030624_0449.15 ::date 2013-05-04T14:26:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG2 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 c4
            :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France"))
            :ARG2 (p / plan-01
                  :ARG0 c4
                  :ARG1 (a2 / attack-01
                        :ARG0 c4
                        :ARG1 (i / interest
                              :mod (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran")))))
            :ARG2 (b / base
                  :mod (r / rear))))

             :ARG0 (i / injure-01
                     :ARG1-of (i2 / incur-01
                                :ARG0 (f / fire-04
                                        :ARG0 a
                                        :ARG1 a)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030630_0211.4 ::date 2013-05-04T17:18:30 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A 5 billion United States dollar North Korean nuclear reactor project is contingent upon progress of discussions between North Korea and South Korea regarding North Korea's desire to obtain nuclear weapons.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030630_0211_4.txt
(h / have-condition-91
      :ARG1 (p / project
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cost-01
                  :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 5000000000
                        :unit (d / dollar
                              :mod (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))
            :topic (r / reactor
                  :mod (n / nucleus))
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
      :ARG2 (p2 / progress-01
            :ARG1 (d2 / discuss-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (d3 / desire-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (o / obtain-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                    :mod (n5 / nucleus))))
                  :ARG2 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030630_0211.10 ::date 2013-05-05T06:21:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Wi Sung-lac stated that Charles Kartman stated that North Korea's participation in the multilateral talks proposed by the United States to settle the nuclear crisis would help Korean Peninsula Energy Development Organization resolve any policy differences over the North Korean nuclear reactor project.
# ::save-date Sun May 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030630_0211_10.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Wi"
                  :op2 "Sung-lac"))
  :ARG1 (s2 / state-01
          :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Charles"
                          :op2 "Kartman"))
          :ARG1 (h / help-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / participate-01
                          :ARG0 (c / country
                                  :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "North"
                                          :op2 "Korea"))
                          :ARG1 (t / talk-01
                                  :mod (m / multilateral)
                                  :ARG1-of (p6 / propose-01
                                             :ARG0 (c2 / country
                                                     :name (n5 / name
                                                             :op1 "United"
                                                             :op2 "States"))
                                             :purpose (s3 / settle-02
                                                        :ARG1 (c3 / crisis
                                                                :mod (n3 / nucleus))))))
                  :ARG1 (r / resolve-01
                          :ARG0 o
                          :ARG1 (d / differ-01
                                  :ARG2 (p5 / project
                                          :topic (r2 / reactor
                                                   :mod (n6 / nucleus))
                                          :mod c)
                                  :mod (p4 / policy)
                                  :mod (a / any)))
                  :ARG2 (o / organization
                          :name (n7 / name
                                  :op1 "Korean"
                                  :op2 "Peninsula"
                                  :op3 "Energy"
                                  :op4 "Development"

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030701_0214.5 ::date 2013-05-09T15:33:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                         :op1 "Vietnam")))

                                        :op1 "Australia"))

                                    :ARG2 c))

                         :mod (n6 / nationality
                                :name (n7 / name
                                        :op1 "Laos"))))
          :time (a3 / after
                  :op1 (u / uncover-01
                         :ARG0 (p / police
                                 :mod c)

                                 :quant 2
                                 :ARG0-of (t2 / traffic-00
                                            :ARG1 (d / drug)

                                                           :name (n9 / name
                                                                   :op1 "Laos"))

                                                           :name (n10 / name
                                                                   :op1 "Cambodia"))))))))
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :year 2003
          :month 7
          :day 1))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030701_0214.6 ::date 2013-05-09T15:47:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Vietnam News Agency said Australian national Tran Van Thanh was arrested on 30 June 2003 in the southern Vietnam city of dalat for Tran's involvement in a network smuggling heroin from Cambodia to Australia via Vietnam.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030701_0214_6.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / publication :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam" :op2 "News" :op3 "Agency"))
      :ARG1 (a / arrest-01
            :ARG1 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tran" :op2 "Van" :op3 "Thanh")
                  :mod (n3 / nationality :name (n4 / name :op1 "Australia")))
            :ARG2 (i / involve-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (n9 / network
                        :ARG0-of (s3 / smuggle-01
                              :ARG1 (h / heroin)
                              :ARG2 (c4 / country :name (n10 / name :op1 "Cambodia"))
                              :ARG3 (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Australia"))
                              :path (c6 / country :name (n12 / name :op1 "Vietnam")))))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2003 :month 6 :day 30)
            :location (c / city :name (n6 / name :op1 "Dalat")
                  :mod (s2 / south)
                  :location c6)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030701_0214.7 ::date 2013-05-09T16:19:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The news agency reports that police transferred Tran to Ho Chi Minh City where Tran's Vietnamese accomplice, Pham Dai Nhon, was arrested on 29 June 2003 with more than 600 grams (1.3 pounds) of heroin.
# ::save-date Fri May 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030701_0214_7.txt
(r / report-01
  :ARG0 (a / agency
          :mod (n / news))
  :ARG1 (t / transfer-01
          :ARG0 (p / police)
          :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Tran"))
          :ARG2 (c / city
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Ho"
                          :op2 "Chi"
                          :op3 "Minh"
                          :op4 "City")
                  :location-of (a2 / arrest-01
                                 :ARG1 (a4 / accomplice
                                         :name (n4 / name
                                                 :op1 "Pham"
                                                 :op2 "Dai"
                                                 :op3 "Nhon")
                                         :mod (c2 / country
                                                :name (n7 / name
                                                        :op1 "Vietnam"))
                                         :poss p2)
                                 :ARG2 (h / heroin
                                         :quant (m2 / more-than
                                                  :op1 (m3 / mass-quantity
                                                         :unit (g / gram)
                                                         :quant 600)))
                                 :time (d / date-entity
                                         :year 2003
                                         :month 6
                                         :day 29)))))

                 :ARG1 (m / missile)
                 :ARG2 (c3 / country
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Japan")))
         :time (c4 / current)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030715_0045.4 ::date 2013-05-05T16:08:56 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030715_0045_4.txt

      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Australia"))
      :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
            :ARG1 (s / strike-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG2 (w / weapon
                        :mod (n3 / nucleus))
                  :condition (p / participate-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (o / operation
                              :purpose (s2 / stop-03
                                    :ARG1 (s3 / ship)
                                    :ARG2 (t2 / traffic-00
                                          :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                                :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                                      :degree (m / mass))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030715_0045.5 ::date 2013-05-06T10:52:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 030715 Australian Foreign Minister Alexander Downer dismissed North Korea's threat to strike Australia with nuclear weapons if Australia participates in an United States led operation to stop ships from trafficking weapons of mass destruction.
# ::save-date Sat Sep 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030715_0045_5.txt

  :ARG0 (p2 / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Alexander"
                  :op2 "Downer")
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Australia"))
                     :ARG2 (m / minister
                             :mod (f / foreign))))
  :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
          :ARG0 (c2 / country
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "North"
                          :op2 "Korea"))
          :ARG1 (s / strike-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG2 (w / weapon
                          :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                  :condition (p / participate-01
                               :ARG0 c
                               :ARG1 (o / operation
                                       :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                                                  :ARG0 (c3 / country
                                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                                  :op1 "United"
                                                                  :op2 "States")))
                                       :purpose (s2 / stop-03
                                                  :ARG1 (s3 / ship)
                                                  :ARG2 (t2 / traffic-00
                                                          :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                                                  :ARG2-of (d3 / destroy-01
                                                                             :degree (m2 / mass)))))))))
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :year 2003
          :month 7
          :day 15))

                          :op2 "Korea"))

                  :ARG0 (s2 / ship
                          :mod (c3 / country
                                 :name (n5 / name
                                         :op1 "United"
                                         :op2 "States")))
                  :ARG1 (v / vessel
                          :mod c2)))
  :ARG2 (t / television
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "ABC")
          :location (c / city
                      :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Tokyo")))
  :time (l / late
          :op1 (d / date-entity
                 :year 2003
                 :month 7
                 :day 14)))

                         :quant 8000
                         :mod (f / fuel
                                :mod (n3 / nucleus)))
                 :location (f2 / facility
                             :name (n4 / name
                                     :op1 "Yongbyon")
                             :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                             :poss c
                             :ARG1-of (b / be-located-at-91
                                        :ARG2 (r3 / relative-position

                                                       :name (n6 / name
                                                               :op1 "Pyongyang"))
                                                :direction (n7 / north)))))
          :op2 (c3 / capable-41
                 :ARG1 c
                 :ARG2 (r4 / reach-01
                         :ARG1 (m / mainland
                                 :mod (c4 / country
                                        :name (n8 / name
                                                :op1 "Australia")))
                         :time (a2 / anytime)))))

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Kim" :op2 "Myong-Chol"))

            :op1 (m / monitor-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
