                              :ARG1-of (a3 / act-01
                                    :prep-toward c))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030715_0045.24 ::date 2013-05-07T09:31:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The comments by Kim Myong-Chol followed a strong warning by Howard on Sunday that war was not yet inevitable but the global community expected North Korea to wind back its nuclear weapons program.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030715_0045_24.txt
(f / follow-01
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (c / comment-02
                  :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Kim" :op2 "Myong-Chol"))))
      :ARG2 (w / warn-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Howard"))
            :ARG1 (c2 / contrast-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / possible
                        :domain (a / avoid-01
                              :ARG1 (w2 / war))
                        :time (y / yet))
                  :ARG2 (e / expect-01
                        :ARG0 (c3 / community
                              :mod (g / globe))
                        :ARG1 (w3 / wind-04
                              :ARG0 (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                              :ARG1 (p4 / program
                                    :ARG0-of (c5 / concern-02
                                          :ARG1 (w4 / weapon
                                                :mod (n4 / nucleus)))
                                    :poss c4))))
            :manner (s / strong)
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :weekday (s2 / sunday))))

                                          :ARG1 (p2 / plutonium))))))

      :degree (p3 / part))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.18 ::date 2013-05-09T14:19:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon May 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132_18.txt

  :ARG0 (u / urgency
          :poss (d / diplomacy
                  :poss g)
          :mod (n / new)
          :time (w / week
                  :mod (t / this)))
  :ARG1 (c / concern-01
          :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                             :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                     :name (n2 / name
                                             :op1 "China"))))
          :ARG1-of (i / increase-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.19 ::date 2013-05-09T14:36:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt At a foreign ministry briefing on 17 July 2003 spokesman Kong Quan stated that the North Korean crisis was at a critical point.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132_19.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Kong" :op2 "Quan")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (s2 / spokesman)))
      :ARG1 (b2 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (c / crisis
                  :mod (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
            :ARG2 (p / point
                  :mod (c2 / critical)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2003 :month 7 :day 17
            :time-of (b / brief-01
                  :mod (g / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.20 ::date 2013-05-09T15:06:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Kong Quan stated that China is attempting to deescalate the situation by promoting talks and encouraging the 2 parties to make peace.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132_20.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Kong"
                  :op2 "Quan"))
  :ARG1 (a / attempt-01
          :ARG0 (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "China"))
          :ARG1 (d / deescalate-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / situation)
                  :instrument (a2 / and
                                :op1 (p2 / promote-02
                                       :ARG0 c
                                       :ARG1 (t / talk-01))
                                :op2 (e / encourage-01
                                       :ARG0 c
                                       :ARG1 (p4 / party
                                               :quant 2)
                                       :ARG2 (m / make-18
                                               :ARG1 (p3 / peace)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.21 ::date 2013-05-09T15:22:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Kong Quan stated that it is important that the parties return to negotiations and continue with the trilateral talks that commenced in April 2003.
# ::save-date Fri May 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132_21.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Kong" :op2 "Quan"))
      :ARG1 (i / important
            :domain (a / and
                  :op1 (r / return-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / party)
                        :ARG4 (n2 / negotiate-01))
                  :op2 (c / continue-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (t / talk-01
                              :mod (t2 / trilateral)
                              :ARG1-of (c2 / commence-01
                                    :time (d / date-entity :year 2003 :month 4)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.22 ::date 2013-05-09T15:40:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The trilateral talks of April ended poorly with the North Korean government stating it possessed and might test nuclear weapons.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132_22.txt
(e / end-02
  :ARG1 (t / talk-01
          :mod (t2 / trilateral)
          :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 4))
  :ARG4 (s / state-01
          :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                             :ARG1 (c / country
                                     :name (n / name
                                             :op1 "North"
                                             :op2 "Korea"))))
          :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p2 / possess-01
                         :ARG0 g
                         :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                 :mod (n2 / nucleus)))
                  :op1 (p3 / possible
                         :domain (t3 / test-01
                                   :ARG0 g
                                   :ARG1 w))))
  :manner (p / poor))

                                          :mod (a3 / another))))))
            :time (n4 / now)
            :domain (t / talk-01
                  :mod (n2 / new))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.24 ::date 2013-05-09T03:55:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG1 (p / possible
          :domain (e / expand-01

                            :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (c / country
                                           :name (n / name
                                                   :op1 "Japan"))
                                    :op2 (c2 / country
                                           :name (n2 / name
                                                   :op1 "South"
                                                   :op2 "Korea")))
                            :ARG2 d)))
  :mod (a2 / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.28 ::date 2013-05-09T06:24:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(e / emphasize-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
      :ARG1 (i / important
            :degree (m / more)
            :domain (r / resume-01
                  :ARG1 (t / talk-01)
                  :manner (q / quick))
            :compared-to (r2 / refrain-01
                  :time (u / until
                        :op1 (p / possible
                              :domain (a / agree-01
                                    :ARG1 (n2 / number
                                          :quant-of (p2 / person
                                                :ARG0-of (p3 / participate-01)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.29 ::date 2013-05-09T06:39:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt China is a traditional ally and supplier of food and fuel to North Korea China and is therefore the country with the most leverage over North Korea.
# ::save-date Mon May 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132_29.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (a2 / ally-01
         :ARG1 c
         :ARG2 c2)
  :op2 (s / supply-01
         :ARG0 (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "China"))
         :ARG1 (a3 / and
                 :op1 (f / food)
                 :op2 (f2 / fuel))
         :ARG2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "North"
                         :op2 "Korea")))
  :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
             :ARG1 (l / leverage-00
                     :ARG0 c
                     :ARG1 c2
                     :degree (m / most)))
  :mod (t / tradition))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.30 ::date 2013-05-09T07:57:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (w / will-02
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (t / take-01
                  :ARG1 (a / advantage)
                  :ARG2 (l / leverage
                        :mod (t2 / this)))))

            :op1 (c2 / crisis)
            :degree (m / more))
      :duration (s3 / several
            :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                  :unit (d / day))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132.32 ::date 2013-05-08T13:04:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 2 days after North Korean leader Kim Jong-Il granted Dai the rare meeting for 14 July 2003 the regime's Korean Central News Agency announced that China had recently decided to donate 10000 tons of diesel oil to North Korea.
# ::save-date Sat May 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030718_0132_32.txt
(a / announce-01
  :ARG0 (p2 / publication
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Korean"
                  :op2 "Central"
                  :op3 "News"
                  :op4 "Agency")
          :poss (r / regime))
  :ARG1 (d / decide-01
          :ARG0 (c4 / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "China"))
          :ARG1 (d2 / donate-01
                  :ARG0 c4
                  :ARG1 (o3 / oil
                          :mod (d3 / diesel)
                          :quant (m / mass-quantity
                                   :quant 10000
                                   :unit (t / ton)))
                  :ARG2 (c2 / country
                          :name (n3 / name
                                  :op1 "North"
                                  :op2 "Korea")))
          :time (r2 / recent))
  :time (a2 / after
          :op1 (g / grant-01
                 :ARG0 (p3 / person
                         :name (n4 / name
                                 :op1 "Kim"
                                 :op2 "Jong-Il")
                         :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                                    :ARG1 c2))
                 :ARG1 (m2 / meet-03
                         :mod (r3 / rare)
                         :time (d5 / date-entity
                                 :year 2003
                                 :month 7
                                 :day 14))
                 :ARG2 (p / person
                         :name (n6 / name
                                 :op1 "Dai")))
          :quant (t2 / temporal-quantity
                   :quant 2
                   :unit (d4 / day))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030720_0053.4 ::date 2013-05-06T09:03:43 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Thailand will host ministers from China, Laos, India and Myanmar to discuss the elimination of precursor chemicals used in drug production.
# ::save-date Sat Sep 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030720_0053_4.txt
(h / host-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Thailand"))
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (p3 / person
                 :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                            :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                            :op1 "China"))
                            :ARG2 (m / minister)))
          :op2 (p4 / person
                 :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                            :ARG1 (c3 / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                            :op1 "Laos"))
                            :ARG2 (m2 / minister)))
          :op3 (p5 / person
                 :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                            :ARG1 (c4 / country
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                            :op1 "India"))
                            :ARG2 (m3 / minister)))
          :op4 (p6 / person
                 :ARG0-of (h5 / have-org-role-91
                            :ARG1 (c5 / country
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                            :op1 "Myanmar"))
                            :ARG2 (m4 / minister))))
  :purpose (d / discuss-01
             :ARG0 c
             :ARG1 (e / eliminate-01
                     :ARG1 (c6 / chemical
                             :mod (p / precursor)
                             :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                                        :ARG2 (p2 / produce-01
                                                :ARG1 (d2 / drug)))))
             :ARG2 a))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030720_0053.5 ::date 2013-05-06T09:32:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Officials report that ministers from China, Laos, India, Myanmar and Thailand will hold talks this week in the northern Thai town of Chiang Rai aimed at eliminating precursor chemicals used in drug production.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030720_0053_5.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (o / official)))
      :ARG1 (h / hold-04
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (p4 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c9 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :ARG2 (m2 / minister)))
                  :op2 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c10 / country :name (n10 / name :op1 "Laos"))
                              :ARG2 (m3 / minister)))
                  :op3 (p6 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h5 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c11 / country :name (n11 / name :op1 "India"))
                              :ARG2 (m4 / minister)))
                  :op4 (p7 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h6 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c12 / country :name (n12 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
                              :ARG2 (m5 / minister)))
                  :op5 (p8 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h7 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :ARG2 (m / minister))))
            :ARG1 (t3 / talk-01
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / aim-02
                        :ARG2 (e / eliminate-01
                              :ARG1 (c3 / chemical
                                    :mod (p / precursor)
                                    :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                                          :ARG2 (p2 / produce-01
                                                :ARG1 (d / drug))))))
                  :time (w / week
                        :mod (t / this))
                  :location (c / city :name (n / name :op1 "Chiang" :op2 "Rai")
                        :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Thailand"))
                        :mod (n3 / north)))))

  :duration (d / date-interval
              :op1 (d2 / date-entity

                     :month 7)

                     :year 2003
                     :day 25
                     :month 7))

  :location (c2 / corner
              :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                         :ARG2 (c / corner
                                 :part-of (w / world-region
                                            :name (n / name
                                                    :op1 "Golden"
                                                    :op2 "Triangle")))))
  :mod (k / kind
         :poss m))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030803_0475.5 ::date 2013-05-07T03:16:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                                      :mod (n4 / next)

                                                      :ARG1 c
                                                      :ARG2 (b2 / build-01
                                                            :ARG1 (b3 / bomb
                                                                  :mod (n6 / nucleus))))
                                                :mod (s3 / stage
                                                      :time (l / late)))))
                              :manner (s4 / strong)))))
      :medium (e / edition
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2003 :month 8 :day 4)))

                              :mod (i3 / intelligence))))
            :op2 (u / uncover-01
                  :ARG0 i

                              :ARG1 (m2 / mask-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030803_0475.7 ::date 2013-05-07T06:36:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 p3

                          :ARG1 (b / bomb))

                            :quant (m2 / much))

                  :mod (c2 / confidential)
                  :ARG1-of (p / prepare-01
                             :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                     :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                                :ARG1 (c5 / country
                                                        :name (n5 / name
                                                                :op1 "France"))))
                             :time (d / date-entity
                                     :year 2003
                                     :month 5)))
          :ARG1 (c6 / close-41
                  :ARG1 (c4 / country
                          :name (n4 / name
                                  :op1 "Iran"))
                  :ARG2 (h / have-03
                          :ARG0 c4
                          :ARG1 (o / or
                                  :op1 (u / uranium)
                                  :op2 (p2 / plutonium)
                                  :ARG1-of (e / enrich-01)
                                  :purpose (b / bomb)))
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / surprise-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030803_0475.12 ::date 2013-05-07T09:05:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                          :name (n2 / name

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030803_0475.14 ::date 2013-05-07T09:21:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Times report said that samples of uranium taken by UN inspectors in Iran in 030600 tested positive for enrichment levels high enough to be consistent with an attempt to build a nuclear weapon.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030803_0475_14.txt

          :poss (n / newspaper
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "The"
                          :op2 "Times")))

          :ARG1 (s2 / sample-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                     :ARG1 (o / organization
                                             :name (n3 / name
                                                     :op1 "UN"))
                                     :ARG3 (i / inspect-01)))
                  :ARG1 (u / uranium)
                  :location (c / country
                              :name (n4 / name
                                      :op1 "Iran"))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                          :year 2003
                          :month 6))
          :ARG2 (l / level
                  :mod (h / high
                         :ARG0-of (s3 / suffice-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / consistent
                                            :prep-with (a / attempt-01
                                                         :ARG1 (b / build-01
                                                                 :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                                                         :mod (n5 / nucleus))))
                                            :domain l)))
                  :mod (e / enrich-01))
          :mod (p / positive)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20030803_0475.15 ::date 2013-05-07T09:45:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :source (u / uranium))))
      :mod (a2 / also))

            :degree (m / more)

                        :op2 (b2 / begin-01)))

                   :polarity -)))

      :ARG0 (r / resolution)

            :ARG0-of (w / warn-01
                  :ARG1 (o / occasion-01
                        :ARG0 (b / breach-01
                              :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
                              :ARG1 (p2 / proliferate-01 :polarity -)
                              :degree (f / further)
                              :mod (a / any))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / action
                              :mod (s / stern))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20031129_0137.10 ::date 2013-05-06T14:51:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The US demanded that the Iranian government be brought before the UN Security Council for possible sanctions while Britain, France and Germany demanded that Iran be rewarded for cooperating with the IAEA since 20031000 but neither demand was met by the resolution.
# ::save-date Sun May 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20031129_0137_10.txt
(c8 / contrast-01
  :ARG1 (d / demand-01
          :ARG0 (c7 / country
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "US"))
          :ARG1 (b / bring-01
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                          :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                     :ARG1 (c / country
                                             :name (n2 / name
                                                     :op1 "Iran"))))
                  :ARG2 (b2 / before
                          :op1 (o / organization
                                 :name (n3 / name
                                         :op1 "Security"
                                         :op2 "Council")
                                 :mod (o2 / organization
                                        :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "UN"))))
                  :purpose (s4 / sanction-02
                             :mod (p / possible))))
  :ARG2 (d2 / demand-01
          :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (c3 / country
                         :name (n5 / name
                                 :op1 "Britain"))
                  :op2 (c4 / country
                         :name (n6 / name
                                 :op1 "France"))
                  :op3 (c5 / country
                         :name (n7 / name
                                 :op1 "Germany")))
          :ARG1 (r / reward-01
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG2 (c6 / cooperate-01
                          :ARG0 c
                          :ARG1 (o3 / organization
                                  :name (n8 / name
                                          :op1 "IAEA"))
                          :duration (s2 / since
                                      :time (d3 / date-entity
                                              :year 2003
                                              :month 10)))))
  :concession-of (m / meet-01
                   :ARG0 (r2 / resolution)
                   :ARG1 (a2 / and
                           :op1 c8
                           :op2 d2)
                   :polarity -))

            :ARG1 (u / uranium))

            :ARG1 (b / build-01
                  :ARG0 s
                  :ARG1 (c / confidence)))
      :ARG1-of (v / volunteer-01)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20031129_0137.14 ::date 2013-05-06T16:02:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran continues to refuse to indefinitely suspend its uranium enrichment activities and reserves the right to recommence enrichment at any moment.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20031129_0137_14.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c / continue-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (r / refuse-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (s / suspend-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (a2 / activity
                              :mod (e / enrich-01
                                    :ARG1 (u / uranium))
                              :poss c2)
                        :duration (i / indefinite :polarity -))))
      :op2 (r3 / reserve-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (e3 / entitle-01
                  :ARG1 (r2 / recommence-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 e
                        :time (m / moment
                              :mod (a3 / any))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20031129_0137.15 ::date 2013-05-07T02:18:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (e / enrich-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (u / uranium))
      :ARG1 (c2 / concern-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / possible
                  :domain (c3 / capable-41
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG2 (c4 / construct-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (b / bomb
                                    :mod (a / atom)))))
            :mod (i / international)))

          :mod (c3 / centre-left))
  :ARG1 (s / sell-01
          :ARG1 (f2 / facility
                  :mod (p2 / plutonium))
          :ARG1-of (p / propose-01)))

                 :mod (t / this))

                     :ARG0 a
                     :ARG1 (f / flu
                             :mod (b / bird))))

                :ARG1 (p2 / poultry

            :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                  :mod (l / law :polarity -))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040203_0804.9 ::date 2013-05-18T14:00:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040203_0804_9.txt

          :ARG0-of (s / smuggle-01
                     :ARG1 (p2 / poultry
                             :ARG0-of (l / live-01))))
  :time (r / recent)

              :location-of (c / check-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040203_0804.10 ::date 2013-05-18T14:05:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Most affected Asian countries have banned the import and export of live and slaughtered poultry to prevent the movement of potentially infected chickens and ducks across borders.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040203_0804_10.txt
(b / ban-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :location (c2 / continent
                      :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Asia"))
          :ARG1-of (a / affect-01)
          :quant (m / most))
  :ARG1 (a2 / and
          :op1 (i / import-01
                 :ARG0 c
                 :ARG1 (a6 / and
                         :op1 (p / poultry
                                :ARG0-of (l / live-01))
                         :op2 (p4 / poultry
                                :ARG1-of (s / slaughter-01))))
          :op2 (e / export-01
                 :ARG0 c
                 :ARG1 a6))
  :purpose (p2 / prevent-01
             :ARG0 c
             :ARG1 (m2 / move-01
                     :ARG1 (a4 / and
                             :op1 (c3 / chicken)
                             :op2 (d / duck)
                             :ARG1-of (i2 / infect-01
                                        :mod (p3 / potential)))
                     :ARG2 (a5 / across
                             :op1 (b2 / border)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040209_0175.4 ::date 2013-05-02T09:41:11 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Volkswagen AG rejects a Chinese newspaper report that it had put a stop to technology transfers of its Santana sedans to joint venture partner Shanghai Automotive Industry Corp (SAIC).
# ::save-date Fri May 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040209_0175_4.txt
(r / reject-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Volkswagen" :op2 "AG"))
      :ARG1 (r2 / report-01
            :ARG0 (n2 / newspaper
                  :mod (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))
            :ARG1 (s / stop-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (t / transfer-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                              :purpose (c4 / car-make :name (n4 / name :op1 "Santana")
                                    :poss c
                                    :mod (s2 / sedan)))
                        :ARG2 (c3 / company :name (n5 / name :op1 "Shanghai" :op2 "Automotive" :op3 "Industry" :op4 "Corp"))
                        :ARG1-of (p / partner-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :mod (v / venture
                                    :mod (j / joint)))))))

      :ARG1 (a / abandon-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Libya"))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / official)))
            :ARG1 (p / program
                  :topic (w / weapon
                        :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                              :degree (m / mass)))
                  :mod c)
            :ARG2-of (f / follow-01
                  :ARG1 (t / talk-01
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :ARG2 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p4 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Britain"))
                                          :ARG2 (o3 / official)))
                              :op2 (p5 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.S."))
                                          :ARG2 (o4 / official))))
                        :mod (s2 / secret)
                        :duration (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                    :unit (m3 / month))))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 19 :month 12 :year 2003))

                  :ARG0 o

                        :ARG1 (i2 / issue
                              :topic (s2 / security)))
                  :manner (m2 / massive)
                  :purpose (p2 / protect-01
                        :ARG0 o
                        :ARG1 (c2 / civilian)
                        :ARG2 (a / attack-01
                              :ARG0 (t / terrorist)
                              :ARG1 c2)
                        :manner (g2 / good
                              :degree (m3 / more))))))

          :ARG1-of (r2 / recommend-01)

                 :degree (m / most)))

          :ARG1-of (r3 / recommend-01)

                     :ARG0 (g / group)

                     :time (p / present-01
                             :ARG0 g
                             :ARG1 (t5 / thing
                                     :ARG1-of (c2 / conclude-01
                                                :ARG0 g)
                                     :mod (f / final))

                                   :op1 (n / now)

                                            :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                                   :quant 2
                                                   :unit (w / week))
                                            :op2 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                                   :quant 3

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040229_0048.4 ::date 2013-05-02T08:23:05 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt French anti-terrorist judge calls terrorism serious threat despite dispersal and weakening of al-Qaeda.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040229_0048_4.txt
(c / call-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))
            :ARG0-of (o / oppose-01
                  :ARG1 (t3 / terrorist))
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG3 (j / judge-01)))
      :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism)
      :ARG2 (t / threat
            :mod (s / serious))
      :concession (a2 / and
            :op1 (d / disperse-01

      :ARG1 (u / urge-01
            :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n5 / name :op1 "Amnesty" :op2 "International"))
            :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Laos"))
            :ARG2 (t / treat-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (r3 / rebel-01)
                        :mod (e / ethnic-group :name (n2 / name :op1 "Hmong"))
                        :ARG1-of (s / surrender-01))
                  :ARG2 (h / humane)))
      :ARG2 (c3 / claim-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 c2
                        :ARG2 (o / official)))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p3 / person :polarity -
                        :ARG0-of (r / rebel-01))
                  :op2 (i / insurgency :polarity -))))

                                 :op1 "Hmong"))
                  :quant (s2 / some

                                 :op1 "Thailand"))

                  :domain (t2 / take-12
                            :ARG0 (c5 / communism)

                                    :name (n4 / name
                                            :op1 "Laos"))

                                    :year 1975))))

          :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (r / rebel-01)
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / remain-01))

                  :mod (l / level
                         :mod (l2 / low))
                  :mod (e2 / effective
                         :polarity -))
          :duration (n5 / near
                      :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                             :unit (d2 / decade)
                             :quant 3))))

                                          :mod (h2 / high)))
                              :manner (p / peaceful))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040305_0056.26 ::date 2013-05-27T15:38:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040305_0056_26.txt

                        :mod c)
                  :ARG1 (o / offensive
                        :mod (n / new)
                        :prep-against (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (r3 / rebel-01))
                              :op2 (c3 / civilian)
                              :mod (e2 / ethnic-group :name (n6 / name :op1 "Hmong"))
                              :quant (m / multiple :op1 1000)))))
      :op2 (a4 / accuse-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (r2 / regime
                  :mod (c2 / communism))
            :ARG2 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 r2
                  :ARG1 (s / starve-01)
                  :ARG2 (w2 / weapon
                        :instrument-of (w3 / war))))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 1 :year 2004))

                                                :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                                       :quant 1
                                                       :unit (y / year))))
                         :time (c4 / current)))

                     :ARG1 g)))

            :ARG0 (s2 / situation
                  :location c)))

                 :time (a3 / after

             :ARG1 (l / location
                     :location-of (s2 / stop-01
                                    :ARG1 (n5 / narcotic
                                            :ARG1-of (t2 / transit-01)))
                     :domain c2
                     :mod (i / important))))

                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Macedonia"))
                        :op3 c
                        :op4 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Italy"))))

                  :ARG0 (a2 / and

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040508_0150.21 ::date 2013-05-19T07:23:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Albanian police forces have seized more than 200 kilos (440 pounds) of heroin and around 8 tons of cannabis between November 2003 and May 2004, double that which was seized in 2003.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040508_0150_21.txt
(s / seize-01
  :ARG0 (f / force
          :mod (p / police)
          :mod (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Albania")))
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (h / heroin
                 :quant (m / more-than
                          :op1 (m2 / mass-quantity
                                 :quant 200
                                 :unit (k / kilogram))))
          :op2 (c2 / cannabis
                 :quant (a2 / around
                          :op1 (m3 / mass-quantity
                                 :quant 8
                                 :unit (t / ton))))
          :ARG1-of (e / equal-01
                     :ARG2 (p2 / product-of
                             :op1 2
                             :op2 (m4 / mass-quantity
                                    :ARG1-of (s2 / seize-01
                                               :time (d4 / date-entity
                                                       :year 2003))))))
  :time (d5 / date-interval
          :op1 (d / date-entity
                 :year 2003
                 :month 11)
          :op2 (d2 / date-entity
                 :year 2004
                 :month 5)))

                              :ARG1-of (e2 / estimate-01))))))

            :ARG2-of (v / value-01
                  :ARG1 (n3 / narcotic
                        :ARG1-of (t / transit-01))))
      :ARG2 (r / rate-entity-91
            :ARG1 (o / over
                  :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 2000000000
                        :unit (d / dollar)))

                  :unit (y / year))))

                        :op1 (i / increase-01

                  :mod (m2 / methamphetamine))

            :ARG0-of (i / incinerate-01)

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Agusto" :op2 "Cesar" :op3 "Sandino"))

            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "US"))

            :ARG2-of (i / identical-41))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040720_0035.13 ::date 2013-05-15T05:19:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Suspected Chinese hackers attacked Taiwan President Chen Shui-bian's pro-independence Democratic Progressive Party's website.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040720_0035_13.txt
(a / attack-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / hack-04)
            :ARG1-of (s / suspect-01)
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
      :ARG2 (w / website
            :poss (p2 / political-party :name (n2 / name :op1 "Democratic" :op2 "Progressive" :op3 "Party")
                  :ARG0-of (f / favor-01
                        :ARG1 (d / depend-01 :polarity -))
                  :ARG1-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG0 (p4 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Chen" :op2 "Shui-bian")
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                                    :ARG2 (p3 / president)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040720_0035.14 ::date 2013-05-15T05:55:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Last week Hong Kong's Wen Wei Po daily newspaper quoted Chinese military sources as stating that Taiwan must rejoin China or face military action within 20 years.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20040720_0035_14.txt
(q / quote-01
      :ARG0 (n / newspaper :name (n2 / name :op1 "Wen" :op2 "Wei" :op3 "Po")
            :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (d / day)))
            :poss (c4 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong")))
      :ARG1 (s / source
            :mod (m / military)
            :mod (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China")))
      :ARG2 (s2 / state-01
            :ARG0 s
            :ARG1 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                  :ARG2 (o2 / or
                        :op1 (r / rejoin-01
                              :ARG0 c2
                              :ARG1 c)
                        :op2 (f / face-01
                              :ARG0 c2
                              :ARG1 (a / action
                                    :mod (m2 / military))
                              :time (w2 / within
                                    :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 20
                                          :unit (y / year)))))))
      :time (w / week
            :mod (l / last)))

                        :degree (v / very)))

            :prep-under (p2 / plan :name (n6 / name :op1 "8th" :op2 "Malaysian" :op3 "plan")
                  :time (d4 / date-interval
                        :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2001)

      :domain (a / attack-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / hack-04
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))))

            :time (r / run-06
                  :location (c5 / city :name (n7 / name :op1 "Beijing"))
                  :time (f / final
                        :mod (f2 / football)
                        :mod (b / between
                              :op1 c
                              :op2 c2)
                        :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                              :ARG2 (g4 / game :name (n8 / name :op1 "Asian" :op2 "Cup")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050222_0430.4 ::date 2013-05-21T18:08:34 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghanistan's new special narcotics force seized and destroyed more than four tons of drugs, seized equipment and weapons, and detained 10 people in a major operation in southern Helmand province.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050222_0430_4.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s / seize-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Special" :op2 "Narcotics" :op3 "Force")
                  :mod (n2 / new)
                  :poss (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d3 / drug
                        :quant (m / more-than
                              :op1 (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 4
                                    :unit (t / ton))))
                  :op2 (e / equipment)
                  :op3 (w / weapon)))
      :op2 (d / destroy-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 d3)
      :op3 (d2 / detain-01
            :ARG1 (p / person :quant 10))
      :subevent-of (o2 / operation
            :location (p2 / province :name (n4 / name :op1 "Helmand")
                  :mod (s2 / south))
            :mod (m3 / major)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050222_0430.5 ::date 2013-05-21T18:21:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Afghanistan Interior Ministry made a statement 050222 that approximately 47 kilograms (103 pounds) of brown heroin, 830 kilograms of opium, 3.5 tons of hashish and an opium press had been destroyed by the special Narcotics Force.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050222_0430_5.txt

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Interior" :op2 "Ministry")
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))

            :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Special" :op2 "Narcotics" :op3 "Force"))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / heroin
                        :mod (b / brown)
                        :quant (a3 / approximately
                              :op1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 47
                                    :unit (k / kilogram))))
                  :op2 (o2 / opium
                        :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 830
                              :unit (k2 / kilogram)))
                  :op3 (h2 / hashish
                        :quant (m3 / mass-quantity :quant 3.5
                              :unit (t / ton)))
                  :op4 (p / press
                        :mod o2)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2005 :month 2 :day 22))

                                       :op1 "Chinese")))

                                            :poss c)))))

          :year 2000)

                         :mod c)

      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (c / crime)
      :op3 (b / business)
      :op4 (t / technology)
      :op5 (t2 / telecommunication))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050321_0150.4 ::date 2013-05-15T12:24:27 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Taiwan's chip company United Microelectronics Corp (UMC) announced on March 21, 2005 that it would obtain a 15 percent stake in China-based chipmaker hejian technology through a compensation package.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050321_0150_4.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Microelectronics" :op3 "Corp")
            :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
            :mod (c7 / chip))
      :ARG1 (o / obtain-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (s / stake
                  :quant (p / percentage-entity :unit 15)
                  :mod (c3 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Hejian" :op2 "Technology")
                        :ARG0-of (m / make-01
                              :ARG1 (c6 / chip))
                        :ARG1-of (b / base-01
                              :location (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China")))))
            :instrument (p2 / package
                  :ARG1-of (c5 / compensate-01)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2005 :month 3 :day 21))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050601_0389.7 ::date 2013-05-24T06:30:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt If it installs successfully, ransomware encrypts text files and displays a ransom note demanding 200 dollars to supply decryption software to restore the data to its original form.
# ::save-date Mon May 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050601_0389_7.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (e / encrypt-01
         :ARG0 (r3 / ransomware)
         :ARG1 (f / file
                 :mod (t / text)))
  :op2 (d / display-01
         :ARG0 r3
         :ARG1 (n2 / note
                 :mod (r / ransom)
                 :ARG0-of (d2 / demand-01
                            :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity
                                    :quant 200
                                    :unit (d3 / dollar))
                            :condition-of (s2 / supply-01
                                            :ARG1 (s3 / software
                                                    :ARG0-of (d4 / decrypt-00)
                                                    :instrument-of (r2 / restore-01
                                                                     :ARG1 (d5 / data)
                                                                     :ARG2 (f2 / form
                                                                             :mod (o / original)
                                                                             :poss d5)))))))
  :condition (i / install-01
               :ARG1 r3
               :manner (s / success)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050601_0389.9 ::date 2013-05-26T17:06:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (h / horse
            :mod (c / city :name (n / name :op1 "Troy"))

                  :source (m / machine)
                  :destination (m2 / machine)))

            :ARG1-of r))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050601_0389.10 ::date 2013-05-24T07:21:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :location (b3 / browser

                                    :ARG1 (w2 / web))
                              :poss (v / victim))))
            :op2 (s2 / scan-01
                  :ARG0 r
                  :ARG1 (d / drive
                        :poss (h / hard))
                  :time (t / then))
            :op3 (e2 / encrypt-01
                  :ARG0 r
                  :ARG1 (d2 / document
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / base-02
                              :ARG2 (t2 / text))
                        :ARG1-of (f / find-01
                              :ARG0 r)
                        :mod (a2 / any)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056.19 ::date 2013-05-26T14:52:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Anti-Syrian journalist Samir kassir was killed June 2, 2005 when a bomb exploded under kassir's car in Beirut.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056_19.txt
(k / kill-01
  :ARG1 (j2 / journalist
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Samir"
                  :op2 "Kassir")
          :ARG0-of (o / oppose-01
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "Syria"))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2005
          :month 6
          :day 2)
  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
             :ARG0 (e / explode-01
                     :ARG1 (b / bomb)
                     :location (u / under
                                 :op1 (c3 / car
                                        :poss j2))
                     :location (c4 / city
                                 :name (n3 / name
                                         :op1 "Beirut")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056.20 ::date 2013-05-26T14:47:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The attack is blamed on the pro-Syrian regime and widely condemned at home and abroad.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056_20.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (b / blame-01
         :ARG1 (r / regime
                 :ARG0-of (f / favor-01
                            :ARG1 (c / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                            :op1 "Syria"))))
         :ARG2 (a2 / attack-01))
  :op2 (c2 / condemn-01
         :ARG1 a2
         :extent (w / wide)
         :location (a3 / and
                     :op1 (h / home)
                     :op2 (a4 / abroad))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056.21 ::date 2013-05-26T14:36:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-07 ::preferred
# ::snt Syria angrily denied the accusations through its official news agency, SANA.
# ::save-date Sun May 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056_21.txt
(d / deny-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Syria"))
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :ARG2-of (a2 / accuse-01))
      :manner (a / angry)
      :medium (a3 / agency :name (n2 / name :op1 "SANA")
            :mod (n3 / news)
            :mod (o / official)
            :poss c))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056.22 ::date 2013-05-26T14:10:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Israeli officials said the Syrian missiles were launched from northern Syria Newar minakh.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056_22.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Israel"))
                  :ARG2 (o / official)))
      :ARG1 (l / launch-01
            :ARG1 (m / missile
                  :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Syria")))
            :source (c3 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Minakh")
                  :mod (e / ethnic-group :name (n4 / name :op1 "Newar"))
                  :location (n5 / north
                        :part-of c2))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056.23 ::date 2013-05-26T13:50:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt One was sent about 400 kilometers (250 miles) to southernmost Syria near the Jordanian border.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056_23.txt
(s / send-01
  :ARG1 (o / one)
  :ARG2 (r / relative-position
          :op1 (s2 / southernmost
                 :op1 (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                                :op1 "Syria")))
          :op2 (n2 / near
                 :op1 (l / location
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / border-01
                                   :ARG2 (c2 / country
                                           :name (n3 / name
                                                   :op1 "Jordan")))))
          :quant (d / distance-quantity
                   :quant 400
                   :unit (k / kilometer))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056.24 ::date 2013-05-26T08:44:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-07 ::preferred
# ::snt The missile that that broke up was launched southwest toward the Mediterranean, over the Turkish province of Hatay and shed debris over two villages there.
# ::save-date Sun May 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056_24.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (l / launch-01
            :ARG1 (m / missile
                  :ARG1-of (b / break-08))
            :direction (s / southwest)
            :direction (s2 / sea :name (n / name :op1 "Mediterranean"))
            :direction (o / over
                  :op1 (p / province :name (n2 / name :op1 "Hatay")
                        :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Turkey")))))
      :op2 (s3 / shed-03
            :ARG0 m
            :ARG1 (d / debris)
            :ARG2 (o2 / over
                  :op1 (v / village :quant 2
                        :location p))))

            :ARG1 (f / film

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050603_0056.26 ::date 2013-05-26T08:34:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (a / ambassador
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Osman"
                  :op2 "Faruk"
                  :op3 "Logoglu")
          :mod (c / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Turkey"))
          :location (c2 / country
                      :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "United"
                              :op2 "States")))
  :ARG1 (c3 / casualty
          :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                     :ARG0 (b / break-08
                             :ARG1 (m / missile)))
          :polarity -)
  :ARG2 (p / publication
          :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "New"
                  :op3 "York"
                  :op4 "Times")))

      :ARG1 (a2 / apologize-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Syria"))

                  :mod (t / technique))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.4 ::date 2013-05-26T15:48:46 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-07 ::preferred
# ::snt Taiwan successfully fired its first cruise missile.
# ::save-date Sun May 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_4.txt
(f / fire-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
      :ARG1 (m / missile
            :mod (c2 / cruise)
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)
            :poss c)
      :manner (s / success))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.5 ::date 2013-05-26T13:45:20 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This will enable Taiwan to hit major military targets in southeast China.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_5.txt
(e / enable-01
  :ARG0 (t / this)
  :ARG1 (h / hit-01
          :ARG0 c
          :ARG1 (t2 / target
                  :mod (m / military)
                  :mod (m2 / major)
                  :location (c2 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                      :op1 "China")
                              :mod (s / southeast))))
  :ARG2 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Taiwan")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.6 ::date 2013-05-26T06:36:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 050605 the China Times reported that Taiwan has successfully test fired the Hsiung Feng its first cruise missile enabling Taiwan to hit major military targets in southeast China.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_6.txt
(r / report-01
  :ARG0 (p / publication
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "China"
                  :op3 "Times"))
  :ARG1 (f2 / fire-01
          :ARG0 (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Taiwan"))
          :ARG1 (m / missile
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Hsiung"
                          :op2 "Feng")
                  :mod (c2 / cruise)
                  :poss c
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1))
          :manner (s / success)
          :ARG1-of (t / test-01)
          :ARG0-of (e / enable-01
                     :ARG1 (h / hit-01
                             :ARG0 c
                             :ARG1 (t2 / target
                                     :location (c3 / country
                                                 :name (n4 / name
                                                         :op1 "China")
                                                 :mod (s2 / southeast))
                                     :mod (m2 / military)
                                     :mod (m3 / major)))
                     :ARG2 c))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2005
          :month 6
          :day 5))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.7 ::date 2013-05-24T04:40:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The China Times stated that the Hsiung Feng cruise missile was developed by the military-run chungshan Institute of Science and Technology, has a range of 1,000 kilometers (600 miles) and could be used to attack military bases in southeast China.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_7.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p / publication
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "China"
                  :op3 "Times"))
  :ARG1 (d / develop-02
          :ARG0 (r / research-institute
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Chungshan"
                          :op2 "Institute"
                          :op3 "of"
                          :op4 "Science"
                          :op5 "and"
                          :op6 "Technology")
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / run-01
                             :ARG0 (m2 / military)))
          :ARG1 (m / missile
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Hsiung"
                          :op2 "Feng")
                  :mod (c / cruise)
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                             :ARG1 (r3 / range-01
                                     :ARG4 (d2 / distance-quantity
                                             :quant 1000
                                             :unit (k / kilometer))))
                  :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                             :ARG2 (a / attack-01
                                     :ARG1 (b / base
                                             :mod (m3 / military)
                                             :location (c2 / country
                                                         :name (n4 / name
                                                                 :op1 "China")
                                                         :mod (s2 / southeast))))
                             :mod (p2 / possible)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.8 ::date 2013-05-24T05:03:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The China Times stated that once the missile was deployed it would mark the first time that Taiwan is able to put strategic weapons into use and that the political and military impact of this would be far-reaching.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_8.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p / publication
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "China"
                  :op3 "Times"))
  :ARG1 (d / deploy-01
          :ARG1 (m2 / missile)
          :ARG0-of (m / mark-01
                     :ARG1 (u / use-01
                             :ARG0 (c / country
                                     :name (n2 / name
                                             :op1 "Taiwan"))
                             :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                     :mod (s2 / strategy))
                             :mod (p2 / possible)
                             :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)))
          :ARG0-of (i / impact-01
                     :ARG1 (a2 / and
                             :op1 (p3 / politics)
                             :op2 (m3 / military))
                     :ARG0-of (r / reach-01
                                :extent (f2 / far)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.9 ::date 2013-05-24T06:07:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Times said Defense Minister Lee jye witnessed the test firing of the missile from chiupeng military base in the southern Pingtung County and that the missile flew over 500 kilometers (300 miles) before hitting its target.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_9.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (p / publication
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "The"
                  :op2 "Times"))
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (w / witness-01
                 :ARG0 (p2 / person
                         :name (n2 / name
                                 :op1 "Lee"
                                 :op2 "Jye")
                         :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (m / minister
                                            :mod (d / defense))))
                 :ARG1 (f / fire-01
                         :ARG1 (m2 / missile)
                         :ARG1-of (t / test-01)
                         :source (b / base
                                   :name (n3 / name
                                           :op1 "Chiupeng")
                                   :mod (m3 / military)
                                   :location (c / county
                                               :name (n4 / name
                                                       :op1 "Pingtung")
                                               :mod (s2 / south)))))
          :op2 (f2 / fly-01
                 :ARG1 m2
                 :time (b2 / before
                         :op1 (h / hit-02
                                :ARG0 m2
                                :ARG1 (t2 / target
                                        :poss m2)))
                 :quant (o / over
                          :op1 (d2 / distance-quantity
                                 :quant 500
                                 :unit (k / kilometer))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.10 ::date 2013-05-26T13:42:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :ARG1 (r / report)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.11 ::date 2013-05-26T13:22:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The report did not specify when the test took place but speculated that it could have been in March.
# ::save-date Tue May 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_11.txt
(c / contrast-01
  :ARG0 r
  :ARG1 (s / specify-01
          :ARG0 (r / report)
          :ARG1 (t / time
                  :time-of (t2 / test
                             :ARG1-of (t3 / take-14
                                        :ARG2 (p / place))))
          :polarity -)
  :ARG2 (s2 / speculate-01
          :ARG0 r
          :ARG1 (p2 / possible
                  :domain (d / date-entity
                            :month 3
                            :time-of t2))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.12 ::date 2013-05-26T13:13:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(e / expect-01
      :ARG1 (p / produce-01
            :ARG1 (m / missile)
            :ARG1-of (p2 / pilot-01)
            :time (l / late
                  :op1 (o / or
                        :op1 (d / date-entity :year 2005)
                        :op2 (d2 / date-entity :year 2006))
                  :degree (m2 / more))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.13 ::date 2013-05-26T13:03:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-07 ::preferred

            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (c2 / capable-41
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG2 (d / defend-01
                        :ARG2 (m / missile)))
            :purpose (c3 / counter-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                        :ARG0 (c4 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                        :ARG2 c
                        :mod (m2 / military)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.15 ::date 2013-05-24T16:47:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Taiwan's cabinet approved a revised arms deal with the United States in 050500 worth almost 15.5 billion dollars after a previous proposal was rejected by parliament.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_15.txt
(a / approve-01
      :ARG0 (c / cabinet
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Taiwan")))
      :ARG1 (d / deal-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
            :topic (a2 / arm)
            :ARG1-of (r / revise-01)
            :ARG1-of (c4 / cost-01
                  :ARG2 (a4 / almost
                        :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 15500000000
                              :unit (d3 / dollar)))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2005 :month 5)
      :time (a3 / after
            :op1 (r2 / reject-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Parliament"))
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (p / propose-01
                              :time (p2 / previous))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.16 ::date 2013-05-24T15:15:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The arms package over a 15-year period beginning in 050000 includes 8 conventional submarines, a modified version of the Patriot anti-missile system and a fleet of anti-submarine aircraft.
# ::save-date Wed May 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_16.txt
(i / include-01
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s / submarine :quant 8
                  :mod (c / convention))
            :op2 (s2 / system :name (n / name :op1 "Patriot")
                  :mod (v / version
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / modify-01))
                  :ARG0-of (c3 / counter-01
                        :ARG1 (m / missile)))
            :op3 (f / fleet
                  :consist-of (a3 / aircraft
                        :ARG0-of (c2 / counter-01
                              :ARG1 (s3 / submarine)))))
      :ARG2 (p / package
            :consist-of (a / arm)
            :duration (o3 / over
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 15
                        :unit (y / year)
                        :ARG1-of (b / begin-01
                              :time (d / date-entity :year 2005))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.17 ::date 2013-05-26T12:18:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-07 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (p2 / package)
      :ARG2 (a / approve-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Parliament"))
            :mod (f / final)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.18 ::date 2013-05-26T08:03:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This large budget proposal has provoked debate Taiwan as critics said the spending could further provoke China and heighten cross-strait tensions.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_18.txt
(p / provoke-01
      :ARG0 (t2 / thing
            :ARG1-of (p2 / propose-01)
            :mod (b / budget
                  :mod (l / large))
            :mod (t3 / this))
      :ARG1 (d / debate-01
            :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Taiwan")))
      :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (s / say-01
                  :ARG0 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (c3 / criticize-01))
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p3 / provoke-01
                              :ARG0 (s2 / spend-01)
                              :ARG2 (c4 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :mod (p4 / possible)
                              :extent (f / further))
                        :op2 (h / heighten-01
                              :ARG0 s2
                              :ARG1 (t / tension
                                    :ARG0-of (c6 / cross-02
                                          :ARG1 (s3 / strait))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444.19 ::date 2013-05-24T04:05:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt China considers Taiwan part of its territory awaiting reunification since they split at the end of the civil war in 490000, and has repeatedly threatened to invade if Taiwan moves towards formal independence.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050604_0444_19.txt
(a3 / and
      :op1 (c / consider-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
            :ARG1 (h / have-part-91
                  :ARG1 (t / territory
                        :poss c2)
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan")
                        :ARG1-of (a / await-01
                              :ARG2 (r / re-unify-01
                                    :ARG1 c3
                                    :ARG2 c2)
                              :time (s / since
                                    :op1 (s2 / split-01
                                          :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                                :op1 c3
                                                :op2 c2)
                                          :time (e / end-02
                                                :ARG1 (w / war
                                                      :mod (c4 / civil)
                                                      :time (d / date-entity :year 1949)))))))))
      :op2 (t2 / threaten-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (i2 / invade-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :condition (m / move-01
                        :ARG0 c3
                        :ARG2 (d2 / depend-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :mod (f / formal))))
            :ARG1-of (r2 / repeat-01)))

                     :ARG1 (d / drug
                             :name (n2 / name

                             :mod (d2 / disease
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                            :op1 "AIDS"))))

                 :degree (m / more)))

             :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                     :ARG0 c2
                     :ARG1 (v / violate-01
                             :ARG0 c2
                             :ARG1 (p2 / patent)))))

                        :mod (m / madrassa)))

                  :mod r

                  :ARG0-of (s3 / supply-01

                              :ARG1-of (r2 / recruit-01)
                              :mod (e2 / extremism))
                        :ARG2 n2))
            :manner (c3 / close))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2005 :month 7 :day 15))

            :ARG0-of (f / found-01
                  :ARG1 (m / movement :name (n2 / name :op1 "Al-Muhajiroun")
                        :mod (r2 / radical)))
            :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Syria")))
      :ARG1 (o / organization
            :poss p)
      :ARG2 (r3 / room
            :purpose (c2 / chat-01
                  :medium (i / internet)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2004 :month 10))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050912_0366.6 ::date 2013-06-02T07:23:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20050912 French President Jacques Chirac met with Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh at the President's Paris offices and confirmed India's 2.4 billion euro purchase of 6 Franco-Spanish Scorpene submarines.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20050912_0366_6.txt

  :op1 (m / meet-03
         :ARG0 (p4 / person
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Jacques"
                         :op2 "Chirac")

                            :ARG1 (c2 / country

                            :ARG2 (p / president)))
         :ARG1 (p5 / person
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Manmohan"
                         :op2 "Singh")

                            :ARG1 (c3 / country
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                            :op1 "India"))
                            :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                                    :mod (p2 / prime))))
         :location (o / office
                     :poss p
                     :location (c4 / city
                                 :name (n5 / name
                                         :op1 "Paris"))))
  :op2 (c / confirm-01
         :ARG0 p4
         :ARG1 (p3 / purchase-01
                 :ARG0 c3
                 :ARG1 (s / submarine
                         :name (n7 / name
                                 :op1 "Scorpene")
                         :quant 6
                         :mod (c6 / country
                                :name (n8 / name
                                        :op1 "Spain"))
                         :mod c2)
                 :ARG3 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                         :quant 2400000000
                         :unit (e / euro))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2005
          :month 9
          :day 12))

                              :ARG1 (m2 / missile)))))

            :domain (a2 / and
                  :op1 (r / remain-01
                        :ARG1 v
                        :location (s2 / sea)
                        :prep-with (c2 / crew
                              :consist-of (p2 / person :quant 31))

                              :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 45
                                    :unit (d4 / day))))
                  :op2 (d3 / dive-01
                        :mod (d5 / distance-quantity :quant 300
                              :unit (m3 / meter))))))

          :mod (j / justice))
  :ARG1 (o / organize-01
          :ARG0 (g / group
                  :ARG2-of (s / suspect-01)
                  :mod (n / neo-nazi))
          :ARG1 (r / raid-01
                  :ARG1 (g2 / group
                          :ARG0-of (r2 / rival-01
                                     :ARG1 g))
                  :manner (v / violence))))

                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "EU"))
                     :ARG1 a))

               :ARG1 (t / trend
                       :mod (s3 / spend-01)

          :op1 (d2 / date-entity
                 :year 2009)

                 :year 2010)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051010_0008.10 ::date 2013-06-01T02:57:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                            :op2 (d / develop-02))

                          :quant-of p4))

                     :ARG0 (r3 / rate-01
                             :ARG1 (g2 / grow-01)

# ::snt The Indian government is attempting to assess the extent of losses suffered by rebels.
# ::save-date Wed Jun 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051018_0064_7.txt
(a / attempt-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "India"))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / assess-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (e / extent
                  :degree-of (l / lose-02
                        :ARG1-of (s / suffer-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051018_0064.8 ::date 2013-06-02T09:01:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Police stated that on 18 October 2005 2 militants entered the fortified Srinagar home of junior Education Minister Ghulam Nabi lone of the People's Democratic Party (PDF) and shot him to death.

            :op1 (e / enter-01
                  :ARG0 (m3 / militant :quant 2)

                        :location (c / city :name (n / name :op1 "Srinagar"))

                                    :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                                          :mod (e2 / education)
                                          :mod (j / junior)))
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91

            :op2 (s2 / shoot-02
                  :ARG0 m3
                  :ARG1 p4
                  :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (d2 / die-01
                              :ARG1 p4)))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2005 :month 10 :day 18)))

                 :quant 5
                 :mod (o / other))

                    :ARG0 (f / fight-01
                            :instrument (g / gun)))))

                                            :op5 "and"

                                    :ARG1-of (f / fund-01
                                               :ARG0 (m / military))
                                    :location (c / city
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                        :op1 "New"
                                                        :op2 "Delhi")))))
         :ARG1 (c2 / complacency
                 :polarity -)
         :mod (a / also))
  :op2 (s / state-01
         :ARG0 p
         :ARG1 (i / importance
                 :polarity -
                 :domain (l / lose-02
                           :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                   :op1 (f2 / firepower)
                                   :op2 (m2 / manpower))))))
