# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.17 ::date 2013-06-06T08:29:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 07 December 2005 Wen is scheduled to tour the space-satellite facility of telecommunications company Alcatel in Cannes.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_17.txt
(s / schedule-01
      :ARG1 (t / tour-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Wen"))
            :ARG1 (f / facility
                  :poss (c / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Alcatel")
                        :mod (t2 / telecommunication))
                  :mod (s2 / satellite
                        :mod (s3 / space))
                  :location (c2 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Cannes"))))
      :ARG3 (d / date-entity :day 7 :month 12 :year 2005))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.18 ::date 2013-06-06T23:40:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Wen departs on 07 December 2005 for Slovakia, the Czech Republic and Portugal.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_18.txt
(d2 / depart-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Wen"))
  :ARG2 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Slovakia"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "Czech"
                         :op2 "Republic"))
          :op3 (c3 / country
                 :name (n4 / name
                         :op1 "Portugal")))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :day 7
          :month 12
          :year 2005))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.19 ::date 2013-06-06T23:47:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 1 of the reasons for Wen's visit to the 200 year-old Polytechnique at palaiseau was to sign a partnership deal with three Chinese universities that will introduce new exchange programs and shared qualifications.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_19.txt
(i / include-91
  :ARG1 (s / sign-02
          :ARG0 p
          :ARG1 (d / deal-01
                  :mod (p2 / partner-01
                         :ARG0 p
                         :ARG1 (u2 / university
                                 :quant 3
                                 :mod (c2 / country
                                        :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "China"))))
                  :instrument-of (i2 / introduce-02
                                   :ARG1 (a / and
                                           :op1 (p3 / program
                                                  :topic (e / exchange-01)
                                                  :mod (n5 / new))
                                           :op2 (q / qualification
                                                  :ARG1-of (s2 / share-01))))))
  :ARG2 (t / thing
          :ARG0-of (c4 / cause-01
                     :ARG1 (v2 / visit-01
                             :ARG0 (p / person
                                     :name (n / name
                                             :op1 "Wen"))
                             :ARG1 (u / university
                                     :name (n2 / name
                                             :op1 "Polytechnique")
                                     :age (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                            :quant 200
                                            :unit (y2 / year))
                                     :location (c / city-district
                                                 :name (n3 / name
                                                         :op1 "Palaiseau")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.22 ::date 2013-06-07T00:33:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Student exchanges are more important than the purchase of 150 Airbus.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_22.txt
(i / important
  :degree (m / more)
  :compared-to (p2 / purchase-01
                 :ARG1 (a / aircraft-type
                         :name (n / name
                                 :op1 "Airbus")
                         :quant 150))
  :domain (e / exchange-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                    :ARG0-of (s / study-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.23 ::date 2013-06-07T01:03:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_23.txt

  :ARG1 (c / cooperate-01
          :ARG0 (c2 / country
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "China"))
          :ARG1 (c3 / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "France"))
          :mod (e / economy)
          :time (p / present))
  :ARG2 (c4 / cooperate-01
          :ARG0 c2
          :ARG1 c3
          :mod (c5 / culture)
          :time (f / future)
          :ARG1-of (c6 / cause-01
                     :ARG0 (p2 / program
                             :mod (s / such)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.24 ::date 2013-06-07T01:35:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In a speech to students, professors and business leaders, Wen attempted to allay anxiety in Europe that China's fast-growing economic power is a threat to the rest of the world.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_24.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Wen"))
      :ARG1 (a2 / allay-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / anxiety
                  :location (c / continent :name (n2 / name :op1 "Europe"))
                  :topic (t / threaten-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / power
                              :poss (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :mod (e / economy)
                              :ARG1-of (g / grow-01
                                    :manner (f / fast)))
                        :ARG2 (r2 / rest
                              :part-of (w / world)))))
      :medium (s / speak-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (p4 / person
                        :ARG0-of (s2 / study-01))
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (p5 / professor)))
                  :op3 (p6 / person
                        :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                              :ARG1 (b / business))))))

                     :ARG0 (s2 / suffer-01
                             :ARG0 c

                                       :degree (s3 / so))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.26 ::date 2013-06-07T02:18:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                    :ARG1 (p2 / peace))
          :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                     :ARG0 (a / and
                             :op1 (h / history)
                             :op2 (c3 / culture)
                             :poss c4))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.27 ::date 2013-06-07T02:27:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt China's development is not a threat but an opportunity for the world.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_27.txt

  :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
          :ARG0 (d / develop-02
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                          :name (n / name
                                  :op1 "China")))
          :ARG2 (w2 / world)
          :polarity -)
  :ARG2 (o / opportunity
          :beneficiary w2
          :domain d))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.28 ::date 2013-06-07T02:33:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The French have expressed fear that China's low costs and poor standards of social security are attracting economic activity and causing increased unemployment in Europe but Wen argued that growing domestic demand in China will eventually lead to new opportunities for foreign exporters.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_28.txt
(h / have-concession-91
  :ARG1 (a5 / argue-01
          :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Wen"))
          :ARG1 (l2 / lead-03
                  :ARG0 (d / demand-01
                          :mod (d2 / domestic)
                          :location c3
                          :ARG1-of (g / grow-01))
                  :ARG2 (o / opportunity
                          :mod (n5 / new)
                          :beneficiary (p4 / person
                                         :ARG0-of (e4 / export-01)
                                         :mod (f2 / foreign)))
                  :time (e5 / eventual)))
  :ARG2 (e / express-01
          :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :mod (c5 / country
                         :name (n4 / name
                                 :op1 "France")))
          :ARG1 (f / fear-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                          :op1 (a2 / attract-01
                                 :ARG0 (a3 / and
                                         :op1 (m / monetary-quantity
                                                :ARG2-of (c2 / cost-01)
                                                :mod (l / low))
                                         :op2 (s / standard
                                                :mod (p / poor)
                                                :mod (s2 / security
                                                       :mod (s3 / social)))
                                         :poss (c3 / country
                                                 :name (n / name
                                                         :op1 "China")))
                                 :ARG1 (a4 / activity
                                         :mod (e2 / economy))
                                 :location (c4 / continent
                                             :name (n2 / name
                                                     :op1 "Europe")))
                          :op2 (c / cause-01
                                 :ARG0 a3
                                 :ARG1 (e3 / employ-01
                                         :polarity -
                                         :ARG1-of (i / increase-01))
                                 :location c4)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.29 ::date 2013-06-07T02:58:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt France views China as a strategic ally in its pursuit of a multipolar world that is not dominated by the U.S. though trade relations between France and China remain low.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_29.txt
(h / have-concession-91
  :ARG1 (v / view-02
          :ARG0 c
          :ARG1 c2
          :ARG2 (a / ally-01
                  :ARG1 c2
                  :ARG2 c
                  :mod (s / strategic)
                  :purpose (p / pursue-01
                             :ARG0 c
                             :ARG1 (w / world
                                     :mod (m / multipolar)
                                     :ARG1-of (d / dominate-01
                                                :ARG0 (c5 / country
                                                        :name (n5 / name
                                                                :op1 "U.S"))
                                                :polarity -)))))
  :ARG2 (r / remain-01
          :ARG1 (r2 / relation
                  :mod (t / trade-01)
                  :mod (b / between
                         :op1 (c / country
                                :name (n / name
                                        :op1 "France"))
                         :op2 (c2 / country
                                :name (n2 / name
                                        :op1 "China"))))
          :ARG3 (l / low)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236.30 ::date 2013-06-07T03:20:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Aug 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051206_0236_30.txt

      :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France")
            :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country
                        :ARG0-of (s2 / supply-01
                              :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))))))
      :ARG2 (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 15)
      :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / provide-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                              :ARG2 (t2 / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (n3 / need-01
                                          :mod (f / foreign)))
                              :ARG3 (p / percentage-entity :value 1.4
                                    :mod (o / only)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547.4 ::date 2013-06-07T03:53:24 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Eurocopter won a large contract with the Republic of Korea to produce troop-carrying helicopters.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547_4.txt
(w / win-01
  :ARG0 (c / company
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Eurocopter"))
  :ARG1 (c2 / contract-02
          :ARG1 (p / produce-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (h / helicopter
                          :ARG0-of (c4 / carry-01
                                     :ARG1 (t / troop))))
          :ARG2 (c3 / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Republic"
                          :op2 "of"
                          :op3 "Korea"))
          :mod (l / large)))

(h / have-purpose-91
      :ARG1 (p / project
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cost-01
                  :ARG2 (m / multiple
                        :op1 (m3 / monetary-quantity :quant 1000000000
                              :unit (d / dollar))))
            :mod (t / this))
      :ARG2 (a / allow-01
            :ARG1 (l / launch-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Republic" :op2 "of" :op3 "Korea"))
                  :ARG1 (i / industry
                        :mod (a2 / aeronautics)
                        :poss c))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547.6 ::date 2013-06-07T04:37:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On December 12, 2005 the Eurocopter subsidiary of the European EADS defense and aeronautics group won a contract worth hundreds of millions of dollars from the Republic of Korea for troop-carrying helicopters.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547_6.txt
(w / win-01
      :ARG0 (s / subsidiary :name (n / name :op1 "Eurocopter")
            :part-of (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "European" :op2 "EADS" :op3 "defense" :op4 "and" :op5 "aeronautics" :op6 "group")))
      :ARG1 (c3 / contract-02
            :ARG1 (h / helicopter
                  :ARG0-of (c4 / carry-01
                        :ARG1 (t / troop)))
            :ARG2 (c5 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Republic" :op2 "of" :op3 "Korea"))
            :ARG1-of (v / value-01
                  :ARG2 (m / multiple
                        :op1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 100000000
                              :unit (d2 / dollar)))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 12 :month 12 :year 2005))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547.7 ::date 2013-06-07T04:51:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547_7.txt
(t / take-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Eurocopter"))
      :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity
            :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                  :ARG2 (t2 / thing
                        :ARG2-of (p3 / price-01
                              :ARG1 (p4 / project)))
                  :ARG3 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 30)))
      :prep-as (p5 / profit))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547.8 ::date 2013-06-07T05:06:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The cost of the contract is estimated to be 6 billion dollars or 5 billion euros.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547_8.txt
(e2 / estimate-01
  :ARG1 (m3 / monetary-quantity
          :ARG2-of (c / cost-01
                     :ARG1 (c2 / contract-02)))
  :ARG2 (o / or
          :op1 (m / monetary-quantity
                 :quant 6000000000
                 :unit (d / dollar))
          :op2 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                 :quant 5000000000
                 :unit (e / euro))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547.9 ::date 2013-06-07T05:32:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (p / produce-01
            :ARG1 (a / aircraft :quant 245
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / capable-41
                        :ARG2 (c2 / carry-01
                              :ARG1 (u / up-to
                                    :op1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 8.5
                                          :unit (t3 / ton))))))
            :duration (o / over
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 20
                        :unit (y / year))))
      :ARG2 (c / contract-02))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20051212_0547.10 ::date 2013-06-07T05:49:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG0 c

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.4 ::date 2013-07-08T02:25:50 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt UN undersecretary-general for disarmament affairs WARNS AGAINST increases in global military spending, citing arms sales to developing countries and failures in nuclear disarmament negotiations.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356_4.txt
(a4 / and
      :op1 (w / warn-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :purpose (a / affair
                        :mod (d / disarm-01))
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "UN"))
                        :ARG2 (u / undersecretary-general)))
            :ARG1 (i / increase-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (s / spend-01
                        :ARG4 (m / military)
                        :mod (g2 / globe))))
      :op2 (c / cite-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (s2 / sell-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / arm)
                        :ARG2 (c2 / country
                              :ARG1-of (d4 / develop-02)))
                  :op2 (f / fail-01
                        :ARG2 (n2 / negotiate-01
                              :ARG2 (d3 / disarm-01
                                    :mod (n3 / nucleus)))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.5 ::date 2013-07-08T08:22:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20010830 UN undersecretary-general for Disarmament Affairs Jayantha Dhanapala stated in a speech at Macquarie University in Sydney issued by his office at the UN that global military spending is rising at an alarming rate after years of decline following the 1991 end of the cold war.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356_5.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Jayantha" :op2 "Dhanapala")
            :purpose (a / affair
                  :mod (d / disarm-01))
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "UN"))
                  :ARG2 (u / undersecretary-general)))
      :ARG1 (r / rise-01
            :ARG1 (s3 / spend-01
                  :ARG4 (m / military)
                  :mod (g3 / globe))
            :time (a3 / after
                  :op1 (d5 / decline-01
                        :ARG1 s3
                        :duration (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                    :unit (y2 / year)))
                        :ARG1-of (f / follow-01
                              :ARG2 (e / end-02
                                    :ARG1 (w / war :name (n6 / name :op1 "Cold" :op2 "War"))
                                    :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1991)))))
            :manner (r2 / rate
                  :ARG0-of (a4 / alarm-01)))
      :instrument (s2 / speech
            :location (u2 / university :name (n3 / name :op1 "Macquarie")
                  :location (c2 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Sydney")))
            :ARG1-of (i / issue-01
                  :ARG0 (o / office
                        :poss u
                        :location o2)))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2001 :month 8 :day 30))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.6 ::date 2013-07-08T10:32:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20010600 the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute reported that global military spending increased from 780 billion dollars in 1999 to 798 billion dollars in 2000.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356_6.txt
(r / report-01
  :ARG0 (r2 / research-institute
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Stockholm"
                  :op2 "International"
                  :op3 "Peace"
                  :op4 "Research"
                  :op5 "Institute"))
  :ARG1 (i / increase-01
          :ARG1 (s / spend-01
                  :ARG4 (m / military
                          :mod (g / globe)))
          :ARG3 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                  :quant 780000000000
                  :unit (d / dollar)
                  :time (d4 / date-entity
                          :year 1999))
          :ARG4 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                  :quant 798000000000
                  :unit (d2 / dollar)
                  :time (d5 / date-entity
                          :year 2000)))
  :time (d3 / date-entity
          :year 2001
          :month 6))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.7 ::date 2013-07-09T01:08:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Developing countries -- Dhanapala stated that as before military spending increased at the highest rates in African and South Asian countries with significant unmet social and economic needs.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356_7.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Dhanapala"))
      :ARG1 (i / increase-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / spend-01
                  :ARG4 (m / military)
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (s6 / spend-01
                              :time (b / before))))
            :ARG2 (r / rate
                  :mod (h / high
                        :degree (m2 / most)))
            :location (a3 / and
                  :op1 (c / country
                        :location (c2 / continent :name (n / name :op1 "Africa")))
                  :op2 (c4 / country
                        :location (w / world-region :name (n2 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Asia")))
                  :ARG0-of (n4 / need-01
                        :mod (s4 / significant)
                        :mod (e / economy)
                        :ARG1-of (m3 / meet-01 :polarity -))
                  :ARG0-of (n5 / need-01
                        :mod (s3 / social)
                        :ARG1-of (m4 / meet-01 :polarity -)
                        :mod s4)))
      :topic (c3 / country
            :ARG1-of (d / develop-02)))

                  :value 8)
          :ARG4 (o3 / over
                  :op1 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                         :quant 36000000000
                         :unit (d4 / dollar)))
          :time (d / date-entity
                  :year 2000)))

            :ARG2 (t / tragic))

                        :ARG1-of (i / include-91

                                    :mod (w / world))
                              :ARG3 "1/2"))

                        :ARG1 (u / under

                                    :unit (d / dollar)))
                        :ARG2 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.12 ::date 2013-07-10T01:06:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (r2 / research-institute :name (n / name :op1 "Congressional" :op2 "Research" :op3 "Service")

            :op1 (s / sell-01
                  :ARG0 c7
                  :ARG1 (w / weapon
                        :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                              :ARG2 (w2 / weapon
                                    :ARG1-of (p2 / purchase-01
                                          :ARG0 (c / country
                                                :ARG1-of (d3 / develop-02))
                                          :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2000)))
                              :ARG3 (a2 / almost
                                    :op1 (p / percentage-entity :value 50)))))
            :op2 (f / follow-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France"))
                        :op3 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                        :op4 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Britain"))
                        :op5 (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "China")))
                  :ARG2 c7))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 8 :year 2001))

                    :op1 (c / country
                           :name (n / name
                                   :op1 "United"
                                   :op2 "Arab"
                                   :op3 "Emirates"))
                    :op2 (c2 / country
                           :name (n2 / name
                                   :op1 "India"))
                    :op3 (c3 / country
                           :name (n3 / name
                                   :op1 "South"
                                   :op2 "Korea")))
          :mod (v / volatile
                 :degree (m / most))
          :poss (w / world)
          :quant 3))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.16 ::date 2013-07-10T03:43:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG0 o
            :ARG1 (e / ensure-01
                  :ARG0 (s2 / state
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 o2
                              :ARG2 (m / member)))
                  :ARG1 (i / implement-01
                        :ARG0 s2
                        :ARG1 (p4 / program
                              :mod (a3 / act-02)
                              :poss (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "UN"))

                                          :time (d2 / date-entity :month 7 :year 2001)))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.24 ::date 2013-07-10T08:18:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356_24.txt

  :ARG1 (e / effort
          :purpose (e2 / enforce-01
                     :ARG1 (b / ban-01
                             :ARG1 (w / warfare
                                     :mod (b2 / biology)))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :month 7
          :year 2001)
  :time (d2 / declare-01
          :ARG0 (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "US"))
          :ARG1 (p2 / possible
                  :domain (a / accept-01
                            :ARG1 (p / propose-01
                                    :ARG1 (d3 / draft)))
                  :polarity -)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.25 ::date 2013-07-12T01:31:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356_25.txt

                  :ARG0 (i / intend-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "US"))

                              :ARG1 c
                              :prep-as (p3 / party))
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / state-01))
                  :ARG1 (t / treaty :name (n2 / name :op1 "Anti-Ballistic" :op2 "Missile" :op3 "Treaty")))
            :op2 (p2 / possible
                  :domain (i2 / incite-01
                        :ARG0 i
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p4 / phase
                                    :mod (n4 / new)
                                    :subevent-of (r / race-02
                                          :ARG2 (a3 / arm
                                                :mod (n5 / nucleus))
                                          :mod (g / globe)))
                              :op2 (p5 / probable
                                    :domain (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (r2 / race-02
                                                :ARG2 (m / missile))
                                          :op2 (w2 / weaponize-01
                                                :ARG1 (s3 / space)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20010830_1356.26 ::date 2013-07-12T02:41:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "George" :op2 "W." :op3 "Bush")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "US"))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / president)))

            :ARG1 (c3 / construct-01
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG0-of (s / shield-01
                              :ARG2 (m / missile)))
                  :ARG0-of (v / violate-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / treaty :name (n3 / name :op1 "ABM" :op2 "Treaty")
                              :time (d / date-entity :year 1972)
                              :mod (c6 / cornerstone
                                    :ARG1-of (c4 / consider-01
                                          :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Russia")))
                                    :mod (s2 / secure-01
                                          :mod (i / international))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987.16 ::date 2013-06-21T21:57:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt A Ukrainian company built in the Soviet era called yuzmash has helped found the Sea Launch project with the United States, Russia and Norway to launch satellites from converted sea-based oil drilling platforms.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987_16.txt
(h / help-01
      :ARG0 (c6 / company :name (n7 / name :op1 "Yuzmash")
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Ukraine"))
            :ARG1-of (b / build-01
                  :time (e / era
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union")))))
      :ARG1 (f / found-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 c6
                  :op2 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                  :op3 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :op4 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Norway")))
            :ARG1 (p / project :name (n8 / name :op1 "Sea" :op2 "Launch")
                  :ARG0-of (l2 / launch-01
                        :ARG1 (s / satellite)
                        :source (p3 / platform
                              :ARG1-of (c7 / convert-01
                                    :ARG3 (p2 / platform
                                          :purpose (d / drill-01
                                                :ARG3 (o / oil))))
                              :ARG1-of (b3 / base-01
                                    :location (s2 / sea)))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987.17 ::date 2013-06-21T22:05:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt A Ukrainian cosmonaut named loenid Kadenyuk has flown a successful mission on the U.S. space shuttle.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987_17.txt
(f / fly-01
      :ARG0 (c3 / cosmonaut :name (n2 / name :op1 "Loenid" :op2 "Kadenyuk")
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Ukraine")))
      :ARG1 (s2 / shuttle
            :mod (s3 / space)
            :poss (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.S.")))
      :ARG1-of (s / succeed-01)
      :part-of (m / mission))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987.18 ::date 2013-06-21T22:08:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt The European Space Agency's program has so far transferred more than 100 technologies.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 21, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987_18.txt
(t / transfer-01
      :ARG0 (p / program
            :part-of (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Space" :op3 "Agency")))
      :ARG1 (t2 / technology
            :quant (m / more-than :op1 100))
      :mod (s / so-far))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987.19 ::date 2013-06-21T22:12:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020605_0987_19.txt
(c / create-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (c2 / company :quant 15
                  :ARG0-of (t2 / turn-12
                        :ARG1 (o / or
                              :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 150000000
                                    :unit (e / euro))
                              :op2 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 140000000
                                    :unit (d / dollar)))))
            :op2 (j / job
                  :mod (n / new)
                  :quant (t / thousands)))
      :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01))

      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (t / technology)
      :op3 (b / business)
      :op4 (m / money)
      :op5 (m2 / military))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.4 ::date 2013-06-21T22:34:05 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Embraer opened a new factory in the Sao Paulo state of Brazil in order to better compete to win a contract with the Brazilian air force.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_4.txt
(o / open-01
      :ARG0 (c4 / company :name (n4 / name :op1 "Embraer"))
      :ARG1 (f / factory
            :mod (n5 / new)
            :location (s / state :name (n / name :op1 "Sao" :op2 "Paulo")
                  :location c2))
      :purpose (c5 / compete-01
            :ARG0 c4
            :ARG2 (w / win-01
                  :ARG0 c4
                  :ARG1 (c6 / contract-02
                        :ARG0 c4
                        :ARG2 (m2 / military :name (n3 / name :op1 "Air" :op2 "Force")
                              :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Brazil")))))
            :manner (g / good
                  :degree (m / more))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.5 ::date 2013-06-21T22:41:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Embraer"))
      :ARG1 (f / factory

      :purpose (a / and
            :op1 (b / build-01
                  :ARG0 f

                        :poss (c2 / corporation)))
            :op2 (e / expand-01
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG4 (s / sector
                        :mod (m / military)
                        :mod (a2 / aviation))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 11 :month 6 :year 2002))

                        :mod (b / business)
                        :ARG1-of (e2 / enter-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG0 c
                              :time (y / yet))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.8 ::date 2013-06-21T23:14:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Gaviao Peixoto is a small orange and sugar cane farming town of 4500 inhabitants about 300 kilometers or 180 miles northwest of Sao Paulo.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_8.txt
(t / town :name (n3 / name :op1 "Gaviao" :op2 "Peixoto")
      :mod (f / farm-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (o / orange)
                  :mod (s2 / sugar-cane)))
      :mod (s / small)
      :ARG1-of (i / inhabit-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person :quant 4500))
      :location (n4 / northwest
            :op1 (o2 / or
                  :op1 (a3 / about
                        :op1 (d3 / distance-quantity :quant 300
                              :unit (k3 / kilometer)))
                  :op2 (a4 / about
                        :op1 (d4 / distance-quantity :quant 180
                              :unit (m2 / mile))))
            :op2 (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Sao" :op2 "Paulo"))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.9 ::date 2013-06-21T23:21:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred

            :domain (t2 / this))

            :purpose (t / test-01

                        :mod (s2 / supersonic)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.10 ::date 2013-06-21T23:32:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Embraer is investing 150 million dollars over 10 years to upgrade the factory's technology so that the factory can produce Embraer's new legacy corporate jet and a range of military aircraft.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_10.txt
(i / invest-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Embraer"))
      :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 150000000
            :unit (d / dollar))
      :ARG2 (u / upgrade-02
            :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                  :mod (f / factory))
            :purpose (p2 / possible
                  :domain (p3 / produce-01
                        :ARG0 f
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (j / jet
                                    :poss (c2 / corporation)
                                    :mod (n4 / new)
                                    :mod (l / legacy)
                                    :poss c)
                              :op2 (r / range
                                    :mod (a2 / aircraft
                                          :mod (m2 / military)))))))
      :duration (d2 / date-entity :quant 10
            :unit (y / year)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.11 ::date 2013-06-26T15:21:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p / plane :name (n / name :op1 "EMB-145")
                  :purpose (r / reconnaissance))
            :op2 (p2 / plane :name (n2 / name :op1 "ALX" :op2 "Super" :op3 "Tucano")
                  :purpose (t2 / train-01)))
      :ARG2 (a / aircraft
            :poss (m / military)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.12 ::date 2013-07-01T12:34:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt The factory contains a 5 kilometer or 3 mile long test runway which is the longest in the southern hemisphere.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_12.txt
(c / contain-01
      :ARG0 (f / factory)
      :ARG1 (r / runway
            :mod (l / long
                  :degree (o / or
                        :op1 (d4 / distance-quantity :quant 5
                              :unit (k2 / kilometer))
                        :op2 (d5 / distance-quantity :quant 3
                              :unit (m2 / mile)))
                  :mod (m3 / more
                        :degree (m4 / most)
                        :compared-to (l2 / long
                              :domain (r2 / runway
                                    :location (h / hemisphere
                                          :location (s / south))))))
            :purpose (t / test-01)))

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Mauricio" :op2 "Betelho")

                  :ARG1 (c / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Embraer"))
                  :ARG2 (p5 / president)))
      :ARG1 (e / expect-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (e2 / employ-01
                        :ARG0 (f / factory)
                        :ARG1 (p3 / person :quant 1000)
                        :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2003))
                  :op2 (e3 / employ-01
                        :ARG0 f
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person :quant 3000)
                        :time (n / next
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 10
                                    :unit (y2 / year)))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.15 ::date 2013-07-01T12:53:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kawaski" :op2 "Heavy" :op3 "Industries")
            :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))
            :ARG0-of (s / supply-01)
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1))
      :ARG1 (f / factory))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.16 ::date 2013-07-01T12:57:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt This supplier will use the factory to make wings for Embraer's new 08 seat erj 190/195 passenger jets.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_16.txt
(u / use-01
      :ARG0 (c / company
            :ARG0-of (s / supply-01)
            :domain (t / this))
      :ARG1 (f / factory)
      :ARG2 (m / make-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (w / wing
                  :part-of (j / jet :name (n4 / name :op1 "ERJ" :op2 "190/195")
                        :mod (n2 / new)
                        :poss (c2 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Embraer"))
                        :part (s3 / seat :quant 8)
                        :mod (p / passenger)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.17 ::date 2013-07-01T13:00:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Mauricio betelho stated kawaski heavy industries is likely to be just the first of several suppliers to invest in the plant.
# ::save-date Wed Aug 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_17.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Mauricio" :op2 "Betelho"))
      :ARG1 (l / likely
            :domain (i / invest-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kawaski" :op2 "Heavy" :op3 "Industries")
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1
                              :range (c3 / company
                                    :quant (s2 / several)
                                    :ARG0-of (s3 / supply-01))
                              :mod (j2 / just)))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / plant))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.18 ::date 2013-07-01T13:04:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 (a2 / aircraft))
                  :location (w / world))

            :ARG0 (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Embraer"))
            :degree (m / most)
            :compared-to (c3 / company
                  :location (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Brazil")))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.19 ::date 2013-07-01T13:15:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_19.txt

      :ARG1 (c2 / company :quant 1 :name (n4 / name :op1 "Embraer"))

            :ARG0-of (c4 / compete-01
                  :ARG2 (c5 / contract-02
                        :ARG0 c3
                        :ARG1 (s / supply-01
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 (a2 / aircraft :quant 12
                                    :ARG0-of (f3 / fight-01
                                          :manner (s2 / supersonic))
                                    :mod (n / new))
                              :ARG2 (m / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "Air" :op2 "Force")
                                    :poss (c6 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Brazil"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.20 ::date 2013-07-01T13:22:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt Embraer is working with French partner Dassault avaiation to gain technology transfer which should give the local bid an advantage over the other competitiors.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_20.txt
(w / work-01
      :ARG0 (c3 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Embraer"))
      :ARG1 (g / gain-02
            :ARG1 (t / transfer-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / give-01
                              :ARG1 (a / advantage
                                    :compared-to (c5 / company
                                          :mod (o2 / other)
                                          :ARG0-of (c6 / compete-01
                                                :ARG1 c3)))
                              :ARG2 (b / bid-01
                                    :ARG0 c3
                                    :mod (l / local))
                              :mod (l2 / likely)))))
      :ARG3 (c2 / company :name (n5 / name :op1 "Dassault" :op2 "Avaiation")
            :ARG0-of (p / partner-01
                  :ARG1 c3)
            :poss (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "France"))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.21 ::date 2013-07-01T13:27:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

(e / expect-01
      :ARG1 (a / announce-01
            :ARG1 (c / company
                  :ARG0-of (w / win-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / contract-02
                              :mod (t2 / this))))
            :time (a2 / after
                  :op1 (n / now)
                  :quant (f / few
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (d / day))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.22 ::date 2013-07-01T13:29:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt If Embraer wins the contract the Mirage 2000-5 BR would be assembled at the factory and Dassault would transfer all technology including software codes that allow flexibility int he choice of missiles to Embraer.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 1, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_22.txt
(a4 / and
      :op1 (a2 / assemble-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / aircraft :name (n7 / name :op1 "Mirage" :op2 "2000-5" :op3 "BR"))
            :location (f / factory))
      :op2 (t / transfer-01
            :ARG0 (c / company :name (n8 / name :op1 "Dassault"))
            :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                  :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG1 (c2 / code
                              :mod (s / software)
                              :ARG0-of (a5 / allow-01
                                    :ARG1 (f2 / flexibility
                                          :mod (c4 / choose-01
                                                :ARG1 (m / missile))))))
                  :mod (a / all))
            :ARG2 (c3 / company :name (n9 / name :op1 "Embraer")))
      :condition (w / win-01
            :ARG0 c3
            :ARG1 (c5 / contract-02)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.23 ::date 2013-07-01T13:35:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt Winning the contract would also allow Embraer to export assembled mirages.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_23.txt
(a / allow-01
      :ARG0 (w / win-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Embraer"))
            :ARG1 (c / contract-02
                  :ARG0 c2))
      :ARG1 (e / export-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (a2 / aircraft :name (n3 / name :op1 "Mirage")
                  :ARG1-of (a3 / assemble-01)))
      :mod (a4 / also))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.24 ::date 2013-07-01T13:37:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The competitors include Lockheed Martins' F-16 C, the JAS-39 Gripen built by a U.K.-Swedish consortium and two Russian planes called the MiG-29 and the Sukhoi Su-35.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419_24.txt
(i / include-91
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (a3 / aircraft :name (n8 / name :op1 "F-16" :op2 "C")
                  :source (c3 / company :name (n12 / name :op1 "Lockheed" :op2 "Martin")))
            :op2 (a4 / aircraft :name (n9 / name :op1 "JAS-39" :op2 "Gripen")
                  :ARG1-of (b2 / build-01
                        :ARG0 (c4 / consortium
                              :consist-of (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (c5 / country :name (n13 / name :op1 "U.K."))
                                    :op2 (c6 / country :name (n14 / name :op1 "Sweden"))))))
            :op3 (p / plane :name (n10 / name :op1 "MiG-29")
                  :source (c7 / country :name (n15 / name :op1 "Russia")))
            :op4 (p2 / plane :name (n11 / name :op1 "Sukhoi" :op2 "Su-35")
                  :source c7))
      :ARG2 (a / aircraft
            :ARG0-of (c / compete-01)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020611_1419.25 ::date 2013-07-01T13:51:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020618_0245.27 ::date 2013-07-02T14:52:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Tens of thousands of Indian troops, guerrillas and civilians have been killed.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020618_0245_27.txt
(k / kill-01
      :ARG1 (p2 / person
            :domain (o / or
                  :op1 (t / troop
                        :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "India")))
                  :op2 (g / guerrilla
                        :mod c)
                  :op3 (c2 / civilian
                        :mod c))
            :quant (m3 / multiple :op1 10000)))

                  :ARG1 (b2 / business)
                  :ARG2 (t / trade-01
                        :ARG1 (d3 / drug
                              :mod (g / generic)))))
      :op2 (m / manufacture-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p / product :name (n7 / name :op1 "EPO"))
            :purpose (s / sell-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :location (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Argentina"))
                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Brazil"))
                        :op3 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "India"))
                        :op4 (c8 / country
                              :mod (o / other)
                              :ARG0-of (a3 / acknowledge-01 :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (p2 / patent-01
                                                :ARG1 (d / drug)

                                          :op2 (p3 / patent-01
                                                :ARG1 (d2 / drug)

                                          :quant (m2 / most))))))
            :time (c9 / current)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020708_0642.19 ::date 2013-07-09T16:27:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt By joining the World Trade Organization in 2001 China agreed to abide by WTO intellectual property agreements but the agreements contain mechanisms allowing developing nations to circumvent patents, particularly in pharmaceuticals, when public health concerns are deemed to override the patents.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020708_0642_19.txt
(c2 / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (a / agree-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
            :ARG1 (a3 / abide-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (a4 / agree-01
                        :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "World" :op2 "Trade" :op3 "Organization"))
                        :ARG1 (i / intellectual-property)))
            :ARG1-of (c6 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (j / join-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 o
                        :time (d / date-entity :year 2001))))
      :ARG2 (c3 / contain-01
            :ARG0 a4
            :ARG1 (m / mechanism
                  :ARG0-of (a2 / allow-01
                        :ARG1 (c4 / circumvent-01
                              :ARG0 (n5 / nation
                                    :ARG1-of (d2 / develop-02))
                              :ARG1 (p / patent-01)
                              :example (c5 / circumvent-01
                                    :ARG0 n5
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / patent-01
                                          :ARG1 (p3 / pharmaceutical)
                                          :ARG1-of (o4 / override-01
                                                :ARG0 (c7 / concern-01
                                                      :ARG1 (h / health
                                                            :mod (p4 / public)))
                                                :ARG1-of (d3 / deem-01)))))))))

            :ARG0 p2
            :ARG1 f
            :ARG2 (d2 / duty
                  :purpose (t2 / test-01))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020718_0539.16 ::date 2013-07-11T23:15:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020718_0539_16.txt

      :ARG1 (s / start-01

                  :op1 (d4 / date-entity :year 91
                        :time-of (c5 / collapse-01
                              :ARG1 (c6 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union")))
                        :time-of (s3 / slide-01
                              :ARG1 (c7 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Tajikistan"))

                                    :mod (c8 / civil)
                                    :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 5
                                          :unit (y2 / year))

                                          :ARG1 (e / economy
                                                :poss c7))
                                    :ARG0-of (l / leave-01
                                          :ARG1 (p / population
                                                :poss c7)
                                          :ARG2 (p2 / poverty
                                                :mod (d5 / deep)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020808_0105.16 ::date 2013-07-30T21:25:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred
# ::snt Italy is financing most of the cost but the World Bank and possibly some private telecommunications companies are also contributing.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 30, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020808_0105_16.txt
(c2 / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (f / finance-01
            :ARG0 (c6 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Italy"))
            :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity
                  :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG2 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                              :ARG1-of (c4 / cost-01))
                        :ARG3 (m3 / most))))
      :ARG2 (c3 / contribute-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "World" :op2 "Bank"))
                  :op2 (c5 / company
                        :mod (t / telecommunication)
                        :mod (p / privacy)
                        :mod (s / some)))
            :mod (a2 / also)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020808_0105.17 ::date 2013-07-30T21:34:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-06 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Lucio" :op2 "Stanca"))

            :ARG1 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG2 (s2 / solve-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / problem
                              :mod (a / and
                                    :op1 (h2 / hunger-01)
                                    :op2 (d / disease)
                                    :op3 (e / educate-01)))))
            :ARG2 (o2 / obligate-01
                  :ARG2 (h / help-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / create-01
                              :ARG1 (g / govern-01
                                    :ARG1-of (g2 / good-41)))
                        :time (f / first))
                  :purpose s2)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020808_0105.18 ::date 2013-07-30T22:05:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The rationale behind creating good governance is that by making the public administration of developing countries more transparent and accountable developing countries would become more attractive potential recipients of traditional forms of aid such as loans and investments.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020808_0105_18.txt
(h / have-purpose-91
      :ARG1 (c / create-01
            :ARG1 (g / govern-01
                  :ARG1 c3
                  :ARG1-of (g2 / good-41)))
      :ARG2 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (c5 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (t / transparence
                              :extent (m2 / more)
                              :mod (a5 / administrate-01
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / country
                                          :mod (d / developing))
                                    :manner (p2 / public)))
                        :op2 (a2 / accountable-41
                              :ARG1 a5)))
            :ARG1 (b / become-01
                  :ARG1 c3
                  :ARG2 (c4 / country
                        :ARG0-of (r / receive-01
                              :ARG1 (a3 / aid-01
                                    :mod (f / form
                                          :mod (t2 / tradition)
                                          :example (a4 / and
                                                :op1 (l / loan-01)
                                                :op2 (i2 / invest-01))))
                              :mod (p / possible))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20020808_0105.19 ::date 2013-08-04T14:53:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt In effect good governance would invalidate the reason used by countries that do not do enough that donating is not appropriate because it is impossible to know whether the aid would reach its true destination.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20020808_0105_19.txt
(i / invalidate-01
      :ARG0 (g / govern-01
            :ARG2-of (g2 / good-41))
      :ARG1 (r / reason-01
            :ARG1 (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p / possible :polarity -
                        :domain (k / know-01
                              :ARG1 (r2 / reach-01
                                    :ARG0 (a2 / aid-01)
                                    :ARG1 (d3 / destination
                                          :ARG1-of (t / true-41)
                                          :poss a2))))
                  :ARG1 (a / appropriate :polarity -
                        :ARG1-of (d2 / donate-01)))
            :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                        :ARG0-of (d / do-02 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (e / enough)))))
      :prep-in (e2 / effect-01))

                              :mod (f / former))))

                                          :op1 c3

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20021012_0179.9 ::date 2013-08-04T22:27:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

      :op1 (m / missile :name (n2 / name :op1 "Topol")

                  :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 15
                        :unit (y2 / year))))

            :purpose (s / see-01
                  :ARG1 (p / possible
                        :domain (e / extend-01
                              :ARG1 (l / lifetime
                                    :poss m))))
            :frequency (p2 / period)))

                                          :location (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))))))
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (m / militant))))

      :op1 (s / scan-01

                  :ARG1 (p / probe
                        :quant (m / multiple :op1 1000))
                  :ARG2 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (s4 / second)))

            :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (o / overwhelm-01

                              :mod (d / data
                                    :mod (i / internet))
                              :quant (m2 / many))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20030406_0627.4 ::date 2013-07-02T09:01:00 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20030406_0627_4.txt

      :ARG0 (r2 / report-01
            :ARG0 (i / intelligence
                  :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Philippines"))))
      :ARG1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG0 (g / group
                  :part-of (c8 / criminal-organization :name (n8 / name :op1 "al-Qaida"))
                  :ARG1-of (b2 / base-01
                        :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Singapore"))))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (b / bomb-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (e / embassy)
                              :op2 (c7 / corporation
                                    :mod (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "U.S.")))
                              :op3 (w / warship)
                              :location c2))
                  :op2 (c3 / crash-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / plane
                              :ARG1-of (h / hijack-01))
                        :location (a4 / airport
                              :mod (n3 / national)
                              :location c2)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20030406_0627.6 ::date 2013-07-02T09:51:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt Philippine intelligence reports obtained by the Associated Press reveal a Singapore-based al-Qaida group's plans to attack embassies of the United States, Great Britain, Israel and Australia, to attack U.S. corporations and warships in Singapore and to crash a hijacked plane at the country's international airport.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20030406_0627_6.txt
(r / reveal-01
      :ARG0 (r2 / report-01
            :ARG0 (i / intelligence
                  :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Philippines")))
            :ARG1-of (o / obtain-01
                  :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n11 / name :op1 "Associated" :op2 "Press"))))
      :ARG1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG0 (c4 / criminal-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "al-Qaida")
                  :ARG1-of (b / base-01
                        :location (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Singapore"))))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (a2 / attack-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (e / embassy
                                    :poss (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                                          :op2 (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Great" :op2 "Britain"))
                                          :op3 (c7 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Israel"))
                                          :op4 (c8 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Australia"))))
                              :op2 (c2 / corporation
                                    :mod (c9 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "U.S."))
                                    :location c3)
                              :op3 (w / warship
                                    :location c3)))
                  :op2 (c12 / crash-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / plane
                              :ARG1-of (h / hijack-01))
                        :location (a5 / airport
                              :mod (i2 / international)
                              :location c3)))))

      :ARG1 (b / bomb-01
            :ARG0 (g / group)

            :ARG0-of (k / kill-01

            :ARG0 p3

                  :mod (c4 / computer)

                        :mod (m2 / mobile))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20030406_0627.21 ::date 2013-07-31T10:33:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20030406_0627.39 ::date 2013-08-07T10:04:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred
# ::snt The Group had further planned to hijack a U.S., British or Singaporean plane and crash it into Changi Airport in order to threaten the U.S. government to halt its military strikes against Afghanistan.
# ::save-date Sun Sep 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20030406_0627_39.txt
(p / plan-01
      :ARG0 (g / group)
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (h / hijack-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (p3 / plane
                              :mod (c6 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "U.S.")))
                        :op2 (p4 / plane
                              :mod (c7 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "Britain")))
                        :op3 (p5 / plane
                              :mod (c8 / country :name (n10 / name :op1 "Singapore")))))
            :op2 (c9 / crash-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 p
                  :location (a / airport :name (n5 / name :op1 "Changi" :op2 "Airport")))
            :purpose (t / threaten-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG2 (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c6))
                  :purpose (h2 / halt-01
                        :ARG1 (s / strike-01
                              :ARG0 g2
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                              :mod (m / military)))))
      :mod (f / further))

            :mod (h / human)))

                        :ARG3 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 1

                                    :poss c5)
                              :ARG2 (s4 / secretary))))

            :op2 (d4 / date-entity :day 11 :month 5 :year 2003)))

                        :topic (p3 / peace))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20030519_0546.5 ::date 2013-08-21T08:08:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator UCO-AMR-07 ::preferred

            :ARG1 p

                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))

                        :ARG0 (d / derail-01

                                          :mod (r3 / road)))

                                    :ARG1 (s / situation)))))))

                                    :unit (m / month))))))
      :concession-of (p2 / prevent-01
            :ARG0 (p5 / person
                  :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Palestine"))
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (m2 / militant)))
            :ARG1 (p3 / progress-01)
            :frequency (o / often)
            :manner (i / increase-01
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 (a / attack-01
                        :ARG0 p5)
                  :time (t2 / time
                        :mod (c3 / critical)
                        :ARG2-of (b2 / be-temporally-at-91
                              :ARG1 (p4 / peacemake-01))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20030603_0375.5 ::date 2013-08-26T17:11:53 ::snt-type summary ::annotator UCO-AMR-07 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20030603_0375_5.txt
(a / accuse-01
      :ARG0 (n5 / nation
            :quant (s / several)
            :example (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                  :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Japan"))))
      :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
      :ARG2 (s2 / supply-01
            :ARG1 (d / drug
                  :mod (l / law :polarity -))
            :ARG2 (c4 / continent :name (n4 / name :op1 "Asia"))
            :mod (m / major)))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20031021_0019.20 ::date 2013-08-02T00:37:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                          :op3 (a3 / asthma))))))
            :op2 (d2 / design-01
                  :ARG1 d3)
            :op3 (m / manufacture-01
                  :ARG1 d3)
            :op4 (s / sell-01
                  :ARG1 d3)))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20031021_0019.24 ::date 2013-08-02T01:32:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt AMERICAN COMPANY ryss laboratory's Taiwan subsidiary and Taiwan's pharmaceutical industry technology and development center concluded an agreement to exchange technology and combine their strengths for the research and manufacturing of new drugs to upgrade domestic pharmaceutical manufacturing standards.
# ::save-date Tue Aug 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20031021_0019_24.txt

                                    :name (n3 / name
                                            :op1 "United"
                                            :op2 "States"
                                            :op3 "of"
                                            :op4 "America"))))
          :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (e / exchange-01
                         :ARG1 (t / technology)
                         :purpose (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (r2 / research-01
                                           :ARG1 (d / drug
                                                   :mod (n5 / new)))
                                    :op2 (m / manufacture-01
                                           :ARG1 d)))
                  :op2 (c5 / combine-01
                         :ARG1 (s2 / strength
                                 :poss (t2 / they))
                         :purpose a3))
          :ARG2 (r / research-institute
                  :name (n4 / name
                          :op1 "Pharmaceutical"
                          :op2 "Industry"
                          :op3 "Technology"
                          :op4 "and"
                          :op5 "Development"
                          :op6 "Center")
                  :location c2))
  :purpose (u / upgrade-02
             :ARG1 (s3 / standard
                     :ARG1-of (m2 / manufacture-01)
                     :domain (p / pharmacy
                               :mod (d2 / domestic)))))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20040212_0013.6 ::date 2013-07-28T10:59:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Lu noted that the European Union adopted a resolution to ban arms sales to mainland China after the Tiananmen massacre of 890000 and said it is worrisome that the leaders of France and Germany are reportedly seeking to lift the ban following years of commercial interest enticements by the PRC government.
# ::save-date Sat Aug 31, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20040212_0013_6.txt

      :op1 (n / note-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Lu"))

                        :ARG0 o
                        :ARG1 (b / ban-01
                              :ARG1 (s / sell-01
                                    :ARG1 (a3 / arm)
                                    :ARG2 (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China")
                                          :mod (m2 / mainland)))))
                  :time (a4 / after
                        :op1 (m / massacre-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 890000)
                              :mod (l / location :name (n5 / name :op1 "Tiananmen"))))))
      :op2 (s2 / say-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (w / worry-01
                  :ARG0 (s3 / seek-01
                        :ARG0 (a5 / and
                              :op1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (l2 / lead-02
                                          :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "France"))))
                              :op2 (p4 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (l3 / lead-02
                                          :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Germany")))))
                        :ARG1 (l4 / lift-02
                              :ARG0 a5
                              :ARG1 (b2 / ban-01)
                              :time (f / follow-01
                                    :ARG2 (e / entice-01
                                          :ARG0 (g / government-organization

                  :mod (g2 / good
                        :degree (m / more)))))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20040628_0015.6 ::date 2013-08-05T13:41:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20040628_0015_6.txt

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "Executive" :op2 "Yuan")
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan")))
      :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 610800000000
            :unit (d / dollar
                  :mod c
                  :mod (n3 / new))
            :ARG1-of (b / budget-01
                  :mod (s2 / special)))
      :ARG3 (b2 / buy-01
            :ARG0 (p / person)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (m2 / missile :quant 388 :name (n4 / name :op1 "Patriot" :op2 "PAC-III"))
                  :op2 (s3 / submarine :quant 8
                        :mod (c3 / conventional))
                  :op3 (a2 / aircraft :quant 12 :name (n5 / name :op1 "P-3" :op2 "C")
                        :ARG0-of (c4 / counter-01
                              :ARG1 (s4 / submarine))))
            :ARG2 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
            :time (e2 / early
                  :time (m3 / month
                        :mod (t / this))
                  :degree (m4 / more))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_19951218_0100.4 ::date 2013-07-26T08:12:48 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The process to try to control and reduce arms in the embattled Balkans was formally launched in Bonn, Germany, when foreign ministers, ambassadors and representatives of international organizations and observer nations met to discuss what form further talks should take.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_19951218_0100_4.txt
(l / launch-01
      :ARG1 (p / process
            :ARG0-of (t / try-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c3 / control-01
                              :ARG1 (a / arm))
                        :op2 (r / reduce-01
                              :ARG1 a)
                        :location (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "Balkans")
                              :ARG1-of (e / embattle-01)))))
      :mod (f / formal)
      :location (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Bonn")
            :location (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Germany")))
      :time (m / meet-03
            :ARG0 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                                    :mod (f2 / foreign))))
                  :op2 (a4 / ambassador)
                  :op3 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (r2 / represent-01
                              :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (o / organization
                                          :mod (i / international))
                                    :op2 (n4 / nation
                                          :ARG0-of (o2 / observe-01))))))
            :purpose (d / discuss-01
                  :ARG0 a3
                  :ARG1 (f5 / form
                        :ARG2-of (t4 / take-03
                              :ARG1 (t3 / talk
                                    :mod (f4 / further))
                              :ARG1-of (r3 / recommend-01))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_19951218_0100.5 ::date 2013-07-26T10:03:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The long process to try to control and reduce arms in the embattled Balkans was formally launched on 951218 in Bonn, Germany.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_19951218_0100_5.txt
(l / launch-01
      :ARG1 (p / process
            :mod (l2 / long)
            :ARG0-of (t / try-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (c3 / control-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / arm))
                        :op2 (r / reduce-01
                              :ARG1 a)
                        :location (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "Balkans")
                              :ARG1-of (e / embattle-01)))))
      :mod (f / formal)
      :time (d / date-entity :day 18 :month 12 :year 1995)
      :location (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Bonn")
            :location (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Germany"))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_19951218_0100.6 ::date 2013-07-26T10:04:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                              :mod (f2 / foreign))))

                        :ARG1 (a5 / and
                              :op1 (o / organization
                                    :mod (i / international))
                              :op2 (n4 / nation
                                    :ARG0-of (o2 / observe-01))))))
      :purpose (d / discuss-01
            :ARG0 a3

                  :ARG2-of (t / take-03

                              :mod (f / further))
                        :ARG1-of (r3 / recommend-01))))

            :domain (p2 / peace
                  :location (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Yugoslavia")
                        :mod (f2 / former)))

                  :op1 (r2 / remain-01

                              :ARG1 (c4 / catch-04)))))

            :ARG0 (r / remark)
            :ARG1 (m2 / meet-03
                  :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (d / day)))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_19951218_0100.27 ::date 2013-07-26T13:41:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Croatia, Bosnia-Herzegovina and Serbia have promised to accept a set of automatic limits if agreement on such ceilings cannot be reached in 180 days.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_19951218_0100_27.txt
(p / promise-01
  :ARG2 (a2 / accept-01
          :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / country
                         :name (n / name
                                 :op1 "Croatia"))
                  :op2 (c2 / country
                         :name (n2 / name
                                 :op1 "Bosnia-Herzegovina"))
                  :op3 (c3 / country
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Serbia")))
          :ARG1 (s / set
                  :consist-of (l / limit
                                :mod (a3 / automatic)))
          :condition (p2 / possible
                       :polarity -
                       :domain (r / reach-01
                                 :ARG1 (a4 / agree-01

                  :ARG2 (o2 / official))
            :mod (p / present
                  :location (s2 / ship :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kuwolsan")))

                  :topic (c2 / condition
                        :mod (a / anonymity))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (b / become-01
                  :ARG1 (s4 / situation)
                  :ARG2 (p2 / physical))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653.46 ::date 2013-08-07T10:04:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / label-01

                        :ARG2 (p2 / packet))
                  :mod (s2 / some))

                  :op2 (p4 / product :name (n3 / name :op1 "Scud" :op2 "C")))

      :snt2 (s / show-01
            :ARG0 (d / draw-01
                  :quant (n4 / near
                        :op1 (a / all)))

                  :op1 (r / rocket

                              :op1 (n5 / note
                                    :ARG1-of (w / write-01
                                          :manner (h / hand)
                                          :mod (l3 / language :name (n6 / name :op1 "Korea"))))
                              :op2 (f / formula
                                    :mod (m2 / mathematics)
                                    :ARG1-of w)))
                  :op2 (s3 / section-01
                        :ARG1 r
                        :prep-with a2))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653.47 ::date 2013-08-07T10:19:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
