# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653.49 ::date 2013-08-07T10:32:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Scud B and Scud C designs found on the kuwolsan were from older North Korean missile programs which were derived from Soviet missile designs of the 1950s.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653_49.txt
(d / design-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / product :name (n / name :op1 "Scud" :op2 "B"))
            :op2 (p2 / product :name (n2 / name :op1 "Scud" :op2 "C")))
      :ARG1-of (f / find-01
            :location (s / ship :name (n3 / name :op1 "Kuwolsan")))
      :source (p3 / program
            :mod (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
            :mod (m / missile)
            :mod (o / old
                  :degree (m2 / more))
            :ARG1-of (d2 / derive-01
                  :ARG2 (d3 / design-01
                        :ARG1 m
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))
                        :time (d4 / date-entity :decade 1950)))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653.50 ::date 2013-08-07T10:58:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653.51 ::date 2013-08-07T11:02:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :mod (f / full)

                        :prep-with (d2 / decal)))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653.52 ::date 2013-08-07T11:48:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The blueprints included information pertaining to the inner workings of North Korea's missile industry which has been the focus of contention between the United States and North Korea since the 1980s.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653_52.txt
(i / include-01
      :ARG1 (i2 / information
            :ARG0-of (p / pertain-01
                  :ARG1 (w / work-09
                        :ARG0 (i3 / industry
                              :mod (m / missile)
                              :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                              :ARG2-of (f / focus-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / contention
                                          :mod (b2 / between
                                                :op1 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                                                :op2 c))
                                    :time (s / since
                                          :op1 (d / date-entity :decade 1980))))
                        :mod (i4 / inner))))
      :ARG2 (b / blueprint))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653.74 ::date 2013-08-07T23:54:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The kuwolsan cargo attests to the existence of a gray zone composed of a combination of weak States, open borders, lack of controls and a market of buyers and sellers of weapons of mass destruction.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20030814_0653_74.txt

      :ARG0 (c / cargo
            :location (s / ship :name (n / name :op1 "Kuwolsan")))

                  :mod (g / gray)

                        :ARG2 (t / thing

                                    :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (s2 / state
                                                :mod (w / weak))
                                          :op2 (b / border
                                                :ARG1-of (o / open-01))
                                          :op3 (l / lack-01
                                                :ARG1 (c4 / control-01))
                                          :op4 (m / market
                                                :consist-of (a3 / and

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.21 ::date 2013-08-03T08:01:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Western aid for conversion of General Nikolai N. Urakov's one time bioweapons laboratory peaked in 970000 because it was learned that Iran had made offers to the State Scientific Center of applied microbiology to purchase its expertise.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_21.txt
(p / peak-01
      :ARG1 (a / aid-01
            :ARG0 (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "West"))
            :ARG1 (c / convert-01
                  :ARG1 (l / laboratory
                        :mod (b2 / bioweapon)
                        :poss (p3 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Nikolai" :op2 "N." :op3 "Urakov")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (g / general)))
                        :time (o / one-time))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1997)
      :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (l2 / learn-01
                  :ARG1 (o2 / offer-01
                        :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :ARG1 (p2 / purchase-01
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 (e / expert-41
                                    :ARG1 o3))
                        :ARG3 (o3 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Scientific" :op3 "Center" :op4 "of" :op5 "applied" :op6 "microbiology"))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.22 ::date 2013-08-03T08:04:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Russian scientists and military leaders who now depend on Western financing to destroy nuclear, chemical and biological weapons have been known to orchestrate a sense of crisis to increase financing.
# ::save-date Wed Aug 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_22.txt
(k / know-01
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s / scientist
                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia")))
            :op2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG1 (m / military)))
            :ARG0-of (d / depend-01
                  :ARG1 (f / finance-01
                        :ARG0 (w / world-region :name (n3 / name :op1 "West")))
                  :time (n2 / now)
                  :purpose (d2 / destroy-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (w3 / weapon
                                    :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                              :op2 (w4 / weapon
                                    :mod (c2 / chemical))
                              :op3 (w5 / weapon
                                    :mod (b / biology))))))
      :ARG2 (o / orchestrate-01
            :ARG0 a2
            :ARG1 (s2 / sense-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / crisis))
            :purpose (i / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (f2 / finance-01))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.26 ::date 2013-08-03T08:13:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The International Science and Technology Center finances approximately half of General Nikolai N. Urakov's budget to support about 350 Russian biowarfare scientists and technicians.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_26.txt
(f / finance-01
      :ARG0 (r / research-institute :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Science" :op3 "and" :op4 "Technology" :op5 "Center"))
      :ARG1 (m2 / monetary-quantity
            :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                  :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity
                        :ARG1-of (b / budget-01
                              :ARG2 (s / support-01
                                    :ARG0 r
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / about
                                          :op1 (a3 / and :quant 350
                                                :op1 (s2 / scientist)
                                                :op2 (t / technician)
                                                :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                                                :mod (b2 / biowarfare))))))
                  :ARG3 (a / approximately :op1 "1/2"))
            :poss (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Nikolai" :op2 "N." :op3 "Urakov")
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (g / general)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.28 ::date 2013-08-03T15:05:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG2-of (a / archive-01

                                    :mod (d / danger))
                              :mod (i2 / importance
                                    :degree (m / most))

                  :ARG0 (d2 / destroy-01

                                          :mod (e / electricity))))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.29 ::date 2013-08-03T15:11:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Approximately 3000 strains of bacteria are stored at the State Scientific Center of applied microbiology and many of the bacteria are stored in cryogenic casks cooled with liquid nitrogen and isolated from the environment by layered enclosures and oversize air-handling systems that all depend on electricity to function.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_29.txt
(a2 / and
      :op1 (s / store-01
            :ARG1 (b3 / bacterium
                  :mod (s2 / strain
                        :quant (a / approximately :op1 3000)))
            :location (r / research-institute :name (n / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Scientific" :op3 "Center" :op4 "of" :op5 "applied" :op6 "microbiology")))
      :op2 (s3 / store-01
            :ARG1 (b2 / bacterium
                  :quant (m / many)
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                        :ARG2 b3))
            :location (c / cask
                  :mod (c2 / cryogen)
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cool-01
                        :instrument (n2 / nitrogen
                              :mod (l / liquid)))
                  :ARG1-of (i / isolate-01
                        :ARG2 (e / environment)
                        :instrument (a3 / and
                              :op1 (e4 / enclosure
                                    :ARG1-of (l2 / layer-00))
                              :op2 (s4 / system
                                    :ARG0-of (h / handle-01
                                          :ARG1 (a4 / air))
                                    :mod (o2 / oversize))
                              :ARG0-of (d / depend-01
                                    :ARG1 (e3 / electricity)
                                    :purpose (f / function-01))
                              :quant (a5 / all))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.30 ::date 2013-08-03T15:25:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The greatest danger from a shutdown of electric power at the State Scientific Center of applied microbiology would be the defrosting of live germs that are currently preserved in a frozen state.
# ::save-date Wed Aug 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_30.txt
(d / danger
      :mod (g / great
            :degree (m / most))
      :prep-from (s / shut-05
            :ARG1 (p / power
                  :mod (e / electric))
            :location (r / research-institute :name (n / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Scientific" :op3 "Center" :op4 "of" :op5 "applied" :op6 "microbiology")))
      :mod (d2 / defrost-01
            :ARG1 (g2 / germ
                  :ARG0-of (l / live-01)
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / preserve-01
                        :mod (s2 / state
                              :mod (f / freeze-01))
                        :time (c / current)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.31 ::date 2013-08-03T15:35:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_31.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p4 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Raymond" :op2 "Zilinskas")

                  :ARG1 (r / research-institute :name (n / name :op1 "Monterey" :op2 "Institute" :op3 "of" :op4 "International" :op5 "Studies"))
                  :ARG3 (e / expert-41
                        :ARG1 p4
                        :ARG2 (w / warfare
                              :mod (b / biology)))))
      :ARG1 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                  :ARG2 (o2 / organism)
                  :mod (m / main)
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (c / cut-02
                              :ARG1 (p2 / power)
                              :prep-to (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Scientific" :op3 "Center" :op4 "of" :op5 "applied" :op6 "microbiology")))))
            :ARG2 (t2 / threaten-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / possible
                        :domain (e2 / escape-01
                              :ARG0 o2))
                  :ARG1-of c3)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.32 ::date 2013-08-03T15:40:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Raymond zilinskas stated that in the worst case the bacteria would be defrosted from minus 70 degrees and it would be a real mess to clean up afterward because it would not be known for certain whether all the bacteria was dead.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_32.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Raymond" :op2 "Zilinskas"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (d4 / defrost-01
                  :ARG1 (b2 / bacterium)
                  :prep-from (t / temperature-quantity :quant "-70")
                  :condition (c / case
                        :mod (b / bad
                              :degree (m / most))))
            :op2 (m2 / mess
                  :mod (r / real)
                  :domain (c2 / clean-02
                        :time (a2 / afterward))
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (k / know-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (d3 / die-01 :mode interrogative
                                    :ARG1 (b3 / bacterium
                                          :mod (a3 / all)))
                              :mod (c4 / certain))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.33 ::date 2013-08-03T15:47:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The confrontation between the mosenergo electric utility and the State Scientific Center of applied Microbiology in obolensk is another example of how the basic capitalist imperative for enterprises to be self-sustaining can clash in a dangerous way with the old remnants of Soviet weapons science.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_33.txt
(e / exemplify-01
      :ARG0 (c / confront-01
            :ARG0 (u2 / utility :name (n5 / name :op1 "Mosenergo" :op2 "electric" :op3 "utility"))
            :ARG1 (r2 / research-institute :name (n2 / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Scientific" :op3 "Center" :op4 "of" :op5 "applied" :op6 "Microbiology")
                  :location (c3 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Obolensk"))))
      :ARG1 (p / possible
            :domain (c4 / clash-01
                  :ARG0 (i / imperative
                        :mod (c2 / capitalism)
                        :mod (b / basic)
                        :topic (s3 / sustain-01
                              :ARG0 (e3 / enterprise)
                              :ARG1 e3))
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :mod (o2 / old)
                        :ARG1-of (r / remain-01
                              :source (s2 / science
                                    :mod (w2 / weapon
                                          :mod (c6 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Soviet"))))))
                  :manner (d / dangerous)))
      :mod (a2 / another))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.34 ::date 2013-08-03T15:57:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (b2 / bill

            :location (b / base
                  :mod (s / strategy)

                              :mod (n3 / nucleus))
                        :ARG2 (a / alert-01
                              :mod (h / high))))))

            :mod (b / back)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.37 ::date 2013-08-03T16:04:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (u / utility :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "energy" :op3 "systems")

      :ARG1 (p / power

            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2001 :month 2))
      :location (i2 / installation
            :mod (m / military)
            :location (a2 / around
                  :op1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Russia")))
            :quant (n3 / number)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.39 ::date 2013-08-03T17:23:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Aug 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_39.txt
(r2 / restore-01
      :ARG1 e
      :mod (q / quick)
      :time (c3 / case
            :quant (m3 / most)
            :mod (i / installation
                  :mod (m2 / military)
                  :ARG4-of (c2 / cut-04
                        :ARG1 (e / electricity)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.40 ::date 2013-08-03T17:33:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Often investigations show that the tug of war with the utility forces the military to spend budgeted funds for electrical power instead of diverting money for other uses.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118_40.txt
(s / show-01
      :ARG0 (i / investigate-01)
      :ARG1 (t / tug-02
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (u2 / utility)
                  :op2 (m3 / military))
            :mod (w / war)
            :ARG0-of (f / force-01
                  :ARG1 m3
                  :ARG2 (s2 / spend-01
                        :ARG0 m3
                        :ARG1 (p / power
                              :mod (e / electricity))
                        :ARG3 (m4 / monetary-quantity
                              :ARG1-of (b / budget-01)
                              :ARG2-of (f2 / fund-01))
                        :prep-instead-of (d / divert-01
                              :ARG0 (m / military)
                              :ARG1 (m2 / money)
                              :ARG3 (t2 / thing
                                    :mod (o2 / other)
                                    :ARG2-of (u / use-01))))))
      :frequency (o / often))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20040724_0084.6 ::date 2013-09-02T09:14:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Brazil announced that the air force will begin shooting down aircraft used in trafficking illegal drugs in Brazilian airspace.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20040724_0084_6.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Brazil"))
      :ARG1 (b / begin-01
            :ARG0 (m / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "Air" :op2 "Force"))
            :ARG1 (s / shoot-05
                  :ARG0 m
                  :ARG1 (a3 / aircraft
                        :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                              :ARG2 (t / traffic-00
                                    :ARG1 (d / drug
                                          :mod (l / law :polarity -))
                                    :location (a4 / airspace
                                          :mod c)))))))

                                    :op2 (c5 / company))
                              :ARG2 (l / lawsuit)))
                  :ARG1 c)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20040724_0084.11 ::date 2013-09-02T11:21:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Sep 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20040724_0084_11.txt

      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
      :ARG1 (s / support-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (o / operation
                  :ARG0-of (t / target-01
                        :ARG1 (a / aircraft
                              :ARG0-of (r2 / run-08
                                    :ARG1 (d2 / drug)))))
            :time (p / previous))
      :time (a2 / and
            :op1 (s2 / shoot-05
                  :ARG0 (j / jet
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Peru")))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / plane
                        :mod (s3 / small)
                        :ARG1-of (m / misidentify-00
                              :ARG2 (t2 / thing
                                    :ARG0-of (c3 / carry-01
                                          :ARG1 (d3 / drug))))))
            :op2 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG0 j
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (m2 / missionary
                              :mod c)
                        :op2 (c4 / child
                              :poss m2))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2001 :month 4))

# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_9.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (a2 / ally-01
            :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Fidel" :op2 "Castro")
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Cuba"))))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Chavez"))
            :mod (m / major))
      :op2 (g / grow-02
            :ARG1 p2
            :ARG2 (c2 / close-41
                  :ARG1 p2
                  :ARG2 p
                  :degree (m2 / more))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.10 ::date 2013-08-11T01:04:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Chavez's detractors in the US government say that it is even more troubling that Chavez's arms purchases and indoctrination of civilian militias could be part of a strategy to restructure Venezuelan democracy in the image of Cuban-style militarized socialism and foment leftist revolutions throughout South America.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_10.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (d / detract-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chavez")))
            :location (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "US")))))
      :ARG1 (t / trouble-01
            :ARG0 (h / have-part-91
                  :ARG1 (s2 / strategy
                        :ARG0-of (r / restructure-01
                              :ARG1 (d2 / democracy
                                    :mod (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Venezuela")))
                              :manner (i2 / image
                                    :mod (s3 / socialism
                                          :ARG1-of (m2 / militarize-00)
                                          :mod (s4 / style
                                                :mod (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Cuba"))))))
                        :ARG0-of (f / foment-01
                              :ARG1 (r2 / revolution
                                    :mod (l / leftist))
                              :path (t2 / throughout
                                    :location (c5 / continent :name (n6 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "America")))))
                  :ARG2 (a / and
                        :op1 (p3 / purchase-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 (a2 / arm))
                        :op2 (i / indoctrinate-01
                              :ARG1 (m / militia
                                    :mod (c2 / civilian))))
                  :mod (p4 / possible))
            :degree (m3 / more
                  :mod (e / even))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.12 ::date 2013-08-10T07:45:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-16 ::preferred

(s / shift-01
      :ARG1 (m / mainstream
            :mod (p / politics)
            :location (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "Latin" :op2 "America")))
      :ARG2 (l2 / leftward)
      :time (s2 / since
            :op1 (l3 / late
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :decade 1990))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.13 ::date 2013-08-10T12:43:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-16 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Aug 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_13.txt
(r / react-01
      :ARG1 (f / fail-01
            :ARG1 (e / economics
                  :mod (m / market
                        :mod (f2 / free)))
            :ARG1-of (p / perceive-01))
      :ARG2 (s / shift-01
            :ARG2 (l / leftward)
            :mod (t / this))
      :manner (l2 / large))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.14 ::date 2013-08-03T12:02:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-11 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Aug 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_14.txt
(e / elect-01
      :ARG1 (l / leftist)
      :ARG2 (l2 / lead-02
            :ARG0 l
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Brazil"))
                  :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Argentina"))
                  :op3 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Chile"))
                  :op4 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Uruguay"))
                  :op5 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Ecuador"))
                  :op6 (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Venezuela")))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.15 ::date 2013-08-11T01:29:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Chavez's supporters at home counter that the United States has a century-long history of open as well as covert armed intervention in Latin America's domestic politics and say that it has no right to question Venezuela's defense preparations.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_15.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c / counter-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / support-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chavez")))
                  :location (h / home))
            :ARG2 (h2 / have-03
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                  :ARG1 (h3 / history
                        :duration-of (a5 / and
                              :op1 (i / intervene-01
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / politics
                                          :mod (d / domestic)
                                          :poss (w / world-region :name (n3 / name :op1 "Latin" :op2 "America")))
                                    :ARG1-of (a3 / arm-01)
                                    :mod (o / open))
                              :op2 (i2 / intervene-01
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 p3
                                    :ARG1-of a3
                                    :mod (c3 / covert)))
                        :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (c5 / century)))))
      :op2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (e / entitle-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (q / question-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (p4 / prepare-02
                              :ARG0 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Venezuela"))
                              :ARG2 (d2 / defend-01)))
                  :ARG2 c2)))

                  :op2 "Assembly")

                  :name (n4 / name
                          :op1 "Venezuela"))
          :ARG2-of (s2 / serve-01))
  :ARG3 (s / specialize-01
          :ARG1 (d / defend-01)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.27 ::date 2013-08-11T04:11:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-16 ::preferred
# ::snt In May, Chavez's government announced details in 050500 of an $18.6 million deal with a Russian firm to purchase 100000 AK-103 assault rifles with 30 rounds of ammunition each and the technology transfer for Venezuela to manufacture the rifles.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_27.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)
            :poss (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chavez")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (d5 / detail-01
                  :ARG1 (d6 / deal-01
                        :ARG0 (a3 / and
                              :op1 g
                              :op2 (f / firm
                                    :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))))
                        :ARG1 (p2 / purchase-01
                              :ARG0 g
                              :ARG1 (r / rifle :quant 100000 :name (n3 / name :op1 "AK-103")
                                    :instrument-of (a4 / assault-01)
                                    :accompanier (r2 / round :quant 30
                                          :consist-of (a5 / ammunition))
                                    :mod (e / each)))
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / cost-01
                              :ARG2 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 18600000
                                    :unit (d7 / dollar)))))
            :op2 (t / transfer-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / technology)
                  :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Venezuela"))
                  :purpose (m3 / manufacture-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 r)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2005 :month 5))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.28 ::date 2013-08-11T04:33:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (d2 / deal-01)

            :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 186.22
                  :unit (d / dollar))
            :ARG2 (r / rifle :quant 1)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.29 ::date 2013-08-11T04:47:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_29.txt

      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :ARG2-of (p / price-01)
            :mod (t2 / this))
      :degree (l / less
            :manner (c2 / considerable))
      :compared-to (b / between
            :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 825
                  :unit (d / dollar))
            :op2 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 850
                  :unit (d2 / dollar))
            :ARG2-of (p2 / price-01
                  :ARG1 (w / weapon
                        :ARG1-of (s / same-41)
                        :ARG1-of (o / order-02
                              :medium (m3 / mail
                                    :mod (c3 / country :name (n / name :op1 "US"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.30 ::date 2013-08-11T05:01:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-16 ::preferred

            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / helicopter :quant 10
                        :source (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia")))
                  :op2 (p / plane :quant 10
                        :mod (t / transport-01)
                        :source (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Spain")))
                  :op3 (c4 / craft :quant 6
                        :mod (n4 / navy)
                        :source c3)))
      :mod (a2 / also))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.31 ::date 2013-08-11T05:23:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-16 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.32 ::date 2013-08-11T05:34:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-16 ::preferred
# ::snt Chavez has insisted and even his staunchest retired military Critics here agree that the purchases are essential to update old weaponry such as the military's decades-old Belgian FAL rifles.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_32.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / insist-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Chavez")))
      :op2 (a2 / agree-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (c / criticize-01
                        :ARG1 p)
                  :mod (m / military)
                  :ARG0-of (r / retire-01)
                  :mod (s / staunch
                        :degree (m2 / most))
                  :mod (e / even)
                  :location (h / here))
            :ARG1 (e2 / essential
                  :domain (p3 / purchase-01)
                  :purpose (u / update-01
                        :ARG1 (w / weaponry
                              :mod (o / old)
                              :example (r2 / rifle :name (n2 / name :op1 "FAL")
                                    :ARG1-of (a3 / age-01
                                          :ARG2 (m3 / multiple
                                                :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                                      :unit (d / decade))))
                                    :source (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Belgium"))
                                    :poss (m4 / military)))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.38 ::date 2013-08-11T07:08:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-16 ::preferred

                        :location (w2 / world-region :name (n5 / name :op1 "Latin" :op2 "America")))
                  :mod (p2 / possible)))
      :manner (o3 / open))

                        :ARG2 (w2 / weapon
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / seize-01
                                    :ARG2 (g2 / guerrilla

                                    :ARG0 (m3 / military
                                          :mod (f / foreign))))
                        :ARG3 (m / more-than :op1 "1/2")))
            :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Venezuela"))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.55 ::date 2013-08-11T12:14:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Asymmetrical warfare is a term coined by US military strategists to describe a conflict between unequal combatants where the weaker side employs guerrilla tactics.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_55.txt
(t / term
      :ARG1-of (c / coin-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (m / military
                              :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "US")))
                        :ARG3 (s / strategize-01))))
      :ARG0-of (d / describe-01
            :ARG1 (c3 / conflict-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (c4 / combat-01)
                        :mod (e / equal :polarity -))
                  :location-of (e2 / employ-02
                        :ARG0 (s3 / side
                              :mod (w2 / weak
                                    :degree (m2 / more)))

      :ARG1 (s / source
            :mod (p / police
                  :mod (c / city :name (n / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong"))))

# ::save-date Sun Aug 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20021020_0012_5.txt

      :ARG0 (p3 / publication :name (n / name :op1 "Radio" :op2 "Nepal")

                        :mod (o2 / other)))
            :time (a3 / ambush-01
                  :ARG0 (g / guerrilla
                        :ARG0-of (o3 / oppose-01
                              :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01))))
                  :ARG1 (v / vehicle
                        :poss (a4 / and
                              :op1 p
                              :op2 p2))
                  :location (w3 / west
                        :part-of (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Nepal"))))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 10 :day 19
                  :dayperiod (e / evening)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2002 :month 10 :day 20))

              :name (n7 / name
                      :op1 "Moscow"))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :day 23

                  :op1 "Hiro"
                  :op2 "Ueki")
          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG2 (s2 / spokesman)))
  :ARG1 (v / visit-01
          :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                             :ARG1 (o / organization
                                     :name (n2 / name
                                             :op1 "United"
                                             :op2 "Nations"))
                             :ARG3 (i / inspect-01
                                     :ARG0 p
                                     :ARG1 (a / arm))))
          :ARG1 (s3 / site
                  :quant 7
                  :location (c / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                      :op1 "Iraq")))
          :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 12
                  :day 28
                  :year 2002)
          :purpose (s4 / search-01
                     :ARG0 p
                     :ARG2 (w / weapon
                             :ARG0-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                        :degree (m / mass))
                             :ARG1-of (p2 / prohibit-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030624_0298.4 ::date 2013-08-07T00:51:06 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The French foreign minister characterizes recent raids on People's Mujahedeen in Paris as part of fight on terrorism.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030624_0298_4.txt
(c / characterize-01
  :ARG0 (p2 / person
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c2 / country
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "France"))
                     :ARG2 (m / minister
                             :mod (f / foreign))))

          :ARG1 (o / organization
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "People's"
                          :op2 "Mujahedeen")
                  :location (c3 / city
                              :name (n3 / name
                                      :op1 "Paris")))
          :time (r2 / recency))
  :ARG2 (p / part
          :part-of (f2 / fight-02
                     :ARG1 (t / terrorism))))

                  :op1 (m4 / monetary-quantity :quant 9000000
                        :unit (d / dollar

                              :mod c5))))

            :ARG0 (p2 / police)))

                              :mod (f / former)))

                              :ARG2 (g / general)))
                  :time (d3 / date-entity :month 4 :year 1999)))
      :ARG2 (a / assassinate-01
            :mod (t / this)))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030709_0070.4 ::date 2013-08-09T03:33:30 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Despite pressure from the United States and the creation of the Proliferation Security Initiative, Australian Prime Minister John Howard is hesitant to use military force to intercept suspected drug- or weapon-smuggling vessels belonging to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030709_0070_4.txt
(h / hesitate-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "John" :op2 "Howard")
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Australia"))
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :mod (p2 / prime))))
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (f / force
                  :mod (m2 / military))
            :purpose (i / intercept-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (v / vessel
                        :ARG0-of (s / smuggle-01
                              :ARG1 (o / or
                                    :op1 (d / drug)
                                    :op2 (w / weapon)))
                        :ARG0-of (b / belong-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Democratic" :op2 "People's" :op3 "Republic" :op4 "of" :op5 "Korea")))
                        :ARG2-of (s2 / suspect-01))))
      :concession (p3 / pressure-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                  :op2 (c4 / create-01
                        :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n5 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030709_0070.5 ::date 2013-08-09T04:42:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030709_0070_5.txt

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization

                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Australia"))))
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 g

                  :mod c)
            :ARG2 (i / intercept-01

                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Democratic" :op2 "People's" :op3 "Republic" :op4 "of" :op5 "Korea"))

                              :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
                                    :ARG1 (o / or
                                          :op1 (w / weapon)

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030709_0070.6 ::date 2013-08-09T04:48:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030709_0070_6.txt

  :ARG0 (o / organization
          :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Associated"
                  :op2 "Press")
          :mod c)
  :ARG1 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "John"
                  :op2 "Howard")
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Australia"))
                     :ARG2 (m / minister
                             :mod (p2 / prime))))
  :ARG2 (s / state-01
          :ARG0 p
          :ARG1 (c2 / consider-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                          :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                     :ARG1 c))
                  :ARG1 (c3 / contribute-01
                          :ARG0 g
                          :ARG1 (m2 / military))
                  :polarity -
                  :time (s2 / stage
                          :mod (t / this))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2003
          :month 6
          :day 9))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20030709_0070.7 ::date 2013-08-09T05:16:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Australia"))))

                        :op1 (w / way)
                        :op2 (m / mean-01
                              :ARG1 (d / deal-01
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / problem
                                          :mod (b / big
                                                :degree (v / very)))))))
            :op2 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG1 g
                  :ARG2 (c3 / choose-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (d2 / descriptor)
                              :op2 (w2 / word))
                        :manner (s2 / sensible
                              :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                                    :ARG0 (d3 / deal-01
                                          :ARG0 g
                                          :ARG1 (a4 / and
                                                :op1 (i / issue
                                                      :mod (v2 / volatile))
                                                :op2 (c5 / country
                                                      :ARG0-of (o2 / operate-01 :polarity -
                                                            :ARG3 (s3 / say-01
                                                                  :ARG0 (t / treaty :name (n3 / name :op1 "Convention")))))))))))))

                  :mod (d2 / date-entity
                         :year 2003
                         :month 7
                         :day 14))))

                        :ARG1 c3

                  :ARG3 (d3 / date-entity :year 2003 :month 11 :day 8))))

      :ARG0 (d2 / discuss-01

            :ARG2 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Thabo" :op2 "Mbeki")))
      :ARG1 (t / threat
            :mod (n3 / new)
            :example (a3 / and
                  :op1 (t2 / terrorism)
                  :op2 (d3 / drug)
                  :op3 (t3 / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (w / weapon)
                        :mod (l / law :polarity -))
                  :op4 (d / disease :name (n4 / name :op1 "AIDS"))))
      :ARG2 (s / security
            :mod (i / international))
      :mod (a2 / also))

                              :ARG4 c))
                  :unit d)))

                                    :mod (d2 / defense)))))

          :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Chirac"))

              :mod (s2 / space)

                          :name (n6 / name
                                  :op1 "Krasnoznamernsk")
                          :location (s3 / some
                                      :op1 (d3 / distance-quantity

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Hambali"))
      :ARG1 (b / bomb-01
            :ARG1 (i / island :name (n2 / name :op1 "Bali"))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2002))
      :ARG1-of (a / allege-01))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20040407_0026.8 ::date 2013-08-10T12:41:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Philippines"))))

                        :ARG1 c)

                        :location (c / country))
                  :ARG2 o)

                  :mod (o2 / only))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20040407_0026.12 ::date 2013-08-10T13:05:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (c / country
                              :direction (i / in))
                        :op2 (c2 / country
                              :direction (o / out)))
                  :frequency (n3 / number))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20040429_0189.6 ::date 2013-08-09T03:05:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In an interview with Dieter stolte on 29 April 2004 Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao stated that the governments of China and Germany should establish solid cooperation, enhance consultations on major international issues and further strengthen trade and technological exchanges.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 4, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20040429_0189_6.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Wen"
                  :op2 "Jiabao")
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "China"))
                     :ARG2 (p2 / premier)))
  :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
          :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (e / establish-01
                         :ARG0 (a2 / and
                                 :op1 (g / government-organization
                                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                                   :ARG1 c))
                                 :op2 (g3 / government-organization
                                        :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                                                   :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                                           :name (n4 / name
                                                                   :op1 "Germany")))))
                         :ARG1 (c3 / cooperate-01
                                 :mod (s2 / solid)))
                  :op2 (e2 / enhance-01
                         :ARG0 a2
                         :ARG1 (c4 / consult-01
                                 :ARG2 (i2 / issue
                                         :mod (i3 / international)
                                         :mod (m / major))))
                  :op3 (s3 / strengthen-01
                         :ARG0 a2
                         :ARG1 (e3 / exchange-01
                                 :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                         :op1 (t / trade-01)
                                         :op2 (t2 / technology)))
                         :manner (f / further-01))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :day 29
          :month 4
          :year 2004)
  :medium (i / interview-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                    :name (n3 / name
                            :op1 "Dieter"
                            :op2 "stolte"))
            :ARG1 p))

                        :mod (c3 / corporate)))

                              :mod (f3 / foreign))))
            :op6 (g5 / grow-01

                                    :mod (b / balance-01))

            :ARG2 p))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20040429_0189.40 ::date 2013-08-11T00:40:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In order to restrict the excessive fixed asset construction that caused a rise in capital good prices and strained the supply of coal, electricity, oil and transportation, the Chinese government will increase its macro economic control and employ all necessary administrative methods.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20040429_0189_40.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / increase-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
            :ARG1 (c2 / control-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG2 (e / economy)
                  :mod (m / macro)))
      :op2 (e2 / employ-02
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (m2 / method
                  :mod (a2 / administrate-01)
                  :mod (n2 / need-01)
                  :mod (a3 / all)))
      :purpose (r / restrict-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (c3 / construct-01
                  :ARG1 (a4 / asset
                        :ARG1-of (f / fix-03))
                  :mod (e3 / excessive)

# ::snt 2004-10-09
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_1.txt
(d / date-entity :year 2004 :month 10 :day 9)

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.2 ::date 2013-08-11T04:01:46 ::snt-type country ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Viet Nam (VN); Germany (DE)
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_2.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
      :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany")))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.3 ::date 2013-08-11T04:02:31 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt International; Government; technology; politics; economy; money; leader
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
      :op3 (t / technology)
      :op4 (p / politics)
      :op5 (e / economy)
      :op6 (m / money)
      :op7 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (l / lead-02)))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.4 ::date 2013-08-11T04:05:26 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt German Chancellor Gerhard Schroeder attended meetings with Vietnamese government leaders after the 5th Asia-Europe Meeting summit in Hanoi.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_4.txt
(a / attend-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Gerhard" :op2 "Schroeder")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                  :ARG2 (c2 / chancellor)))
      :ARG1 (m / meet-03
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Vietnam")))))))
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (s / summit
                  :mod (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Asia-Europe" :op2 "Meeting"))
                  :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 5)
                  :location (c4 / city :name (n5 / name :op1 "Hanoi")))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.5 ::date 2013-08-11T04:16:42 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt German and Vietnamese officials signed 5 documents on financial, technical and business cooperation totaling over 260 million dollars.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_5.txt
(s / sign-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Germany"))
                        :ARG2 (o / official)))
            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / official))))
      :ARG1 (d / document :quant 5
            :topic (c3 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (f / financial)
                        :op2 (t / technique)
                        :op3 (b / business)))
            :ARG1-of (t2 / total-01
                  :ARG2 (o3 / over
                        :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 260000000
                              :unit (d2 / dollar))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.6 ::date 2013-08-11T04:27:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Media reports stated on 10 October 2004 that Vietnamese and German officials have pledged to further Vietnamese and German relations in such fields as investment, trade and technology and to support each other in the United Nations (UN).
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (r / report
            :mod (m / media))
      :ARG1 (p / pledge-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                              :ARG2 (o / official)))
                  :op2 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                              :ARG2 (o2 / official))))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (r2 / relation
                        :time (f / further)
                        :poss (a3 / and
                              :op1 c
                              :op2 c2)
                        :mod (f2 / field
                              :example (a4 / and
                                    :op1 (i / invest-01)
                                    :op2 (t / trade-01)
                                    :op3 (t2 / technology))))
                  :op2 (s2 / support-01
                        :ARG0 (e / each)
                        :ARG1 (o3 / other)
                        :location (o4 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations")))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2004 :month 10 :day 10))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.7 ::date 2013-08-11T04:45:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt German Chancellor Gerhard Schroeder attended the 5th Asia-Europe Meeting summit in Hanoi on 8 October 2004 and 9 October 2004.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_7.txt
(a / attend-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Gerhard" :op2 "Schroeder")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                  :ARG2 (c2 / chancellor)))
      :ARG1 (s / summit
            :mod (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Asia-Europe" :op2 "Meeting"))
            :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 5)
            :location (c3 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Hanoi"))
            :time (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / date-entity :year 2004 :month 10 :day 8)
                  :op2 (d2 / date-entity :year 2004 :month 10 :day 9))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.8 ::date 2013-08-11T04:52:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt During separate talks and meetings with Schroeder held on 9 October 2004 Vietnamese leaders stated that the Vietnamese government supports the German government's bid for a permanent seat in the UN Security Council and wants to strengthen Vietnamese relations with Germany.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_8.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam"))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s2 / support-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c))
                  :ARG1 (b / bid-01
                        :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Germany"))))
                        :ARG1 (s3 / seat-01
                              :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Security" :op2 "Council")
                                    :part-of (o2 / organization :name (n5 / name :op1 "UN")))
                              :mod (p4 / permanence))))
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (s4 / strengthen-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (r / relation
                              :mod c
                              :prep-with c2))))
      :time (a / and
            :op1 (t / talk-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Schroeder"))
                  :manner (s5 / separate))
            :op2 (m / meet-03
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 p2
                  :manner s5)
            :ARG1-of (h2 / hold-04
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2004 :month 10 :day 9))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.9 ::date 2013-08-11T05:17:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Vietnamese Prime Minister Phan Van Khai stated that the visit by Schroeder is important to the Vietnam-German relationship and the closer cooperation between the 2 continents.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_9.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Phan" :op2 "Van" :op3 "Khai")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :mod (p2 / prime))))
      :ARG1 (i / important
            :domain (v / visit-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Schroeder")))
            :purpose (a / and
                  :op1 (r / relationship
                        :mod c
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Germany")))
                  :op2 (c3 / cooperate-01
                        :ARG0 (c4 / continent :quant 2)
                        :manner (c5 / close
                              :degree (m2 / more))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.10 ::date 2013-08-11T05:26:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Vietnamese and German officials signed 5 documents on financial, technical and business cooperation totaling over 260 million US dollars.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_10.txt
(s / sign-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                        :ARG2 (o / official)))
            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / official))))
      :ARG1 (d / document :quant 5
            :topic (c3 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (f / financial)
                        :op2 (t / technique)
                        :op3 (b / business)))
            :ARG1-of (t2 / total-01
                  :ARG2 (o3 / over
                        :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 260000000
                              :unit (d2 / dollar
                                    :mod (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "US"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.11 ::date 2013-08-11T05:28:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The documents cover financial cooperation for 2 stages in the 2003-2005 period and the purchase of 16 locomotives for the Vietnam Railway Corporation and equipment for a local cement plant.
# ::save-date Tue Aug 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_11.txt
(c / cover-01
      :ARG0 (d / document)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (f / finance
                  :ARG2-of (c2 / cooperate-01)
                  :duration (s / stage :quant 2
                        :time (d2 / date-interval
                              :op1 (d3 / date-entity :year 2003)
                              :op2 (d4 / date-entity :year 2005))))
            :op2 (p / purchase-01
                  :ARG1 (l / locomotive :quant 16)
                  :ARG4 (c3 / company :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam" :op2 "Railway" :op3 "Corporation")))
            :op3 (e / equipment
                  :beneficiary (p2 / plant
                        :mod (l2 / local)
                        :mod (c4 / cement)))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.12 ::date 2013-08-11T05:54:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Vietnamese State President Tran Duc Luong stated in a meeting with Schroeder that the Vietnamese Government would like to receive more technology transfer and experience from Germany and that Vietnam is developing under the industrialization process.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Tran" :op2 "Duc" :op3 "Luong")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (l / like-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c))
                  :ARG1 (r / receive-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (t / transfer-01
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                                          :quant (m2 / more)))
                              :op2 (e / experience))
                        :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Germany"))))
            :op2 (d / develop-02
                  :ARG1 c
                  :prep-under (p4 / process
                        :mod (i / industrialize-01))))
      :time (m / meet-03
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (p3 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Schroeder"))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.13 ::date 2013-08-11T06:04:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Schroeder stated that German officials attach great importance to Vietnam in an attempt to strengthen bilateral ties.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_13.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Schroeder"))
      :ARG1 (a / attach-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                        :ARG2 (o / official)))
            :ARG1 (i / importance
                  :mod (g / great))
            :prep-to (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
            :purpose (a2 / attempt-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (s2 / strengthen-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (t / tie-01
                              :mod (b / bilateral))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.14 ::date 2013-08-11T07:14:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The German Government supports the Vietnamese government's bid for a non-permanent membership of the UN Security Council in the 2008-2009 term and encourages small- and medium-sized German enterprises to do business with Vietnam.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_14.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s / support-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Germany"))))
            :ARG1 (b / bid-01
                  :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))))
                  :ARG1 (m / membership
                        :mod (p / permanence :polarity -)
                        :mod (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Security" :op2 "Council")
                              :part-of (o2 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "UN")))
                        :time (t / term
                              :mod (d / date-interval
                                    :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2008)
                                    :op2 (d3 / date-entity :year 2009))))))
      :op2 (e / encourage-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (e2 / enterprise
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / size-01
                              :ARG2 (s3 / small))
                        :mod c)
                  :op2 (e3 / enterprise
                        :ARG1-of (s4 / size-01
                              :ARG2 (m2 / medium))
                        :mod c))
            :ARG2 (d4 / do-02
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (b2 / business)
                  :ARG4 c2)))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.15 ::date 2013-08-11T07:37:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The German government offered the Vietnamese government official development assistance worth more than 480 million dollars in the 1990-2003 period primarily for poverty reduction, agriculture development, healthcare and economic reforms.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_15.txt
(o / offer-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Germany"))))
      :ARG1 (a / assist-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 g3
            :ARG2 (d / develop-02)
            :manner (o2 / official)
            :mod (w / worth
                  :quant (m / more-than
                        :op1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 480000000
                              :unit (d2 / dollar))))
            :time (d3 / date-interval
                  :op1 (d4 / date-entity :year 1990)
                  :op2 (d5 / date-entity :year 2003))
            :purpose (a2 / and
                  :op1 (r / reduce-01
                        :ARG1 (p / poverty))
                  :op2 (d6 / develop-02
                        :ARG1 (a3 / agriculture))
                  :op3 (h / healthcare)
                  :op4 (r2 / reform-01
                        :ARG1 (e / economy))
                  :mod (p2 / primarily)))
      :ARG3 (g3 / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam")))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024.16 ::date 2013-08-11T07:56:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Vietnam-Germany trade volume rose 7.7 percent in 2003 to reach 1.4 billion dollars, of which 815.4 million dollars came from Vietnamese exports.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041010_0024_16.txt
(r / rise-01
      :ARG1 (v / volume
            :mod (t / trade-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                  :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))))
      :ARG2 (p / percentage-entity :value 7.7)
      :ARG4 (r2 / reach-01
            :ARG0 v
            :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 1400000000
                  :unit (d2 / dollar)
                  :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 815400000
                              :unit d2
                              :ARG1-of (c3 / come-03
                                    :ARG2 (e / export-01
                                          :ARG0 c))))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2003))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.3 ::date 2013-08-11T08:08:47 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt technology; international
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (t / technology)
      :op2 (i / international))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.4 ::date 2013-08-11T08:09:34 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Hong Kong universities collaborate with universities, businesses and government sectors of mainland China to coordinate training programs and research centers to promote high-tech research, commercialization, and technology transfer.
# ::save-date Tue Aug 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_4.txt
(c / collaborate-01
      :ARG0 (u / university
            :mod (c2 / city :name (n / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong")))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (u2 / university
                  :mod (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China")
                        :mod (m / mainland)))
            :op2 (b / business
                  :mod c3)
            :op3 (s / sector
                  :mod (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                  :mod c3))
      :ARG2 (c4 / coordinate-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p / program
                        :mod (t / train-01))
                  :op2 (c5 / center
                        :mod (r / research-01)))
            :purpose (p2 / promote-02
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (c6 / commercialize-01
                              :ARG1 (r2 / research-01
                                    :mod (h / high-tech)))
                        :op2 (t2 / transfer-01
                              :ARG1 (t3 / technology))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.5 ::date 2013-08-11T08:21:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In 2004 Hong Kong tertiary institutes actively contributed to improved relations between Hong Kong and mainland China in the research and development of high technology.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_5.txt
(c / contribute-01
      :ARG0 (i / institute
            :mod (t / tertiary)
            :mod (c2 / city :name (n / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong")))
      :ARG2 (i2 / improve-01
            :ARG1 (r / relation
                  :mod (b / between
                        :op1 c2
                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China")
                              :mod (m / mainland)))
                  :topic (a2 / and
                        :op1 (r2 / research-01
                              :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                                    :mod (h / high)))
                        :op2 (d2 / develop-02
                              :ARG1 t2))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2004)
      :manner (a / active))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.6 ::date 2013-08-11T08:27:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Hong Kong universities have collaborated with tertiary education, business and government sectors of mainland China to direct training programs and research centers to promote research commercialization and technology transfer.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_6.txt
(c / collaborate-01
      :ARG0 (u / university
            :mod (c5 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong")))
      :ARG1 (a4 / and
            :op1 (s / sector
                  :mod (e / education
                        :mod (t / tertiary)))
            :op2 (s2 / sector
                  :mod (b / business))
            :op3 (s3 / sector
                  :mod (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "China")
                  :mod (m / mainland)))
      :ARG2 (d / direct-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p / program
                        :mod (t2 / train-01))
                  :op2 (c3 / center
                        :mod (r / research-01)))
            :ARG2 (p2 / promote-02
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (c4 / commercialize-01
                              :ARG1 (r2 / research-01))
                        :op3 (t3 / transfer-01
                              :ARG1 (t4 / technology))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.7 ::date 2013-08-11T08:37:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In June 2004 Hong Kong Polytechnic University (PolyU) joined national university science and technology park of the Virtual University Park in Shenzhen, China becoming the first tertiary institution of Hong Kong to establish research centers and training facilities in mainland China.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 30, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_7.txt
(j / join-01
      :ARG0 (u / university :name (n / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong" :op3 "Polytechnic" :op4 "University"))
      :ARG1 (p / park
            :mod (u2 / university)
            :poss (e / event :name (n3 / name :op1 "Virtual" :op2 "University" :op3 "Park")
                  :location (c / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Shenzhen")
                        :location (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "China"))))
            :mod (s / science)
            :mod (n2 / national)
            :mod (t / technology))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2004 :month 6)
      :mod (b / become-01
            :ARG1 u
            :ARG2 (i / institute
                  :mod (t2 / tertiary)
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                  :poss (c3 / city :name (n6 / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong"))
                  :ARG0-of (e2 / establish-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (c4 / center
                                    :mod (r / research-01))
                              :op2 (f / facility
                                    :mod (t3 / train-01)))
                        :location (m / mainland
                              :part-of c2)))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.8 ::date 2013-08-11T09:00:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_8.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Poon" :op2 "Chung-kwong")

                  :ARG1 (u / university :name (n2 / name :op1 "PolyU"))

            :ARG0 (s3 / sector
                  :mod (b / both
                        :op1 (p3 / public)
                        :op2 (p4 / private))
                  :mod (c / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong")))
            :ARG1 (c2 / connection
                  :prep-with (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China")
                        :mod (m / mainland))
                  :topic (a / area
                        :mod (v / various)))))

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Poon"))

                  :ARG0 (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong"))

                  :ARG0 (u / university)
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (t / transfer-01
                              :ARG1 (t2 / technology)
                              :location (m2 / mainland))
                        :op2 (d / develop-02

                                    :mod (h / human))
                              :location m2))
                  :manner (e / effective
                        :degree (m / more))
                  :mod (c4 / create-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / result
                              :mod (p3 / positive))
                        :ARG3 (a2 / and
                              :op1 c2
                              :op2 c3)))))
