# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.12 ::date 2013-08-11T09:47:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The agreement is based on the principle of mutually beneficial collaboration in which both universities complement each other's strengths in working together on joint research projects, supervision and teaching of research students and in administering professional training opportunities.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_12.txt
(b / base-02
      :ARG1 (a / agreement)
      :ARG2 (p / principle
            :mod (c / collaborate-01
                  :mod (b2 / benefit-01
                        :mod (m / mutual))
                  :instrument-of (c2 / complement-01
                        :ARG1 (u / university
                              :mod (b3 / both)
                              :mod (e / each))
                        :ARG2 (s / strength
                              :poss (o / other))
                        :purpose (w / work-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (p2 / project
                                          :mod (r / research-01
                                                :mod (j / joint)))
                                    :op2 (s2 / supervise-01
                                          :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                                :ARG0-of (s3 / study-01)
                                                :mod (r2 / research-01)))
                                    :op3 (t2 / teach-01
                                          :ARG2 p4)
                                    :op4 (a3 / administer-01
                                          :ARG1 (o2 / opportunity
                                                :mod (t3 / train-01
                                                      :mod (p3 / professional)))))
                              :mod (t / together))))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.13 ::date 2013-08-11T13:01:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In addition to partnering with education institutes Hong Kong universities have also joined large-scale high technology exchange programs in mainland China in order to enhance communication between the mainland and Hong Kong in the discipline.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059_13.txt
(j / join-01
      :ARG0 (u / university
            :mod (c / city :name (n / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong")))
      :ARG1 (p2 / program
            :mod (e2 / exchange-01
                  :ARG1 (t / technology
                        :mod (h / high))
                  :mod (l / large-scale))
            :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China")
                  :mod (m / mainland)))
      :prep-in-addition-to (p / partner-01
            :ARG0 u
            :ARG1 (i / institute
                  :mod (e / education)))
      :mod (a / also)
      :purpose (e3 / enhance-01
            :ARG1 (c3 / communication
                  :mod (b / between
                        :op1 m
                        :op2 c)
                  :topic (d / discipline))))

# ::id PROXY_XIN_ENG_20041219_0059.14 ::date 2013-08-11T10:14:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG0 u

                        :op1 (r / research-01)
                        :op2 (d2 / develop-02)))
            :mod (l / late
                  :degree (m / most)))
      :time (e / event :name (n2 / name :op1 "China" :op2 "Hi-Tech" :op3 "Fair")
            :ARG1-of (h / hold-04
                  :location (c / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shenzhen"))
                  :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2004 :month 10))
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 6)
            :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))))

                        :op1 (i2 / institution
                              :mod (i3 / international)

                        :op2 (c2 / corporation
                              :mod (m / multi-national)))
                  :poss u)
            :purpose (e2 / enhance-01
                  :ARG0 u
                  :ARG1 (d / develop-02
                        :ARG1 (t / technology
                              :mod (a2 / advance)
                              :mod (p / possible
                                    :domain (f / find-01

                                                :mod (i4 / immediate)
                                                :mod (p2 / practical)
                                                :location (c3 / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))))))))
